<p>61a.1</p>ba 'dis/ /sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur cig ces smos pa yin te/ 'dir nges par legs pa ni bde ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad bde ba dang ldan par gyur cig ces bya ba'i don to/ /skyob la lha las phul byung
<p>61a.2</p>bar/ /bstod pa bdag gis rnam phye bas/ /'di las bsod nams gang bsags pa/ /des ni mya ngan 'das thob shog /lha las phul du byung ba'i bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa/ slob dpon shes rab go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzA ra na da na'i zhal
<p>61a.3</p>snga nas dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ bud+d+ha s+ya sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis lhun
<p>61a.4</p>po'i tshad las lhag pa'i dbu ni rab tu byin/ /gang gis rgyu skar bas kyang mang ba'i brgya phrag spyan rnams kyang ni btang / /sa gzhi dang mnyam rgya mtsho lta bu'i sha dang khrag rnams kyang / /de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad sangs rgyas bcom ldan rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /g.yo zhing 'khyug 'gro'i glog
<p>61a.5</p>'dra'i sems ni gang gis dbang du gnas pa dang / /'jig rten gsum po mi shis rgya mtsho las ni gang gis yang dag sgrol/ /srid 'joms bdud 'jig phyir du gang zhig slar yang srid par 'jug /de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis snying rje'i
<p>61a.6</p>sdom pa'i khur bus sems can don la dgyes pa'i phyir/ /lha dang lha min 'jig rten gsum po'i gtso bos mi rtog rnam par spong / /bkres sdug srog chags rnams la brtse ba mchog gnas gang zhig lus rab ster/ /de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal
<p>61a.7</p>lo/ /gang gis snying rjes 'thob pa'i sems can myur du bsgral zhing bskyab pa'i phyir/ /gang zhig phyugs dang nya dang ri dgas 'gro bar dgon pa'i nang du gnas/ /yun ring ngal dang dub pa bzod cing lus rnams kyang ni kun du gtong / /de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag
<p>61b</p>
<p>61b.1</p>tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sems can mang po'i lus kyi nad la sman gyi phyir du ni/ /'gro la byams pa'am snying rje'i dbang gis mchog tu mu ge'i dgon pa ru/ /nags tshal rnams su glang chen lus rnyed gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel la sbyor/ /de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan
<p>61b.2</p>sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /mu ge'i zug rngu zug pa'i dus su dbu la skyes pa'i rin po che/ /bcad nas byin pas bram ze dang ni mi bdag la sogs gnas pa'i phyir/ /kun du de bzhin thugs kyi byid pa sla bas thams cad sems can don/ /de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom
<p>61b.3</p>ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /nags rnams so sor gnas mdzad rmi lam bzang pos yang dag smra ba thob/ /ma dang rgyal po pha rol phan pa spyod pa rnams kyi seng ge'i khrir/ /gnyis 'thung mche ba drug par 'khrungs te 'gro ba gang phyir chos rnams kun/ /de ltar dka' ba
<p>61b.4</p>spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims yon tan bzod pa'i rang bzhin stobs brtson bsam gtan dang / /shes rab rab gsung mtshungs par spong ba'i byams dang snying rje'i yon tan gyis/ /'brog dgon gnas pa'i 'gro ba 'dren pa'i ded
<p>61b.5</p>dpon thob cing yang dag rtogs/ /de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags ma nor rgyun mas mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa rdzogs so// //rab tu bsngags pa'i gnas chen po bal po yam bu'i grong khyer du sgra'i mkhan po dpal
<p>61b.6</p>rgyal ba'i bzang po dang / shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// @#//chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa/ @##//chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
<p>61b.7</p>cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba/ /phrad dang bral bar dgongs pa can/ /mi 'bral dgongs shing bde ba can/ /dgongs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrib pa kun las nges par grol/ /thub pas 'jig rten kun zil mnan/ /khyod kyi mkhyen pas shes bya
<p>62a</p>
<p>62a.1</p>khyab/ /sems grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can kun gyi nyon mongs kun/ /ma lus pa dag 'dul mdzad pa/ /nyon mongs sel ba nyon mongs pa/ /brtser bcas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lhun gyis grub cing chags mi mnga'/ /thogs pa mi mnga' rtag
<p>62a.2</p>tu yang / /mnyam par gzhag cing 'dri kun gyi/ /lan ldon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas dang gnas pa bshad bya dang / /tshig dang shes pa ston pa la/ /rtag tu blo gros mi thogs pa/ /ston mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ched du zhu dang de dag gi/ /tshig dang spyod mkhyen 'ongs
<p>62a.3</p>pa dang / /'gro dang nges 'byung sems can la/ /legs 'doms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lus can kun gyis khyod mthong na/ /skyes bu mchog tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /mthong ba tsam gyis dad 'gyur bar/ /mdzad pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /len dang gnas dang gtong ba dang / /
<p>62a.4</p>sprul pa dang ni bsgyur ba dang / /ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes la/ /mnga' brnyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thabs dang skyabs dang dag pa dang / /nges 'byung theg pa chen po la/ /sems can rnams la slu ba yi/ /bdud 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes dang ni spangs pa dang / /
<p>62a.5</p>nges 'byung bgegs byed ston mdzad pa/ /bdag gzhan don la mu stegs gzhan/ /mi tshugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor du tshar bcad gsung mdzad pa/ /kun nas nyon mongs gtan spangs la / /bsrung ba mi mnga' bsnyel mi mnga'/ /tshogs sdud khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>62a.6</p>gshegs bzhugs kun du rtag par yang / /kun mkhyen ma lags spyod mi mnga'/ /khyod ni yang dag don du na/ /kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can kun gyi don mdzad pa/ /khyon ni dus las yong mi 'da'/ /rtag tu 'bras bu yod mdzad pa/ /mi bsnyel khyod la
<p>62a.7</p>phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten kun la gdugs zhag gcig /lan drug tu ni gzigs mdzad pa/ /thugs rje che dang ldan pa po/ /phan dgongs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gshegs dang thugs su chud pa dang / /mkhyen pa dang ni phrin las kyis/ /nyan thos dang ni rang sangs rgyas/ /
<p>62b</p>
<p>62b.1</p>kun mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub chen po'i rnam pa kun/ /sku gsum dag gis brnyes gyur pa/ /kun du sems can thams cad kyi/ /dogs gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sri ba mi mnga' skyon mi mnga'/ /rnyog pa mi mnga' bzhugs mi mnga'/ /g.yo ba mi mnga'
<p>62b.2</p>chos kun la/ /ma spros khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos sku la gnas yon tan 'di la bdag gis rab bstod pas/ /yon tan drug ldan sku gsum po ni yongs su rdzogs par ni/ /bdag sogs 'gro ba rnams kyis myur du rtogs par shog /chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun
<p>62b.3</p>mong ma yin pa la bstod pa/ slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shI leN+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tad+t+wa sta baM/
<p>62b.4</p>bod skad du/ de kho na nyid la bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thogs pa kun las rnam grol ba/ /kha dog bral zhing ma skyes shing / /rang gi ngo bo 'jig med pa'i/ /sku mnga' de bzhin gshegs phyag 'tshal/ /nyon mongs rags dang phra spangs pa/ /
<p>62b.5</p>bdag gi mi mnga' sgrib pa dag /dang po yod pas stong pa'i phyir/ /don dam mkha' dkyil 'dra phyag 'tshal/ /rnam rtog sprul ni spangs pas na/ /ci dgyes par ni mdzad gyur pa/ /gter mchog de nyid rtag gzigs pa/ /ngan 'gro 'i rgud pa spangs phyag 'tshal/ /rnam par rtog pa
<p>62b.6</p>thams cad spangs/ /nyid kyis dgyes bdar ma byas sku/ /'khor dang zhi bar ro mnyam sku/ /rnam rtog dri ma med phyag 'tshal/ /yang dang dgongs pas mnal mi mnga'/ /gti mug bral zhing spangs pas bzhugs/ /rtag tu de nyid ma gsal ba/ /rang bzhin mkhas pas shar phyag
<p>62b.7</p>'tshal/ /bsam gtan tshes grangs yongs rdzogs pas/ /mi rnams dga' ba skyed mdzad pa/ /rnam grol zla ba yid 'ong ba/ /lta ngan rab rib sel phyag 'tshal/ /dngos po dngos med gnyis 'das nas/ /rtog pa'i dri ma las grol ba/ /rtsen dor med de sa mnyam gnas/ /
<p>63a</p>
<p>63a.1</p>spos mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri med chu rlabs bde ba'i rgyu/ /ma lus srog chags 'tsho mdzad pa/ /che zhing mtha' med tshad dang bral/ /de nyid rgya mtsho che phyag 'tshal/ /legs spyan du ma rgyas thob pa/ /dpe med ro zhim yid la 'bab/ /rga shi'i
<p>63a.2</p>'jigs pa med mdzad pa/ /de nyid bdud rtsi la phag 'tshal/ /rang gi yid la brtan ldan yang / /khyab 'jug dbang phyug tshangs dbang dang / /lha dang drang srong thabs med pa/ /thabs de skad cig brnyes phyag 'tshal/ /dri med rin thang mnyam med pa/ /ngo bos 'dod rnams
<p>63a.3</p>yongs rdzogs mdzad/ /bsod nams bsags pas dmigs gyur pa/ /yid bzhin byang chub sems phyag 'tshal/ /srid pa'i 'khor bas yongs dub pa'i/ /mchog tu lta ba bde ba'i gnas/ /byang chub yan lag med tog ldan/ /zhi ba'i dpag bsam shing phyag
<p>63a.4</p>'tshal/ /shes bya shes med gnyis med cing / /pra sbom dbye ba rnams las grol/ /sna tshogs dpe las 'das gyur pa/ /tshig gis brjod mi nus phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu rgyal zhing bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /gzhan stobs 'joms byed mdud ba med/ /gnyis med sku mnga'
<p>63a.5</p>bsam mi khyab/ /gcig dpa' srid pa 'joms phyag 'tshal/ /bye brag med par dbang 'gyur zhing / /dngos tshogs skad cig la bsregs pa/ /shin tu drag pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /rab 'bar de nyid me phyag 'tshal/ /'di ltar yang dag bstod las dge ba gang thob pa'i/ /
<p>63a.6</p>bsod nams des ni 'gro ba ma lus zad 'gyur zhing / /sems can rnams ni sdug bsngal dag dang bral gyur pa/ /bde ba dang ldan sgrib med mya ngan 'das thob shog /de kho na nyid la bstod pa shAkya'i dge slong dpal gyi go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan
<p>63a.7</p>po many+dzu shrI b+ha dra dang / dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @/ /bdud btul ba la bstod pa bzhugs/ @##/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsam gtan phyin ci log gis ci zhig dgongs mdzad skad cig
<p>63b</p>
<p>63b.1</p>legs par spyan dbye gzigs/ /lus med mda' yis gzir ba'i skye bo bdag cag skyob pas kyang ni bsrung bar mi mdzad na/ /thugs rje ldan pa phyin ci log gyur khyod las mchog tu ma rung skyes bu gzhan ma mchis/ /phrag dog ldan pa bdud kyi bud med de skad smra yang rgyal
<p>63b.2</p>ba skyob pa byang chub gyur/ /gzhan yang 'dod dbang gis ni kun du gzhu bkang bdud gzhan lag pa myur pa pa Ta ha sgra 'jebs dang ldan/ /dpang po smin ma bskyod dang nyer g.yo lta bur sgeg dang 'dzum dang rol pa med rnams kyis/ /thub dbang skyob pa byang chub ma brnyes par
<p>63b.3</p>du bsam gtan las ni bskyod ma nus pa mthong gyur nas/ /ngo mtshar gyur pas pa spu langs pa'i lus kyis grub pa rnams dang yan lag mchog rnams 'dud/ /ral pa 'khrugs shing lce rnams g.yogs la kun du bltams pas gang gi thugs rnams 'khrul par ma gyur cing / /rab
<p>63b.4</p>gsal 'dod lha'i bdud rnams rtse mo mchog dag lag thogs glang po rta rnams gdong ldan seng ge dang / /stag gi gdong rnams rtswa bzhin grangs med gyur pa 'khor ba yis ni gang zhig bsnyengs bar ma gyur pa/ /de ni kun la gnong pa'i nam pa 'dres pa med par skyob pa sangs rgyas thub
<p>63b.5</p>dbang 'jig rten mgon/ /bdud btul ba la bstod pa/ rab dga'i lha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ d+harma d+hA tu sta baM / bod skad du/ chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal
<p>63b.6</p>lo/ /gang zhig kun du ma shes na/ /srid pa gsum du rnam 'khor ba/ /sems can kun la nges gnas pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal 'dud / /gang zhig 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa/ /de nyid sbyang ba byas pa las/ /dag pa de nyid mya ngan 'das/ /chos kyi sku yang de nyid do/ /
<p>63b.7</p>ji ltar 'o ma dang 'dres pas/ /mar gyi snying po mi snang ba/ /de bzhin nyon mongs dang 'dres pas/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang mi mthong ngo / /ji ltar 'o ma rnam sbyangs pas/ /mar gyi snying po dri med 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyon mongs rnam sbyangs pas/ /chos dbyings shin tu dri med 'gyur/ /
<p>64a</p>
<p>64a.1</p>ji ltar mar me bum nang gnas/ /cung zhig snang bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin nyon mongs bum nang gnas/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang mi mthong ngo / /phyogs ni gang dang gang dag nas/ /bum pa bu ga btod gyur pa/ /de dang de yi phyogs nyid nas/ /'od kyi rang bzhin 'byung
<p>64a.2</p>bar 'gyur/ /gang tshe ting 'dzin rdo rje yis/ /bum pa de ni bcag gyur pa/ /de tshe de ni nam mkha' yi/ /mthar thug bar du snang bar byed/ /chos kyi dbyings ni skye ma yin/ /nam yang 'gag par 'gyur ba med/ /dus rnams kun du nyon mongs med/ /thog ma bar mthar dri ma bral/ /
<p>64a.3</p>ji ltar rin chen baiDUr+ya/ /dus rnams kun du 'od gsal yang / /rdo yi nang na gnas gyur na/ /de yi 'od ni gsal ma yin/ /de bzhin nyon mongs kyis bsgribs pa'i/ /chos dbyings shin tu dri med pa'ang / /'khor bar 'od ni gsal ma yin/ /mya ngan 'das na 'od gsal
<p>64a.4</p>'gyur/ /khams yod na ni las byas pas/ /sa le sbram dag mthong bar 'gyur/ /khams med na ni las byas na / /nyon mongs 'ba' zhig bskyed par zad/ /ji ltar sbun pas g.yogs gyur pas/ /so ba 'bras bur mi 'dod ltar/ /de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs
<p>64a.5</p>pas/ /de ni sangs rgyas zhes mi brtag /ji ltar sbun pa las grol na/ /'bras nyid snang bar 'gyur ba ltar/ /de bzhin nyon mongs las grol na/ /chos kyi sku nyid rab tu gsal/ /chu shing snying po med do zhes/ /'jig rten na ni dper byed kyang / /de yi 'bras bu snying po
<p>64a.6</p>nyid/ /mngar po za bar byed pa ltar/ /snying po med pa'i 'khor ba las/ /nyon mongs gzeb dang bral gyur na/ /de yi 'bras bu sangs rgyas nyid/ /lus can kun gyi bdud rtsir 'gyur/ /de bzhin sa bon thams cad las/ /rgyu dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu 'byung / /sa bon med
<p>64a.7</p>par 'bras yod par/ /shes ldan gang gis sgrub par nus/ /sa bon gyur pa khams de nyid/ /chos rnams kun gyi rten du 'dod/ /rim gyis sbyangs par gyur pa las/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /dri med nyi ma zla ba yang / /sprin dang khug rna du ba dang / /sgra
<p>64b</p>
<p>64b.1</p>gcan gdong dang rdul la sogs/ /sgrib pa lnga yis bsgribs par gyur / /de bzhin 'od gsal ba yi sems/ /'dod dang gnod sems le lo dang / /rgod pa dang ni the tshom ste/ /sgrib pa lnga yis bsgribs par gyur / /ji ltar me yis dag pa'i gos/ /sna tshogs dri mas
<p>64b.2</p>dri ma can/ /ji ltar me yi nang bcug na/ /dri ma tshig 'gyur gos min ltar/ /de bzhin 'od gsal ba yi sems/ /'dod chags la sogs dri ma can/ /ye shes me yis nyon mongs bsreg /de nyid 'od gsal ma yin no/ /stong pa nyid ni ston pa'i mdo/ /rgyal bas
<p>64b.3</p>ji snyed gsungs pa gang / /de dag kun gyis nyon mongs ldog /khams de nyams par byed ma yin/ /sa yi dkyil na yod pa'i chu/ /dri ma med par gnas pa ltar/ /nyon mongs nang na ye shes kyang / /de bzhin dri ma med par gnas/ /chos dbyings gang phyir bdag ma
<p>64b.4</p>yin/ /bud med ma yin skyes pa'ang min/ /gzung ba kun las rnam grol ba/ /ji ltar bdag ces brtag par bya/ /chags pa med pa'i chos kun la/ /bud med skyes pa dmigs ma yin/ /'dod chags kyis ldongs gdul bya'i phyir/ /bud med skyes pa zhes rab bstan/ /
<p>64b.5</p>mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa zhes/ /bya ba gsum pos sems sbyong byed/ /mchog tu sems ni sbyong byed pa'i/ /chos ni rang bzhin med pa yin/ /ji ltar sbrum ma'i lto na bu/ /yod kyang mthong ba ma yin pa/ /de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang
<p>64b.6</p>mthong ma yin/ /bdag dang bdag gi rnam rtog dang / /ming gi 'du shes rgyu mtshan gyis/ /rnam rtog bzhi po 'byung ba yang / /'byung dang 'byung las gyur pas so/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi smon lam yang / /snang ba med cing mtshan nyid med/ /so sor rang rig sbyor ldan nyid/ /
<p>64b.7</p>sangs rgyas rtag pa'i chos nyid can/ /ji ltar ri bong mgo yi rwa/ /brtags pa nyid de med pa ltar/ /de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyang / /brtags pa nyid de yod ma yin/ /phra rab rdul gyi ngo bo yis/ /glang gi rwa yang dmigs ma yin/ /ji ltar sngon bzhin phyis de bzhin/ /de
<p>65a</p>
<p>65a.1</p>la ci zhig brtag par bya/ /brten nas 'byung bar gyur pa dang / /brten nas 'gag par 'gyur bas na/ /gcig kyang yod pa ma yin na / /byis pa ji ltar rtog par byed/ /ri bong ba glang rwa yi dpes/ /ji ltar bde gshegs chos rnams nyid/ /dbu ma nyid du sgrub
<p>65a.2</p>par byed/ /ji ltar nyi zla skar ma'i gzugs/ /dang ba'i snod kyi chu nang du/ /gzugs brnyan mthong bar gyur pa ltar/ /mtshan nyid rdzogs pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba/ /bslu ba med cing brtan pa yi/ /gang zhig de ltar bdag med pa'ang / /ji ltar bdag
<p>65a.3</p>dang bdag gir brtag /ji ltar so ga'i dus su chu/ /dro'o zhes ni rjod par byed/ /de nyid grang ba'i dus su ni/ /grang ngo zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /nyon mongs drwa bas g.yogs pa ni / /sems can zhes ni brjod par bya/ /de nyid nyon mongs bral gyur na/ /sangs rgyas zhes ni brjod par
<p>65a.4</p>bya/ /mig dang gzugs la brten nas ni/ /dri ma med pa'i snang ba 'byung / /skye med 'gag pa med nyid las/ /chos kyi dbyings ni rab tu shes/ /sgra dang rna ba la brten nas/ /rnam par dag pa'i shes pa gsum/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi dbyings/ /rtog dang bcas pas
<p>65a.5</p>thos par 'gyur/ /sna dang dri la brten nas snom/ /de ni gzugs su med pa'i dpes / /de bzhin sna yi rnam shes kyis/ /chos kyi dbyings la rtog par byed/ /lce yi rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ /ro yi khams kyang dben pa ste/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo yin / /rnam par shes
<p>65a.6</p>pa gnas med pa/ /dag pa'i lus kyi ngo bo dang / /reg bya'i rkyen gyi mtshan nyid dang / /rkyen dag las ni grol gyur pa/ /chos kyi dbyings zhes brjod par bya/ /yid gtsor gyur pa'i chos rnams la/ /rtog dang brtag pa rnam spangs nas/ /chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid/ /
<p>65a.7</p>chos kyi dbyings su bsgom par bya/ /mthong dang thos dang bsnams pa dang / /myangs dang reg par gyur pa dang / /chos rnams de ltar rnal 'byor pas/ /shes na mtshan nyid rdzogs pa yin/ /mig dang rna ba sna dag dang / /lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid/ /skye mched
<p>65b</p>
<p>65b.1</p>drug po rnam dag pa/ /'di nyid de nyid mtshan nyid do/ /sems nyid rnam pa gnyis su mthong / /ji ltar 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das/ /bdag tu 'dzin las 'khor ba ste/ /so sor rig na de nyid do/ /'dod chags zad pas mya ngan 'das/ /zhe sdang gti mug zad pa dang / /de dag
<p>65b.2</p>'gags pa sangs rgyas nyid/ /lus can kun gyi skyabs nyid do/ /shes dang mi shes pa dag las/ /lus 'di nyid la thams cad de/ /rang gi rnam par rtog pas bcings/ /bdag nyid shes na grol bar 'gyur/ /byang chub ring min nye ba min/ /'gro min 'ong ba ma yin zhing / /
<p>65b.3</p>nyon mongs gzeb gyur 'di nyid la/ /mthong ba dang ni ma mthong yin/ /shes rab mar me la gnas nas/ /mchog tu zhi bar gyur pa yis/ /bdag la brtags pas gnas bya zhes/ /mdo sde'i tshogs las gsungs pa lags/ /stobs bcu'i stobs kyis byis pa rnams/ /
<p>65b.4</p>byin rlabs zla ba tshes pa bzhin/ /nyon mongs can gyi sems can gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ngo / /ji ltar yi [(]dgas [,]dwags [)]rnams kyis ni/ /rgya mtsho skams par mthong ba ltar/ /de bzhin mi shes pas bsgribs pas/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni med par brtags / /dman
<p>65b.5</p>dang bsod nams dman pa la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ci bgyir mchis/ /ji ltar dmus long lag pa ru/ /rin chen mchog ni bzhag pa 'dra/ /sems can bsod nams byas rnams la/ /'od kyis gsal zhing dpal ldan pa'i/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'bar ba/ /
<p>65b.6</p>sangs rgyas de yi mdun na gnas/ /mgon po de yi gzugs kyi skus / /bskal pa mang por bzhugs nas kyang / /gdul bya rnams ni gdul ba'i phyir/ /dbyings nyid tha dad gyur pa lags/ /sems kyi yul ni nges rtogs nas/ /der ni shes pa 'jug par gyur/ /so so rang
<p>65b.7</p>rig rnam dag na/ /sa rnams de yi bdag nyid gnas/ /dbang phyug chen po'i gnas mchog dang / /'og min nyid de rnam mdzes pa/ /shes pa gsum po gcig nyid du/ /'dres par gyur la bdag smra'o/ /byis pa'i nang na yongs mkhyen dang / /'phags pa'i nang na sna tshogs nyid/ /
<p>66a</p>
<p>66a.1</p>dbang phyug chen po tshe dpag med/ /bskal pa'i tshe yi rgyu gang yin/ /phyi rol sems can khams kyi yang / /dpag tu med pa'i bskal par ni/ /tshe yang gang gis bsrungs gyur cing / /srog chags rnams kyi srog gnas pa'i/ /rgyu gang mi zad pa de nyid/ /
<p>66a.2</p>gang gi 'bras bu mi zad gang / /snang ba med pa'i bye brag gis/ /shes rab don du rab tu 'jug /byang chub ring bar mi bsam zhing / /nye bar yang ni bsam mi bya/ /yul drug snang ba med par ni/ /yang dag ji bzhin rig gyur pa'o/ /ji ltar 'o ma dang 'dres chu/ /snod gcig na ni
<p>66a.3</p>gnas pa las/ /ngang pa 'o ma 'thung byed cing / /chu ni ma yin de bzhin gnas/ /de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs nas/ /ye shes lus 'dir gcig gnas kyang / /rnal 'byor pa yis ye shes len/ /mi shes pa ni 'dor bar byed/ /bdag dang bdag gi zhes 'dzin pas/ /
<p>66a.4</p>ji srid phyi rol rnam brtags pa/ /bdag med rnam pa gnyis mthong na/ /srid pa'i sa bon 'gag par 'gyur/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das/ /gtsang ba rtag pa dge ba'i gzhi/ /gang phyir gnyis ni byis pas brtags / /de yi gnyis med rnal 'byor gnas/ /dka' spyod sna
<p>66a.5</p>tshogs sbyin pa dang / /tshul khrims sems can don sdud dang / /sems can phan byed bzod pa ste/ /gsum po 'dis ni khams rgyas 'gyur/ /chos rnams kun la brtson 'grus dang / /bsam gtan la sems 'jug pa dang / /rtag tu shes rab bsten pa ste/ /'di yang byang chub
<p>66a.6</p>rgyas byed yin/ /thabs dang bcas pa'i shes rab dang / /smon lam rnam par sbyangs pa dang / /stobs la nges nas ye shes te/ /khams rgyas byed pa'i chos bzhi'o / /byang chub sems phyag mi bya zhes/ /smra ba ngan par smra ba ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' ma byung bar/ /chos kyi sku
<p>66a.7</p>ni 'byung ma yin/ /bur shing sa bon la sdang gang / /kha ra spyad par 'dod pa des / /bur shing sa bon med par ni/ /kha ra 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin/ /bur shing sa bon gang bsrungs nas/ /nye bar gnas shing bsgrubs pa las/ /bu ram kha ra hwags rnams ni/ /de las 'byung
<p>66b</p>
<p>66b.1</p>bar 'gyur ba ltar/ /byang chub sems ni rab bsrungs nas/ /nye bar gnas shing bsgrubs pa las/ /dgra bcom rkyen rtogs sangs rgyas rnams/ /de las skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar sA lu'i sa bon sogs/ /zhing pas srung bar byed pa ltar/ /de bzhin theg mchog mos rnams
<p>66b.2</p>la'ang / /'dren pa rnams kyis srung bar mdzad/ /ji ltar mar ngo'i bcu bzhi la/ /zla ba cung zad mthong ba ltar/ /de bzhin theg mchog mos rnams la'ang / /sangs rgyas sku ni cung zad mthong / /ji ltar tshes pa'i zla ba la/ /skad cig skad cig rgyas par mthong / /de bzhin sa la zhugs
<p>66b.3</p>rnams kyang / /rim gyis rim gyis 'phel bar mthong / /ji ltar yar ngo'i bco lnga la/ /zla ba rdzogs par 'gyur ba ltar/ /de bzhin sa yi mthar thug na/ /chos kyi sku yang rdzogs shing gsal/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag tu mos pa brtan po yis/ /sems
<p>66b.4</p>de yang dag skyed byas nas/ /phyir mi ldog par yang yang 'byung / /nag po'i gzhi ni yongs spangs nas/ /dkar po'i gzhi ni rab bzung bas/ /de tshe de ni nges rtogs pa/ /dga' ba zhes ni mngon par brjod/ /'dod chags la sogs sna tshogs pa'i/ /dri mas rtag tu dri ma
<p>66b.5</p>can/ /dri ma med par gang dag pa/ /dri ma med ces brjod pa yin/ /nyon mongs drwa ba rab 'gags nas/ /dri med shes rab rab gsal bas/ /tshad med pa yi mun pa dag /sel bar byed pas 'od byed pa'o/ /rtag tu dag pa'i 'od kyis gsal/ /'du 'dzi rnam par spangs pa yi/ /
<p>66b.6</p>ye shes 'od kyis rab bskor bas/ /sa de 'od 'phro can du 'dod/ /rig dang sgyu rtsal bzo gnas kun/ /bsam gtan rnam pa sna tshogs nyid/ /nyon mongs shin tu sbyang dka' las/ /rnam par rgyal bas sbyang dkar 'dod/ /byang chub rnam pa gsum po dang / /phun sum tshogs
<p>66b.7</p>kun bsdu ba dang / /skye dang 'jig pa zad pa la/ /sa de mngon du 'gyur bar 'dod/ /'khor lo'i bkod pa rnam kun du/ /'od kyi dra bas rtse ba dang / /'khor ba'i mtsho yi 'dam rgal bas/ /de la ring du song zhes bya/ /sangs rgyas kyis nges 'di bzung zhing / /ye shes rgya
<p>67a</p>
<p>67a.1</p>mtshor zhugs pa dang / /'bad med lhun gyis grub gyur pa / /bdud kyi 'khor gyis mi g.yos pa'o / /so so yang dag rig kun la/ /chos ston pa yi 'bel ba'i gtam/ /rnal 'byor pa de mthar son pas/ /sa de legs pa'i blo gros 'dod/ /ye shes
<p>67a.2</p>rang bzhin 'di yi sku/ /dri med nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dzin pa las/ /chos kyi sprin ni kun du 'byung / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi gnas/ /spyod pa'i 'bras bu yongs 'dzin pa / /gnas ni yongs su gyur pa de/ /chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa
<p>67a.3</p>yin/ /bag chags las grol bsam mi khyab/ /'khor ba'i bag chags bsam du yod/ /khyod ni kun du bsam mi khyab/ /gang gis khyod ni shes par nus/ /ngag gi spyod yul kun las 'das/ /dbang po kun gyi spyod yul min/ /yid kyi shes pas rtogs bya ba/ /gang yang
<p>67a.4</p>rung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rim gyis 'jug pa'i lugs nyid kyis/ /sangs rgyas sras po grags chen rnams/ /chos kyi sprin gyi ye shes kyis/ /chos nyid stong pa mthong gyur nas/ /gang tshe sems ni rab bkrus pas/ /'khor ba'i gzeb las 'das gyur nas/ /pad+ma chen po'i rang
<p>67a.5</p>bzhin gyi/ /stan la de ni rab gnas 'gyur/ /'dab ma rin chen du ma'i 'od/ /'dod par bya ba'i ze 'bru can/ /pad+ma bye ba du ma yis/ /rnam pa kun du yongs su bskor/ /stobs bcu po yis yongs su gang / /mi 'jigs pa yis gang dag ngoms/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas
<p>67a.6</p>chos/ /spros med rnams las nyams mi mnga'/ /legs par spyad pa'i lam kun gyis/ /bsod nams ye shes rab bsags pa'i/ /zla ba nya la skar ma yis/ /'khor du rnam pa kun gyis bskor/ /sangs rgyas phyag gi nyi ma der/ /dri med rin chen 'bar gyur te/ /sras kyi thu
<p>67a.7</p>bor dbang bskur bas/ /dbang bskur ba ni kun du stsol/ /rnal 'byor chen po der gnas nas/ /rmongs pas dman pa'i 'jig rten rnams/ /sdug bsngal gyis g.yengs 'jigs pa la/ /lha yi spyan gyis gzigs gyur nas/ /de yi sku las 'od zer rnams/ /'bad pa med par 'byung
<p>67b</p>
<p>67b.1</p>'gyur te/ /rmongs pa'i mun par zhugs de yi/ /sgo rnams 'byed par mdzad pa yin/ /lhag bcas mya ngan 'das pa rnams/ /lhag med mya ngan 'das par 'dod/ /'dir ni mya ngan 'das pa nyid/ /dri ma med par sems gyur pa'o/ /sems can kun gyi dngos med pa'i/ /ngo bo de
<p>67b.2</p>yang de spyod yul/ /de mthong byang chub sems dbang po / /shin tu dri med chos kyi sku/ /dri ma med pa'i chos sku la/ /ye shes rgya mtsho gnas gyur nas/ /sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin du/ /de las sems can don rab mdzad/ /chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis
<p>67b.3</p>mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ni ru pa ma sta baM / bod skad du/ dpe med par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>67b.4</p>gang zhig lta bas phongs pa yi/ /'jig rten 'di la phan brtson khyod/ /dngos po med pa'i don rig pas/ /dpe med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gang zhig khyod kyis cung zhig kyang / /sangs rgyas spyan gyis ma gzigs pa/ /khyod kyis gzigs pa bla med de/ /de nyid don ni rig pa
<p>67b.5</p>lags/ /don dam pa yi yod pa nyid/ /rtogs dang rtogs bya mi mnga' zhing / /e ma'o mchog tu rtogs dka' ba'i/ /chos nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs/ /khyod kyis cung zhig ma bskyed cing / /chos rnams bkag pa'ang ma lags la/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi lta ba yis/ /bla
<p>67b.6</p>na med pa'i go 'phang brnyes/ /'khor ba spangs par gyur pa yis/ /mya ngan 'das khyod mi bzhed kyi / /'khor ba ma dmigs pa nyid kyi/ /zhi de mgon po khyod kyis rtogs/ /khyod kyis kun nas nyon mongs dang / /rnam byang ro gcig gyur rig pas/ /chos dbyings mngon par dbyer med
<p>67b.7</p>pa/ /kun du rnam par dag par gyur/ /gtso bo khyod kyis 'ga' zhig tu/ /yi ge gcig kyang ma gsungs la/ /gdul bya'i 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /chos kyi char gyis tshim par mdzad/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' khyod/ /phung po khams dang skye mched la/ /chags par gyur
<p>68a</p>
<p>68a.1</p>pa mi mnga' bas/ /chos rnams kun la brten ma lags/ /mgon khyod sems can 'du shes kyis/ /'jug pa kun du mi mnga' yang / /sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sems can la/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid gyur pa'ang khyod/ /bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin du / /
<p>68a.2</p>rtag mi rtag sogs la gtso khyod/ /de lta'i rnam rtog sna tshogs kyis/ /thugs ni chags par gyur ma lags/ /chos rnams gang du'ang 'gro 'ong med/ /de bzhin khyod kyis gshegs pa'ang lags/ /'ga' ru spungs pa ma mchis pa / /de phyir don dam rig pa'ang lags/ /kun gyi rjes
<p>68a.3</p>su zhugs gyur kyang / /'ga' ru 'byung ba'ang ma lags la/ /skye dang chos dang sku rnams kyang / /thub chen khyod kyi bsam mi khyab/ /gcig dang gzhan pa rnams spangs pa/ /brag ca lta bu'i 'gro ba rnams/ /'pho dang 'jig pa rnam spangs pa / /smad pa med pa khyod kyis rtogs/ /
<p>68a.4</p>rtag dang chad pa dang bral zhing / /mtshan nyid mtshon bya rnam spangs par/ /gtso bos rmi lam sgyu tshogs bzhin/ /'khor ba nges par rtogs pa lags/ /bag chags gzhir gyur mthar thug pa'i/ /khyod kyis nyon mongs sdig pa spangs/ /nyon mongs nyid kyi rang bzhin yang / /khyod
<p>68a.5</p>kyis bdud rtsi nyid du bsgrubs/ /dpa' bo khyod kyis gzugs rnams kyi/ /mtshan ma med mthong gzugs med bzhin/ /mtshan gyis 'bar ba'i sku nyid kyang / /gzugs su spyod yul nyid du mthong / /gzugs su mthong bas mthong min yang / /mthong ngo zhes ni rjod par byed/ /chos
<p>68a.6</p>mthong bas ni shin [(]du [,]tu [)]mthong / /chos nyid mthong ba ma yin no/ /khong stong khyod kyi sku la med/ /sha dang rus pa khrag med kyang / /nam mkha'i dbang po'i gzhu bzhin du/ /khyod kyi sku ni ston par mdzad/ /sku la bsnyun med mi gtsang med/ /bkres dang skom pa 'byung med kyang / /khyod ni
<p>68a.7</p>'jig rten rjes 'jug phyir/ /'jig rten spyod pa'ang ston par mdzad/ /las kyi sgrib pa'i skyon rnams ni / /sdig med khyod kyis kun spangs kyang / /khyod kyis sems can rjes gzung phyir/ /las spangs par yang rab tu bstan/ /chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir/ /gtso bo theg
<p>68b</p>
<p>68b.1</p>dbyer ma mchis kyang / /khyod kyi theg pa gsum bstan pa/ /sems can gzhug pa'i ched du lags/ /rtag cing brtan la zhi ba yi/ /chos kyi rang bzhin khyod kyi sku/ /rgyal bas gdul bya 'gro ba'i phyir/ /khyod nyid mya ngan 'das par bstan/ /grangs med 'jig rten khams rnams su/ /
<p>68b.2</p>'das dang bltams dang mngon byang chub/ /'khor ba'ang thar par mos rnams kyi/ /khyod la gus rnams kyis yang mthong / /mgon po sems pa mi mnga' zhing / /rnam rtog g.yo ba mi mnga' yang / /khyod nyid ngang gis 'jig rten la/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa'ang 'jug par 'gyur/ /
<p>68b.3</p>de ltar bde gshegs yon tan tshad med bsam mi khyab/ /me tog gis brgyan pa las bsod nams gang thob par/ /gyur pa 'di ni sems can ma lus pa 'di dag /mchog tu rtogs dka' thub pa'i chos kyi snod gyur cig /dpe med par bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis
<p>68b.4</p>mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o//[ ##]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ lo kA tI ta sta baM / bod skad du/ 'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>68b.5</p>dben pa'i ye shes rig gyur pa/ /'jig rten 'das khyod phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /gang khyod 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/ /yun ring thugs rjes ngal bar gyur/ /phung po tsam las grol ba yi/ /sems can med par khyod bzhed la/ /sems can ngan la'ang mchog gzhol bar/ /thub pa
<p>68b.6</p>chen po khyod nyid zhugs/ /blo ldan khyod kyi phung de'ang / /sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za yi/ /grong khyer rmi lam ji bzhin du/ /blo ldan rnams la rab tu bstan/ /gang dag rgyu las byung ba rnams/ /de med par ni yod min pas/ /gzugs brnyan nyid dang mtshungs pa ru/ /gsal bar ci yi
<p>68b.7</p>phyir mi 'dod/ /'byung ba mig gis gzung min pas/ /de dngos mig gi ji ltar yin/ /gzugs nyid gzung bar rab bkag pa/ /gzugs nyid khyod kyis de ltar gsungs/ /tshor bya med par de med pas/ /tshor ba nyid ni bdag med pas/ /tshor ba de yang rang bzhin gyis/ /yod
<p>69a</p>
<p>69a.1</p>pa min par khyod nyid bzhed/ /ming dang don dag tha dad min/ /me yis kha nyid tshig par 'gyur/ /gzhan na'ang rtog pa med 'gyur zhes/ /bden pa gsung ba khyod kyis bstan/ /byed po rang dbang nyid las kyang / /tha snyad du ni khyod kyis bstan/ /phan tshun
<p>69a.2</p>ltos pa can nyid du/ /krub par khyod ni bzhed pa lags/ /byed po yod min spyod po'ang med/ /bsod nams de min rten 'brel skyes/ /rten nas skyes kyang ma skyes zhes/ /tshig gi bdag po khyod kyis gsung / /shes pa med par shes bya min/ /de med rnam par shes pa'ang med/ /
<p>69a.3</p>de phyir shes dang shes bya dag /rang dngos med ces khyod kyis gsung / /mtshan nyid mtshon bya gzhan nyid na / /mtshon bya mtshan nyid med par 'gyur/ /tha dad min na'ang med de par/ /khyod kyis gsal po nyid du bstan/ /mtshan nyid mtshan bya rnam bral zhing / /tshig gis brjod pa
<p>69a.4</p>rnam spangs par/ /khyod kyi ye shes spyan nyid kyis/ /'gro ba 'di dag zhi bar mdzad/ /dngos po yod pa nyid mi skye/ /med pa'ang ma yin yod med min/ /bdag las ma yin gzhan las min/ /gnyis min skye ba ji lta bu/ /yod pa gnas par rigs 'gyur gyi/ /'jig par 'gyur
<p>69a.5</p>ba ma yin no/ /med pa mi gnas par rigs pas/ /'jig par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /re zhig zhig pa'i rgyu las kyang / /'bras bu 'byung bar mi rigs la/ /ma zhig las min rmi lam dang / /'dra ba'i skye ba khyod nyid bzhed/ /zhig dang ma zhig pa dag gis/ /rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung ba dag /sgyu ma 'byung ba bzhin du
<p>69a.6</p>'byung / /kun kyang de bzhin khyod kyis gsungs / /de phyir khyod kyis 'gro 'di dag /yongs su brtags pa las byung bar/ /kun du shes bya 'byung ba na'ang / /skye ba med cing 'gag med gsungs/ /rtag la 'khor ba yod ma yin/ /mi rtag pa la'ang 'khor ba med/ /de nyid rig pa'i mchog khyod kyis/ /'khor
<p>69a.7</p>ba rmi lam 'dra bar gsungs/ /sdug bsngal rang gis byas pa dang / /gzhan gyis byas dang gnyis kas byas/ /rgyu med par ni rtog ge 'dod/ /khyod kyis rten nas 'byung bar gsungs/ /rten cing 'brel par gang 'byung ba/ /de nyid khyod ni stong par bzhed/ /dngos po rang dbang yod
<p>69b</p>
<p>69b.1</p>min zhes/ /mnyam med khyod kyi seng ge'i sgras / /kun rtog thams cad spang pa'i phyir/ /stong nyid bdud rtsi ston mdzad na/ /gang zhig de la zhen gyur pa/ /de nyid khyod kyis shin tu smad/ /bems po gzhan dbang stong pa nyid/ /sgyu ma bzhin du rkyen 'byung bar/ /mgon po khyod kyis chos kun gyi/ /
<p>69b.2</p>dngos med goms par mdzad pa lags/ /khyod kyis cung zhig ma bskyed cing / /'ga' yang bkag pa ma mchis la/ /sngon gyi ji ltar phyis de bzhin/ /de bzhin nyid ni thugs su chud/ /'phags pa rnams kyis bstan pa yi/ /bsgom ma zhugs par mtshan med 'di/ /rnam par shes par
<p>69b.3</p>'gar 'gyur ram/ /mtshan ma med la ma zhugs par/ /thar pa med ces gsungs pa'i phyir/ /de phyir khyod kyis theg chen rnams/ /ma lus par ni de nyid bstan/ /bstod pa'i snod khyod bstod pa las/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang thob pa/ /des ni 'gro ba ma lus rnams/ /mtshan
<p>69b.4</p>ma'i 'ching las grol gyur cig /'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // 
<p>69b.5\]#]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tsit+ta badzra sta baM / bod skad du/ sems kyi rdo rje'i bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis sems byung dra ba ni/ /sems nyid kyis ni bsal mdzad de/ /sems kyi rmongs pa sel ba yi/ /rang sems de la
<p>69b.6</p>phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can mos pa sna tshogs rnams/ /tha dad lha yi dmigs pa la/ /rin chen sems ni rnam grol las/ /lha gzhan bsgrub tu yod ma yin/ /sems thob pa ni byang chub ste/ /sems ni 'gro ba lnga po yin/ /bde dang sdug bsngal mtshan nyid dag /
<p>69b.7</p>sems las ma gtogs cung zad med/ /'gro ba kun gyi mthong ba rnams/ /cung zad bsgom pa'i rnam pa yang / /de kun sems kyi dra ba ru/ /de nyid gsung bas bstan pa yin/ /rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i sems/ /rnam par rtog pas bsdos byas pa'i/ /'khor ba rnam rtog
<p>70a</p>
<p>70a.1</p>tsam nyid de/ /rnam rtog med pa thar pa yin/ /de bas kun gyis 'bad pa yis/ /byang chub sems la phyag bya'o/ /sems kyi rdo rje bsgom pa'i phyir/ /de ni byang chub mchog ces bya/ /khams bskyed sems ni lus kyis bcings/ /sems med khams ni bde
<p>70a.2</p>bar 'jug /de phyir sems ni kun du bsrung / /bde legs sems las sangs rgyas 'byung / /sems kyi rdo rje'i bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[# #]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pa ra ma ar+tha sta baM / bod skad du/ don dam par bstod pa/ 'jam
<p>70a.3</p>dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye ba med cing gnas med la/ /'jig rten dpe las shin tu 'das/ /ngag gis brjod pa'i spyod yul min/ /mgon khyod ji ltar bstod par bgyi/ /de lta na yang gang 'dra bas/ /de bzhin nyid don spyod yul gyi/ /'jig rten btags
<p>70a.4</p>pa la gnas nas/ /gus pa chen pos bdag gis bstod/ /skye ba med pa'i ngo bo yis/ /khyod la skye ba yong mi mnga'/ /mgon khyod gshegs dang byon mi mnga'/ /dngos mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /dngos med ma lags dngos ma lags/ /chad pa ma lags rtag ma
<p>70a.5</p>lags/ /mi rtag ma lags rtag ma lags/ /gnyis mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /dmar dang ljang dang btsod mdog min/ /ser dang gnag dang dkar ma lags/ /khyod la kha dog yong mi dmigs/ /mdog mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /chen po ma lags chung ma
<p>70a.6</p>lags/ /ring dang zlum pa ma lags la/ /tshad med pa yi dngos brnyes pa/ /tshad mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /ring min nya ba ma lags shing / /nam mkha' ma lags sa ma lags/ /'khor min mya ngan 'das ma lags/ /gnas mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /
<p>70a.7</p>chos rnams kun la mi gnas pas/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi dngos gyur cing / /mchog tu zab pa gnyis brnyes pa/ /zab mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod / /de lta'i bstod pas bstod bgyi'am/ /yang na 'dir ni ci zhig bstod/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa la/ /gang la
<p>70b</p>
<p>70b.1</p>bstod cing gang gis bstod/ /skye dang 'jig pa rnam spangs shing / /gang la mtha' dang dbus med pa / /gzung dang 'dzin pa mi mnga' ba / /'dir ni khyod bstod nus pa gang / /gshegs dang byon pa mi mnga' zhing / /'gro spangs bde bar gshegs bstod pa'i / /bsod nams des
<p>70b.2</p>ni 'jig rten rnams/ /bde gshegs gnas su 'gro bar shog /don dam par bstod pa/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
<p>70b.3\]# ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ kA ya tra ya sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba / /'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gcig min du ma ma yin bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs chen gzhir gyur pa/ /dngos min
<p>70b.4</p>dngos po med pa ma yin mkha' ltar ro gcig rtogs par dka' ba'i rang bzhin can/ /gos pa med cing mi 'gyur zhi la mi mnyam mnyam pa khyab pa can te spros med pa/ /so so rang rig rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku dpe med gang yin de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rang gi 'byor pa 'jig rten las
<p>70b.5</p>'das bsam gyis mi khyab legs mdzad brgya yi 'bras bu ni/ /blo can rnams kyi dga' ba bskyed phyir 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs rgyas par ston mdzad cing / /rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi sgra skad rgya chen 'jig rten kun du 'phro bar mdzad pa po/ /sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs sku chos kyi rgyal
<p>70b.6</p>srid gnas pa gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can rnams ni smin par mdzad phyir la la dag tu me 'bar bzhin du gang snang zhing / /la lar yang ni rdzogs par byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu zhi bar gang snang la/ /sna tshogs thabs tshul rnam pa du mar 'jug cing srid pa gsum
<p>70b.7</p>gyi 'jigs sel ba/ /phyogs bcur chub mdzad thub pa rnams kyi sprul sku don chen gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can don gcig rgyun du mdzad cing bsod nams ye shes chen po dpag med las byung ba'i/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gsum yid dang tshig gi lam
<p>71a</p>
<p>71a.1</p>las rab tu 'das pa la/ /bdag gis dad pas phyag byas dge ba byang chub sa bon bsags par gyur pa gang yin des/ /sku gsum thob nas 'gro ba 'di dag ma lus byang chub lam la nges par 'dzud par shog /sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon 'phags
<p>71a.2</p>pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ kA ya tra ya sto tra nA ma s+ya bi ba ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sku
<p>71a.3</p>gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'grel pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nyid chen po'i sku gsum gyi/ /bstod pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/ /gzhan gyi gsol bas bskul bas na/ /ji ltar bkod pa rnam par dbye/ /de la/
<p>71a.4</p>gcig min du ma ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis brjod par bya ba dang / dgos pa dang / 'brel pa dang / dgos pa'i yang dgos pa brjod par bya ste/ gang gi phyir brjod pa dang / dgos pa dang / 'brel pa med pa dag la ni so sor rtog pa sngon du
<p>71a.5</p>gtong ba dag len par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir 'dir ci zhig 'chad par 'gyur zhes 'di la yang dag par rmongs pa dag dran pa 'jug par bya ba'i phyir brjod par bya ba bshad do/ /bshad pa don med par rtog pa dag nges par 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dgos pa bstan to/ /thabs med par
<p>71a.6</p>dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir 'brel pa bshad de/ gzhan du na thabs med pa dag la ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur/ /de la 'dir sku gsum ni brjod par bya ba'o/ /de'i rang gi ngo bo nyid bshad pa ni dgos pa ste/ de'i rang gi ngo bo nyid bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di byas so/ /de
<p>71a.7</p>bas na dgos pa dang tshigs su bcad pa dag rjod pa dang brjod par bya ba'i mtshan nyid du 'brel pa'am/ tshig dang tshig can 'brel pa'am/ thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i mtshan nyid du 'brel pa'am/ sgrub pa dang bsgrub par bya ba'i mtshan nyid du 'brel ba'am/ bya ba dang byed pa'i mtshan
<p>71b</p>
<p>71b.1</p>nyid du 'brel ba ni 'brel ba'o/ /de nas 'bad pa dang rtsol ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par rang nyid kyis sku gsum gyi don dang bya ba mthar phyin pa ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa yin par shes par bya ste/ 'di ni re zhig don gyi spyi yin no/ /da ni yan lag gi don brjod par bya ste/ gcig
<p>71b.2</p>min du ma ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ gcig dang du ma ni gcig dang du ma ste/ gnyis ni gnyis med pa nyid do/ /du ma ni mang po nyid de/ gcig dang du mar ma gyur pa'i chos kyi sku gang yin pa de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/ /ci'i phyir gcig kyang ma yin la du ma
<p>71b.3</p>yang ma yin zhe na/ de'i phyir gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'o zhes 'byung bas na gang thog ma nyid nas ma skyes pa de la gcig dang du ma'i gnas skabs su bya bar mi nus te/ nam mkha' ltar yongs su chad pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /chos thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid las byung bas na/ de'i phyir
<p>71b.4</p>gang zhig gang las byung bar gyur pa ste/ gang gis sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su gyur pa de ma mthong ste/ sA lu la sogs pa'i sa bon las ni sA lu'i 'bras bu'o/ /de bzhin du stong pa nyid las gang zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni rtag pa dang chad par mi 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir kun du rtog pa ma lus
<p>71b.5</p>pa dang bral ba'i rgyal ba thams cad kyis kyang stong zhing sgyu ma dang 'dra bar gzigs so/ /gzhan yang khyad par du bya ba'i phyir bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs chen gzhir gyur pa zhes bya ba smos te/ bdag dang gzhan ni bdag dang gzhan te/ de dag la phan pa phun sum tshogs pa'i
<p>71b.6</p>gzhir gyur pa ni mngon par mtho ba dang / nges par legs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi phun sum tshogs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gang gi phyir chos kyi dbyings gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i ngo bo thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du bshad na/ ji ltar na bdag dang gzhan la phan pa
<p>71b.7</p>phun sum tshogs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa yin zhe na/ nyes pa med de/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi stobs kyis snod dang bcud kyi tshul du gnas pa ltar bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa yin te/ rmi lam la sogs pa'i shes pa bzhin no/ /gal te ma
<p>72a</p>
<p>72a.1</p>rig pa'i bag chags dang chos kyi dbyings thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i ngo bo de yang ma rig pa'i bag chags su gyur pa ni gla rtsi la sogs pas bsgos pa bzhin te/ dngos po rnams kyi chos nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /de bas na bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhir
<p>72a.2</p>gyur pa yin no/ /gzhan yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing lam bzang po rnyed pas ma rig pa'i bag chags glo bur ba ring du byas shing yongs su dag par gyur pa ni gser dang zangs kyi dri ma dang bral ba bzhin te/ 'di la yon tan dang nyes pa len cing spong ba yod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /
<p>72a.3</p>yang dag pa'i don rtogs pa kho na tsam du zad de/ de'i phyir/ 'di la bsal bya ci yang med/ /gzhal bar bya ba gang yang med/ /yang dag nyid la yang dag lta / /yang dag mthong na rnam par grol/ /zhes gsungs pa gang 'di ltar rkyen dang ldan pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par thal bar 'gyur gyi
<p>72a.4</p>ma skyes pa skye bar ni ma mthong ngo / /skyes pa 'gag pa dag las kyang cung zad skye ba med de/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni mar me dang mtshungs so/ /gzhan yang khyad par du bya ba'i phyir/ dngos min dngos po med ma yin/ /zhes bya ba smos te/ dngos po ni gzugs su yod pa'o/ /de
<p>72a.5</p>med par gyur pa ni dngos po med pa ste/ gnyi ga las ldog par 'gyur bas na/ dngos min dngos po yod pa ma yin/ /zhes bya ba ste yod pa dang med pa dang dbus las 'das par gyur pa'o/ /de nyid kyis nam mkha' ltar ro gcig pa ste/ nam mkha' ltar zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar ro
<p>72a.6</p>gcig cing mnyam pa'i rang bzhin du gang gyur pa de ni nam mkha' ltar ro gcig ces bya'o/ /de nyid kyis na rtogs par dka' ba'i rang bzhin can te/ dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyi ga dang gzhan las btsal ba dang bral ba nyid do/ /de bas na gos pa med pa ste/ 'dod chags la
<p>72a.7</p>sogs pa'i nyes pa'i dri ma dang bral ba nyid do/ /de nyid kyis na mi 'gyur ba ste rang gi ngo bo nyid la mi 'pho ba'o/ /zhi ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar gyur pa'o/ /mi mnyam pa ni mtshungs pa med pa'o/ /mnyam pa ni chos thams cad kyi gzhir mtshungs par gyur pa'o/ /khyab
<p>72b</p>
<p>72b.1</p>pa can ni thams cad du song bar gyur pa'o/ /spros pa med pa ni spros pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa'o/ /khyad par du bya ba gzhan yang so so rang rig ces bya ba ste/ sems can rnams kyi so so rang gis rig par gyur pa gzhon nu ma'i bde ba dris pa bzhin no/ /dpe med pa ni dpe las
<p>72b.2</p>'das par gyur pa ste/ de skad du yang / mtshungs pa 'ga' yang yod min te/ /tshig lam pa yang gang zhig yod/ /cung zad nye ba'am ring ba ni/ /'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no/ /'dren pa mnyam pa med gyur pa/ /de la dper bya gang zhig gzhal/ /skabs 'byed gzhi dang bral ba yi/ /mnyam med khyod la phyag
<p>72b.3</p>'tshal lo/ /zhes bshad pas so/ /de lta bu'i chos kyi sku ste chos kyi lus de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji lta bu su la zhe na/ rgyal ba rnams te shes bya ma lus pa thugs su chud pas thugs byin gyis brlabs pa la lus dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i don to/ /rang gi 'byor ba
<p>72b.4</p>ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan nyid do/ /khyad par ji lta bu zhe na/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ste 'jig rten las rgal ba'o/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni sems kyi yul las ring du gyur pa'o/ /legs mdzad brgya yi 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa la sogs pa
<p>72b.5</p>pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yun ring por nye bar bsags pa las skyes pa'o/ /gang gi zhe na/ blo can rnams kyi ste/ byams pa dang / mthong ba don yod dang / ngan song thams cad spong ba dang / mya ngan thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros la sogs pa'o/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga'
<p>72b.6</p>ba bskyed pa'i phyir te rab tu mgu ba'i rgyur ro/ /'khor ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs te de rnams kyi nang du'o/ /sna tshogs pa ni rnam pa du ma'o/ /rgyas par ston par mdzad pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa dag gi bsam pa'i khyad par gyi dbang du mdzad nas bye brag du
<p>72b.7</p>mar 'chad par mdzad pa'o/ /rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi sgra skad rgya chen 'jig rten kun du 'phro bar mdzad pa po/ /zhes bya ba ni shin tu rgya che ba'i dam pa'i chos kyi gsung ngo / /thams cad du 'jug pas na rgya che ba'o/ /de nyid kyis na de rgyun mi 'chad par spro bas na shin tu mang zhing rgya che
<p>73a</p>
<p>73a.1</p>ba la sogs pa'i dam pa'i chos ston cing gsung bar 'gyur ba de la de skad ces bya'o/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni chos kyi de kho na nyid ji lta ba bzhin du brnyes shing thugs su chud pa'o/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku zhes bya ba ni rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i sku ste/ sa bcu'i dbang phyug
<p>73a.2</p>gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i chos ston pa la sogs pas longs spyod par mdzad pa'o/ /de'i phyir khyad par gzhan yang chos kyi rgyal srid chen po la bzhugs pa gang yin zhes bya ba smos te/ chos kyi srid kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na chos kyi rgyal srid chen
<p>73a.3</p>po ste khams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag po'o/ /de la gnas pa'i sku gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o/ /de ltar tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis sku rnam pa gnyis po'i rang gi ngo bo nye bar bstan nas/ sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams ni smin par mdzad
<p>73a.4</p>phyir la la dag tu me 'bar bzhin du gang snang zhing / /zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ sems can rnams ni [(]srogs [,]srog [)]chags rnams so/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ smin par mdzad pa'i phyir te yongs su smin pa'i don du'o/ /gang gis dus la la dag tu me dang 'dra zhing byin za bzhin du kun nas 'bar
<p>73a.5</p>bar snang zhing 'od dang ldan pas rab tu 'bar bar snang ba'o/ /gnas gang du snang zhe na/ smras pa/ rdzogs par byang chub ces pa ste/ byang chub pa nyid du'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo ni bA rA Na sIr drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags su'o/ /rab tu zhi bar gang snang la/ /zhes pa ni gyad kyi nye 'khor
<p>73a.6</p>shing sA la zung gi tshal du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa'o/ /khyad par ci zhig ce na/ sna tshogs thabs tshul rnams kyis zhes bya ba ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / dbang phyug
<p>73a.7</p>chen po la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bdag nyid du ston pa'o/ /bye brag ji lta bu zhe na/ rnam pa du mar 'jug cing zhes pa ste/ gdul bya sna tshogs pa rnam pa du ma'i rjes su 'jug par mdzad pa'o/ /khyad par ci zhig ce na/ srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs sel zhes bya ba ste/ 'dod pa
<p>73b</p>
<p>73b.1</p>dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa ste srid pa gsum gyi sems can rnams kyi skye ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa ring du mdzad pa ni 'jigs pa sel ba'o/ /gzhan yang khyad par du bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcur chub mdzad thub pa rnams kyi sprul sku don chen zhes bya ste/ phyogs bcur chub par
<p>73b.2</p>mdzad pa ni phyogs bcu po rnams su rjes su khyab pa'o/ /thub pa ni sku dang gsung thub pa dang ldan pas na thub pa ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so/ /don chen ni mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i 'bras bu stsol ba'am thob par mdzad pa ste/ de lta bu'i sprul pa'i sku gang
<p>73b.3</p>yin pa de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes slob dpon klu sgrub kyis gsungs pa yin no/ /de ni 'di skad du ston par 'gyur te/ gang gis bdag nyid kyis bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas/ gnas kyi mchog dga' ldan gyi gzhal yas khang na bzhugs pa byang
<p>73b.4</p>chub sems dpa' dam pa tog dkar pos thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / bsam gtan bzhi bsgoms pa'i rim gyis rnal 'byor chen po'i gnas 'og min du mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'i rim pas yang dag par sangs
<p>73b.5</p>rgyas so/ /de nas sprul pa'i skus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus bzhugs pa dang / ri rab chen po'i steng du rdo rje nor bu rin po che'i gzhal yas khang gi rtse mor gshegs te/ dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhir mngon par sprul par mdzad nas/ slar yang
<p>73b.6</p>dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog tu bzhugs pa'i dam pa tog dkar po dang gcig tu gyur nas lhums su 'jug pa dang / bltams pa dang / btsun mo'i nang na rol pa mdzad par bstan pa dang / mtshan mo mngon par byung ba dang / dka' ba mdzad pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa
<p>73b.7</p>dang / bdud btul ba dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas ji srid du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar gyis 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don mdzad par rab tu ston pa'i sprul pa'i sku la bdag lus dang ngag dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i don to/ /
<p>74a</p>
<p>74a.1</p>de nyid kyi phyir na/ 'og min gnas ni nyams dga' bar/ /gtsang ma'i gnas kyi steng bzhugs te/ /yang dag sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas/ /sprul pa dag ni 'dir sangs rgyas/ /zhes bya ba gsungs pas so/ /de ltar tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis sku gsum bstan
<p>74a.2</p>nas/ gzhan yang smon lam byed par 'dod pa'i phyir sems can don gcig rgyun du mdzad cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ sems can gyi don ni srog chags rnams kyi 'dod pa'i don rab tu sgrub ces bya ba'i don yin pas na/ 'gro ba'i don gcig rgyun du mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni sems
<p>74a.3</p>can gyi don gcig rgyun du mdzad pa ste/ de lta bu'i sems can gyi don mdzad pa de la phyag byas pas zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /yon tan ji lta bu dang ldan zhe na/ bsod nams ye shes chen po dpag med las byung ba'i/ /zhes bya ba smos te/ bsod nams dang ye shes chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa
<p>74a.4</p>drug dang ldan pa'o/ /de yongs su chad pa med par bsags pa ni dpag tu med pa ste/ bsod nams dang ye shes chen po dpag tu med pa las byung ba ni de las skyes pa'o/ /de su zhig ce na/ bde bar gshegs pa ste mdzes par gshegs pa'am slar mi ldog par gshegs pa'i chos can
<p>74a.5</p>nyid yin pas na bde bar gshegs pa'o/ /yang na nyid kyi don mthar phyin pas na bde bar gshegs pa'o/ /rnams kyi sku gsum ni chos kyi sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sprul pa'i sku zhes bya ba'i sku gsum pa'o/ /de bas na de'i yon tan gyi khyad par ji lta zhe na/ yid dang
<p>74a.6</p>tshig gi lam las rab tu 'das pa zhes bya ba ste/ dmigs su yod pa'i yid kyi yul las shin tu 'das pa'i don to/ /de lta bur gyur pa la mos pa'i dad pas 'dud cing phyag byas pa las so/ /bdag gis dge ba byang chub sa bon zhes bya ba ni byang chub pa'i sa bon ni byang chub kyi sems
<p>74a.7</p>zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de bsgrubs shing bsags pa'o/ /des na de'i bsod nams kyi tshogs gang yin pa des chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sku gsum thob cing reg nas 'gro ba ma lus shing lhag ma med pa dag byang chub kyi lam la 'dzud pa ste/ byang
<p>74b</p>
<p>74b.1</p>chub pa'i lam ni byang chub lam ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i lam chen po de la rab tu 'dzud cing 'god par shog cig ces bya ba'i don to/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po mkhas shing yon tan phul byung spyod yul ba/ /shin tu nyams med rgya chen snying po don gyi tshogs sbas pa/ /bdag
<p>74b.2</p>gis 'dir ni lo 'dab rtse tsam blangs nas rnam bshad kyis/ /mchog tu mkhas shing don gyi rjes 'brang 'dir ni tshad ma yin/ /slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba ban+de
<p>74b.3</p>rin chen bzang pos gsar du bsgyur cing zhus pa lags so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ satwa A ra dA na sta baM / bod skad du/ sems can mgu bar bya ba'i bstod pa/ 'jam dpal dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nga la gus pa sems can don te gus pa gzhan
<p>74b.4</p>dag min/ /gang gis snying rje ma btang de yis nga la gus pa ste/ /snying rje btang nas gnas par gyur pa lhung ba gang yin pa/ /de ni de las snying rjes bslang bar nus kyi gzhan gyis min/ /gang gis snying rje sems can la ni rjes su zhugs gyur pa/ /des ni nga yang mnyes byas des ni bstan pa'i
<p>74b.5</p>khur yang bzung / /tshul khrims thos pa snying rje dag dang blo dang gsal ba dag /gang la yod pa des ni rtag tu bde bar gshegs pa mchod/ /nga nyid sems can phan 'dogs gyur pas grub 'di brnyes pa ste/ /sems can kho na'i don du nga yis sku 'di yang dag bzung / /sems can rnams
<p>74b.6</p>la yid kyis gnod par sems de gang gi phyir/ /nga la mi ltos pas na de'i don ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / sems can phan pa chung yang des ni mchod pa 'byung 'gyur te/ /gang gis yid ni mgu bar byed pa mchod pa yin pas so/ /gnod pa'i bdag nyid can nam gzhan la rnam par 'tshe ba'ang
<p>74b.7</p>rung / /legs par sbyar nas mchod par gyur kyang des ni mchod mi 'gyur/ /chung ma dag dang bu dang 'byor dang rgyal srid chen po dang / /sha rnams dang ni khrag dang tshil dang mig dang lus rnams kyang / /gang la brtse ba'i dbang du byas nas nga yis yongs btang ba/ /des na de la gnod pa byas
<p>75a</p>
<p>75a.1</p>na nga la gnod byas 'gyur/ /des na sems can phan pa byas na nga la mchod pa'i mchog /sems can gnod pa byas pa nga la shin tu gnod pa'i mchog /bde dang sdug bsngal nga dang sems can mtshungs par myong bas na/ /sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed de nga yi slob ma ji
<p>75a.2</p>ltar yin/ /sems can rnams la brten nas sangs rgyas mnyes dang dge ba byas/ /sems can mang po'i don la rab gnas pha rol phyin pa thob/ /sems can don la brtson pa'i yid kyis bdud kyi stobs kyang bcom/ /sems can rnams la de lta de ltar spyad pa des na nga sangs rgyas/ /
<p>75a.3</p>skye ba skye bar gces par gyur pa'i gnyen 'dra srog chags med gyur na/ /dngos po gang la 'dir ni snying rje byams las dmigs pa nges par 'grub/ /btang snyoms dga' ba la sogs dngos po'i yul dang rnam par thar la sogs gang la/ /gang gi don du snying rje de la 'bad pa'i yid
<p>75a.4</p>kyis bzod pa yun rings bsgoms/ /glang po la sogs 'gro ba sems can rnams nyid du ma nga yis sbyin pa byas/ /sems can rnams nyid snod nyid du yang nye bar gyur pas nga yis sbyin pas bsdus/ /sems can rnams nyid sna tshogs dngos por gyur pas nga yi snying rje 'phel
<p>75a.5</p>bar gyur/ /gal te sems can rnams nyid bsrung ma byas na gang gi don du don 'di bsgrubs/ /gal te sems can med na 'khor bar nyon mongs mi bzad rab tu mang po las/ /skye ba brgyud par gnod pa mtshungs pa med las gang la brten nas phan 'di bsgrubs/ /bde bar gshegs kyi
<p>75a.6</p>bdag nyid chen po ngo mtshar che ba 'khor ba'i rgyan gyur 'di/ /gal te nga la sems can rnams la brtse med gyur na gang gi don du nye bar bsgrubs/ /ji srid nga yi bstan pa 'gro ba rnams la phan pa 'dir ni 'bar gyur pa/ /de srid gzhan la mchog tu phan par 'dod pa khyed kyis gnas par
<p>75a.7</p>gyis/ /thos pas nga yis legs par spyad pa sems can don la mi skyo thos bgyid la/ /skyo ba med par lus 'di las ni snying po dag ni blang bar gyis/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ba tshwa'i chu klung zhes bya ba'i lung las bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po bcu drug la bka' stsal pa/
<p>75b</p>
<p>75b.1</p>sems can mgu bar bya ba'i bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas bsdus pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
<p>75b.2</p>@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA badzra d+ha ra sto tra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bstod pa/ phyags bcu nam mkha'i mthas klas pa na bzhugs pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / rdo rje lha mo dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo'i rgyal po la sogs pa rnams
<p>75b.3</p>la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bya chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod par gyur to/ /kun rdzob bden pa la phyag 'tshal/ /don dam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bden gnyis dbyer med la phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje'i sku
<p>75b.4</p>khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs ni dag /sku ni gdod nas nam mkha'i sku/ /rnam par mi rtog dmigs pa med/ /rang bzhin med pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /dge dang mi dge'i rnam rtog dang / /yid la byed dang sems pa med/ /rang bzhin gyis ni nam mkha'i tshul/ /
<p>75b.5</p>rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /'khor ba'i sgrub pas 'khor gyur pa'i/ /phung po lnga ni rnam par dag /sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bo nyid/ /nam mkhar gnas pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /yongs su mi shes 'khor ba yi/ /rgya mtshor 'khyams pa'i lus can phyir/ /yongs shes skya ba
<p>75b.6</p>'dzin pa yi/ /ded dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtag dang mi rtag sogs rnams la/ /rtag dang mi rtags sogs rnams kyis/ /rnam dag lam ston la mkhas pa/ /rdo rje slob dpon khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rang gi sde dang gzhan gyi sde/ /lta ba'i rims kyis btab pa yi/ /nad pa rnams
<p>75b.7</p>ni gso mdzad pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sna tshogs rnam par rtog pa yi/ /'dam gyis ma gos gtsang ba'i sku/ /'od gsal bar ni ngang gis gnas/ /pad+ma chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /zhes pa nam mkha' chen po'i rgyud las 'byung ba/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bstod pa/ phyag na
<p>76a</p>
<p>76a.1</p>rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rje btsun gnas brtan chen po dpal rdo rje 'chang gi sku can spyan snga nas kyi bka' bzhin zha lu lo tsA ba d+harma pA las dpal gdan sa thel gyi yang dgon du bsgyur ba'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ 
<p>76a.2</p>pra dz+nyA pA ra mi ta sto traM / bod skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang khyod sku kun nyes med la/ /nyes med rnams kyis gzigs mdzad pa/ /dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin/ /rnam par
<p>76a.3</p>mi rtog phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /nam mkha' bzhin du gos med cing / /spros pa med cing yi ge med/ /bsam yas khyod mthong gang yin pa/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong / /'phags ma yon tan phyug khyod dang / /sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i bla ma rnams/ /khyad par yod par ma
<p>76a.4</p>'khums te/ /zla ba dang ni zla 'od bzhin/ /gus la byams ma sangs rgyas kyi/ /chos kyi sngon 'gro khyod brtan nas/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid mnyam med pa'i/ /bdag nyid chen por bde blag 'gro/ /lan cig tsam yang bsam dag pas/ /khyod la tshul bzhin blta ba dang / /des kyang mthong
<p>76a.5</p>ba don yod kyi/ /dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur/ /gzhan don mngon dga'i bdag nyid can/ /dpa' bo dag ni thams cad kyi/ /gso mdzad bskyed par mdzad pa ste/ /khyod ni byams ma'i yum lags so/ /gang slad sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso/ /thugs rje can rnams khyod kyi sras/ /
<p>76a.6</p>de yi slad du dge ma khyod/ /sems can kun gyi phyi mo lags/ /pha rol phyin pa dri med pa/ /kun gyis ma smad pa khyod kyi/ /dus kun rjes su 'brang lags pa/ /rgyu skar rnams kyis zla ris bzhin/ /gdul bya'i 'gro ba la brten nas/ /de dang de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /khyod nyid
<p>76a.7</p>gcig pu tshul mang du/ /sna tshogs mtshan gyis bsngags pa mdzad/ /zil pa'i chu yi thigs pa rnams/ /nyi ma'i 'od dang mjal ba bzhin/ /rgol ba rnams kyi rtsod dang skyon/ /khyod dang mjal na 'jig par 'gyur/ /khyod nyid byis pa rnams la ni/ /skrag byed mthong na 'jigs pa dang / /
<p>76b</p>
<p>76b.1</p>mkhas pa rnams la dbugs 'byin pa/ /skyed pas mthong na zhi ba lags/ /khyod mgon gang la khyod la yang / /mngon par chags pa mnga' min na/ /de la yum gcig ji ltar na/ /gzhan la 'dod chags zhe sdang 'byung / /khyod ni gang nas ma byon zhing / /gang du yang ni mi gshegs
<p>76b.2</p>pas/ /gnas ni thams cad dag tu yang / /mkhas pa rnams kyis dmigs ma lags/ /gang khyod de ltar ma 'khums nas/ /bsam pa yis ni bsgrubs pa dang / /bsgrubs pa las ni rnam grol ba/ /de 'dir rmad byung chen po lags/ /khyod nyid mthong na 'ching 'gyur zhing / /ma mthong
<p>76b.3</p>na yang 'ching bar 'gyur/ /khyod nyid mthong na grol 'gyur zhing / /ma mthong na yang grol bar 'gyur/ /e ma ya mtshan cher 'ong ma/ /grags ldan ma khyod bzang mo lags/ /shin tu rtogs dka' sgyu ma bzhin/ /snang zhing mi snang ba yang lags/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /
<p>76b.4</p>nyan thos rnams kyis nges bsten ma/ /khyod nyid gcig pu thar pa'i lam/ /de ltar gzhan dag med par nges/ /lus can rnams la phan don du/ /tha snyad mdun du mdzad nas ni/ /brtse bas 'jig rten mgon rnams kyis/ /khyod bstan ma bstan par yang gda'/ /'dir khyod bstod
<p>76b.5</p>par sus rngo thogs / /mtshan ma med cing gos pa med/ /ngag gi yul kun las 'das ma/ /gang khyod 'gar yang rten mi mnga'/ /de ltar gda' yang kun rdzob tu/ /bdag cag ngag lam 'di 'dra bas/ /khyod ni bstod byar mi gda' na'ang / /bstod pas shin tu mya ngan 'das/ /shes
<p>76b.6</p>rab pha rol phyin bstod las/ /bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa/ /de yis 'jig rten ma lus pa/ /shes rab pha rol phyin gzhol shog /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //kha che'i paN+Di ta thig le bum pa
<p>76b.7</p>dang / lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ a tsin+ta sta baM / bod skad du/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig dngos po rten 'byung rnams/ /ngo bo med pa
<p>77a</p>
<p>77a.1</p>nyid du gsungs/ /ye shes mnyam med bsam mi khyab/ /dpe med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar khyod kyis theg chen la/ /nyid kyis chos la bdag med rtogs/ /de bzhin blo dang ldan rnams la/ /thugs rje'i dbang gis bstan pa mdzad/ /rkyen rnams las ni
<p>77a.2</p>'brel 'byung ba/ /ma skyes lags par khyod kyis gsungs/ /nga bo nyid kyis de ma skyes/ /de phyir stong par rab tu bstan/ /ji ltar 'di na sgra brten nas/ /brag ca kun du 'byung ba ltar/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin du yang / /de bzhin srid pa kun du 'byung / /sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang / /
<p>77a.3</p>dri za'i grong khyer gzugs brnyan dang / /rmi lam gal te ma skyes na/ /mthong ba la sogs dpe med 'gyur/ /ji ltar rgyu rkyen las byung ba/ /de dag byas pa can du bzhed/ /de bzhin rkyen las byung ba kun/ /mgon po khyod kyis de ltar gsungs / /byis pa gang dag ci brjod pa/ /bgyis
<p>77a.4</p>pa zhes bgyid de mchis te/ /chad pa stong pa 'dra ba lags/ /don bzhin ma lags rab tu bstan/ /gang tshe byas pa'i dngos ma skyes/ /de tshe da ltar byung ba yi/ gang zhig pas na 'das par 'gyur/ /ma 'ongs pa yang ji ltar ltos/ /rang las dngos pa skye ba med/ /gzhan
<p>77a.5</p>dang gnyis ka las ma yin/ /yod yin med min yod med min/ /de tshe gang las gzhan zhig 'byung / /ma skyes pa la rang bzhin med/ /de phyir gang las kun du 'byung / /rang bzhin dngos po med grub pas/ /gzhan las kyang ni 'byung ba med/ /rang nyid yod na gzhan yod 'gyur/ /
<p>77a.6</p>gzhan nyid yod na rang nyid yod/ /de dag ltos pa can du grub/ /pha rol tshu rol bzhin du gsungs/ /gang tshe ci la'ang mi ltos pa/ /de tshe gang la gang zhig 'byung / /gang tshe ring la mi ltos pa/ /de tshe thung sogs ga la mchis/ /ji ltar gcig sogs ma mchis pa/ /'das dang ma 'ongs
<p>77a.7</p>la sogs pa/ /nyon mongs rnams kyang de bzhin te/ /yang dag log pa'ang rang las ci/ /dngos gang rang las ma mchis na/ /de tshe thams cad ci zhig mchis/ /gzhan zhes brjod pa gang lags te/ /rang gi rang bzhin med na min/ /gang tshe gzhan gyi dngos med pa/ /de tshe
<p>77b</p>
<p>77b.1</p>dngos rnams rang bzhin med/ /de tshe gzhan dngos dngos 'dzin pa/ /don gyi theg pa ci zhig mchis/ /gdod ma nyid nas mnyam gyur pa/ /rang bzhin gyis kyang mya ngan 'das/ /yang dag par ni ma skyes lags/ /de slad chos rnams khyod kyis gsungs/ /blo ldan khyod kyis
<p>77b.2</p>gzugs la sogs/ /ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa/ /dbu ba chu bur sgyu la sogs/ /smig rgyu chu shing 'dra ba lags/ /dbang po rnams kyis gang dmigs de/ /gal te yang dag mchis gyur na/ /byis pas yang dag rig par 'gyur/ /gang tshe yang dag shes pas ci/ /
<p>77b.3</p>dbang po rnams ni bems po dang / /tshad ma nyid kyang ma yin dang / /lung ma bstan pa nyid dang ni/ /log par yongs shes khyod kyis gsungs/ /gang gis ci zhig ma rtogs pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin thugs chud nas/ /des na 'jig rten mi shes pas/ /bsgribs pa zhes kyang
<p>77b.4</p>khyod kyis gsungs/ /yod ces pa ni rtag par lta/ /med ces pa ni chad par lta/ /des na mtha' gnyis bral ba yi/ /chos de khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad/ /des na chos rnams mu bzhi dang / /bral bar khyod kyis bka' stsal lags/ /rnam shes bya ba'ang ma lags la/ /rmi
<p>77b.5</p>lam mig 'phrul las byung dang / /zla gnyis la sogs mthong ba bzhin/ /'gro ba 'byung ba de dngos su/ /ma byung de bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /ji ltar rgyu las rmi lam na/ /'byung ba mthong ba de bzhin du/ /dngos po thams cad 'byung ba bzhin/ /'jig pa'ang de bzhin bzhed
<p>77b.6</p>pa lags/ /de bzhin chags sogs sdug bsngal dang / /'khor ba sdug bsngal kun nyon mongs/ /tshogs rdzogs pa dang thar pa yang / /rmi lam 'dra bar khyod kyis gsungs/ /de bzhin skyes dang ma skyes dang / /'ongs pa dang ni song ba yang / /de bzhin bcings grol ye shes
<p>77b.7</p>la/ /gnyis 'dod yang dag rig ma lags/ /gang las skyes pa yod ma lags/ /de la mya ngan 'das gang yod/ /sgyu ma'i glang po 'dra bas na/ /don du gzod nas zhi ba nyid/ /skyes pa nyid na'ang ma skyes pa/ /sgyu ma'i glang po ji bzhin bzhed/ /de bzhin thams cad skyes
<p>78a</p>
<p>78a.1</p>pa'am/ /yang dag par ni ma skyes lags/ /'jig rten mgon po dpag med kyis/ /sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa/ /so sor mya ngan 'das mdzad kyang / /de dag gis kyang gang ma bkrol/ /thub chen gang phyir sems can rnams/ /rang las ma skyes de yi
<p>78a.2</p>phyir/ /gang yang gang gis ma bkrol zhes/ /de skad khyod kyis gsal bar gsungs/ /ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis byas/ /dngos po stong pa de bzhin du/ /byas pa thams cad dngos stong gzhan/ /khyod gsung de bzhin byed pa po/ /byed pa po yang gzhan gyis bgyis/ /byas
<p>78a.3</p>pa can du 'gyur ba lags/ /yang na de yi bya ba byed/ /byed pa por ni thal bar 'gyur/ /'di dag thams cad ming tsam zhes/ /khyod kyis gsang ni bstod de gsungs/ /brjod pa las ni gzhan gyur pa/ /brjod par bgyi ba yod ma mchis/ /de phyir chos rnams thams cad ni/ /
<p>78a.4</p>rtog pa tsam zhes khyod kyis gsungs/ /gang gis stong par rnam rtog pa'i/ /rtog pa yang ni med ces gsungs/ /dngos dang dngos med gnyis 'das pa/ /la lar ma 'das pa yang lags/ /shes pa med cing shes bya'ang med/ /med min yod min gang lags dang / /gang
<p>78a.5</p>yang gcig min du ma'ang min/ /gnyis ka ma yin ci yang med/ /gzhi med pa dang mi gsal dang / /bsam mi khyab dang dpe med dang / /gang yang mi skye mi 'gag dang / /chad pa med cing rtag med pa/ /de ni nam mkha' 'dra ba lags/ /yi ge ye shes spyod yul min/ /de ni rten
<p>78a.6</p>cing 'brel par 'byung / /de ni stong par khyod bzhed lags/ /dam pa'i chos kyang de lta bu/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dang mtshungs/ /de ni de nyid don dang ni/ /de bzhin nyid dang rdzas su bzhed/ /de ni yang dag mi slu ba/ /de rdzogs pas na sangs rgyas brjod/ /sangs
<p>78a.7</p>rgyas rnams dang chos dbyings dang / /des na don du tha mi dad/ /bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams dang / /des na mnyam par khyod bzhed lags/ /dngos po rnams las stong gzhan min/ /de med par yang dngos po med/ /de phyir rten cing 'byung ba'i dngos/ /stong pa lags par
<p>78b</p>
<p>78b.1</p>khyod kyis bstan/ /rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'ang lags/ /gzhan gyi dbang las kun rdzob ste/ /gzhan gyi dbang zhes rab tu gsungs/ /dam pa'i don ni bcos ma yin/ /ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin dang / /yang dag rdzas dngos yod pa'ang lags/ /brtags pa'i dngos po med pa nyid/ /
<p>78b.2</p>gzhan gyi dbang ni yod ma lags/ /brtags pa'i dngos po yod ces pa/ /sgro 'dogs lags par khyod kyis gsungs/ /byas pa chad nas med ces pa/ /chad pa lags par khyod kyis gsungs/ /yang dag shes pas chad pa med/ /rtag pa nyid kyang med par bshad/ /'gro ba
<p>78b.3</p>dngos pos stong pa lags/ /de slad smig rgyu 'dra bar bzhed/ /ji ltar ri dgas skom chu ni/ /chad med rtag pa yod ma yin/ /de bzhin 'gro ba thams cad kyang / /chad med rtag pa med par gsungs/ /gang la rdzas shig skye 'gyur ba/ /de la chad sogs 'jig pa 'byung / /de la
<p>78b.4</p>'jig rten mtha' yod dang / /mtha' med par yang 'gyur ba lags/ /shes pa yod pas shes bya bzhin/ /shes bya yod pas de shes bzhin/ /gang tshe gnyis ka ma skyes par/ /rtogs pa de tshe ci zhig yod/ /de ltar sgyu ma la sogs dpe/ /sman pa'i mchog gis gsal bstan
<p>78b.5</p>nas/ /lta ba thams cad 'gog byed pa'i/ /dam pa'i chos ni bstan pa lags/ /ngo bo med pa nyid bstan pa/ /de ni yang dag dam pa lags/ /dngos po'i gdon gyis zin rnams kyis / /gso ba de ni bla na med/ /des na chos kyi mchod sbyin pa/ /mchod sbyin rim pas rtag rgyun du/ /
<p>78b.6</p>'jig rten gsum po sbyin sreg mdzad/ /dngos 'dzin 'jigs pa gcod bgyid cing / /mu stegs ri dgas 'jigs bgyid pa/ /bdag med seng ge'i nga ro'i sgra/ /rmad byung de ni khyod kyis gsungs/ /stong pa nyid dang ches zab pa'i/ /chos kyi rnga chen brdungs pa lags/ /ngo bo
<p>78b.7</p>nyid med sgra bo che'i/ /chos kyi dung ni bus pa lags/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bdud rtsi yi/ /chos kyi rdzas ni gsungs pa lags/ /chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid/ /nges pa'i don to zhes kyang bstan/ /gang yang skye dang 'gag la sogs/ /sems can srog la sogs bstan pa/ /
<p>79a</p>
<p>79a.1</p>de ni bkri don kun rdzob tu/ /mgon po khyod kyis bstan pa lags/ /shes rab pha rol phyin mtsho yi/ /pha rol gang gis rang phyin te/ /bsod nams yon tan rin chen phyug/ /mgon khyod yon tan pha rol phyin/ /de ltar dpe med bsam mi khyab/ /'gro ba'i mgon po bstod
<p>79a.2</p>pa yis/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang thob des/ /'gro ba khyod dang mtshungs par shog /bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ru ta sti sta baM / bod skad du/ bstod
<p>79a.3</p>pa las 'das par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla med lam las gshegs pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bstod 'das kyang / /gus shing spro ba'i sems kyis ni/ /bdag gis bstod 'das bstod par bgyi / /bdag dang gzhan dang
<p>79a.4</p>gnyis ka las/ /rnam par dben pa'i dngos gzigs kyang / /khyod kyi thugs rje sems can las/ /ma log pa ni ngo mtshar lags/ /ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes shing / /tshig las 'das pa'i spyod yul gyi/ /chos rnams khyod kyis gang bstan pa/ /de ni khyod kyi ngo mtshar lags/ /
<p>79a.5</p>phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/ /khyod kyis bsgrags par mdzad lags kyang / /de dag yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ /slad kyis kyang ni bzlog par mdzad/ /gang zhig rkyen las de ma mchis/ /dngos rnams rkyen las ji ltar skye/ /de skad mkhas pa khyod gsungs pas/ /spros
<p>79a.6</p>pa rnams ni bcad pa lags/ /gang dag tshogs las rab grub na/ /tshogs pa rgyu las 'byung mthong ba/ /de dag mtha' gnyis brten par ni/ /khyod kyis shin tu gzigs pa lags/ /dngos po rkyen la brten grub par/ /khyod ni shin tu bzhed pa lags/ /de ltar byas pa'i skyon lags
<p>79a.7</p>par/ /'di ltar ston pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /gang nas kyang ni mchi ma lags/ /gang du yang ni mchis ma lags/ /dngos po thams cad gzugs brnyan dang / /mtshungs par khyed ni bzhed pa lags/ /lta ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ /mgon po khyod kyis stong pa gsungs/ /
<p>79b</p>
<p>79b.1</p>de yang yongs su btags pa ste/ /dngos su mgon po khyod mi bzhed/ /stong dang mi stong bzhed ma lags/ /gnyis kar khyod dgyes ma lags te/ /de la rtsod pa ma mchis par/ /khyod kyis gsung chen spyod pa lags/ /gzhan min dngos po yod min zhing / /gzhan min gnyis min
<p>79b.2</p>zhes kyang gsungs/ /gcig dang gzhan nyid spangs pas na/ /ji lta bur yang dngos ma mchis/ /gal te skye sogs gsum mchis na/ /'dus byas mtshan nyid mchis par 'gyur/ /de dag gi yang skye la sogs/ /gsum pa tha dad 'gyur ba lags/ /skye sogs gsum po so so ni/ /
<p>79b.3</p>'dus byas las la nus ma lags/ /gcig la gcig tu 'dus pa rnams/ /phrad par yang ni mchis ma lags/ /de ltar mtshan gzhi mtshan ma mchis/ /de ltar grub pa ma lags pas/ /'dus byas grub pa ma lags na/ /'dus ma byas lta ga la grub/ /smra ba'i seng ges de skad
<p>79b.4</p>du/ /khyod nyid gsungs na seng ge yis/ /'bigs byed glang chen smra rnams kyi/ /rgyags pa bsal bar gyur pa bzhin/ /lam zhugs gnod pa sna tshogs dang / /lta ba'i lam ngan mi rten ltar/ /khyod la brten nas yod pa dang / /med pa nyid la'ang rten ma lags/ /khyod kyis dgongs
<p>79b.5</p>nas gsungs pa dang / /gang dag gis ni de ltar rtogs/ /de dag khyod kyis dgongs gsungs pa/ /phyir zhing rtogs par bgyi mi 'tshal/ /dngos kun mya ngan 'das mtshungs par/ /de ltar gang gis rnam shes pa/ /de tshe de la ji lta bur/ /ngar 'dzin kun du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de ltar
<p>79b.6</p>yang dag rig pa'i mchog /de nyid rig pa khyod bstod pa'i/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang yin des/ /'jig rten yang dag rig mchog shog /bstod pa las 'das par bstod pa slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
<p>79b.7\]#]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ni rut+ta sta baM / bod skad du/ bla na med pa'i bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis tshu rol pha rol spangs/ /shes bya'i rang gi ngo bo mchog /ye shes rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis bsal / /bla med de la phyag 'tshal
<p>80a</p>
<p>80a.1</p>bstod/ /gang la mkhyen dang mi mkhyen med/ /rnal 'byor pa dang tha mal dang / /gang la bsgom dang mi bsgom med/ /bla med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig gcig pu ye shes gsal/ /ma lus shes bya yongs su gcod/ /de ltar mnyam zhing gzhal med pa/ /
<p>80a.2</p>bla med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig rags dang phra ba dang / /lci ba dang ni yang ba'i rdul/ /sbrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin med/ /bla med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis srin bu'i stobs kyis ni/ /gang zhig thang la mchi ba ltar/ /gang gis snang bas mun bsal ba/ /bla
<p>80a.3</p>med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sprul ldan rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /gar mkhan rkang pa bskyod pa la/ /gang gis lam gzigs lam mkhyen pa/ /bla med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig gis ni cha shas dang / /don stong min te gnyis ka spangs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa dbang
<p>80a.4</p>phyug gtso/ /bla med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin tu nyes pa rnam spangs shing / /dri ma'i bdag nyid las ring ba/ /dngos dang dngos po med spangs pa/ /bla med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla na med pa'i bstod pa slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
<p>80a.5\]#]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+haT+wA ra ka many+dzu shrI pa ra ma ar+tha stu ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byon pa ma lags bzhud mi mnga'/ /bzhengs pa ma lags
<p>80a.6</p>bzhugs mi mnga'/ /'jig rten pa las shin tu 'das/ /tshig las 'das pa'i spyod yul lags/ /mgon po khyod la ji ltar bstod/ /'on kyang 'jig rten btags rten gyis/ /khyod ni ci 'dra de bzhin du/ /bdag gis gus pas bla ma bstod/ /ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes te/ /khyod
<p>80a.7</p>la skye ba yong mi mnga'/ /mgon po gshegs dang byon mi mnga'/ /dngos med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khyod la dngos dang dngos med min/ /chad pa ma lags ther zug min/ /khyod rtag ma lags mi rtag min/ /gnyis med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dmar dang ljang dang le
<p>80b</p>
<p>80b.1</p>brgan dang / /ser dang dkar dang gnag ma lags/ /khyod la kha dog yong mi mnga'/ /mdog bral khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khyod ni che dang chung ba dang / /sbom dang phra ba khyod min te/ /ring dang thung ba'i khams ma lags/ /tshad med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /shes pas
<p>80b.2</p>srid la mi gnas shing / /snying rjes zhi la mi gnas te/ /mya ngan 'das dang 'khor mi gnas/ /mi gnas khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /chos rnams kun la mi gnas shing / /chos kun rtogs par thugs su chud/ /mchog tu zab pa nyid brten pa/ /zab pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de
<p>80b.3</p>ltar bstod na bstod bgrang gi/ /gzhan du khyod la ji ltar bstod/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa la/ /su la bstod cing su yis bstod/ /mtha' ma mchis shing dbus ma mchis/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'i/ /rtog bral khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bla ma
<p>80b.4</p>mgon po 'jam dbyangs kyi/ /don dam yang dag mtshan brjod pa'i/ /bsod nams 'di yis 'jig rten 'di/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'dra bar shog /'phags pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa
<p>80b.5</p>rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI b+haT+TA ra ka kA ru Na sto tra/ bod skad du/ rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyes pa ma lus pa rnams rab bsal zhing / /
<p>80b.6</p>thub pa'i grags pas 'gro ba ma lus khyab/ /dpal ldan rab tu brtan pa'i sku mnga' ba/ /dpal ldan khyed la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /bos shing bos shing 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /phongs pa 'di dag kun las khyed skyob mdzad/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur kyang dman khyed ces/ /ci
<p>80b.7</p>yi phyir na nges par sel mi mdzad/ /bcom ldan khyod ni rtag par thams cad la/ /rnam pa kun du thams cad gsol grag na/ /bdag la mthong ba tsam yang ma stsal bas/ /de phyir bdag ni shin tu skal dman lags/ /yon tan ldan zhing nyes pa sel mdzad pa/ /blo bzang 'gro
<p>81a</p>
<p>81a.1</p>kun skyob par brtson gyur na/ /bdag blo khyed la mngon du zhen na yang / /phongs pas gdungs pa nyid du ci phyir 'gyur/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid ldan pa khyed kyi ni/ /pad+ma lta bu dag pa'i spyan gnyis kyis/ /'gro ba phan par mdzad kyang bdag sdug par/ /ma gzigs pa ni
<p>81a.2</p>kyai ma sdug bsngal lo/ /khyed kyis yid 'jigs dbugs 'byin mdzad pa yi/ /phyag gi pad+ma ring du rtag rkyong yang / /skal nyes pa yi tsha bas de yang ni/ /thag ring du ni mi snang nyid du 'gyur/ /khyed kyi snyan ni ma nyams gtsang ba dag /gnyis kyis kyang ni lus la sdug bsngal gyis/ /gzir
<p>81a.3</p>te spyan sngar 'o dod 'bod gyur kyang / /bdag gi dman pa ci phyir gsan ma gyur/ /rnam pa kun du thugs rjes drangs khyed kyis/ /dmyal bar song ba'i 'gro rigs bde mdzad na/ /sdig can bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ /thugs rje de yang brtse ba mi mnga' gyur / /'jig rten dman la
<p>81a.4</p>phan par mdzad pa yi/ /khyod la gzhon nu'i rol pa 'di mnga' na/ /gang 'dir bdag ni sdug bsngal gyis gzir kyang / /bskyab par mi mdzad sdig can bsam pas nyes/ /'di na sdug bsngal can ni gang yin zhes/ /glen gang gang gis phun tshogs zad gyur ces/ /de ltar rnam par rgyu zhing skyob
<p>81a.5</p>mdzad kyang / /bdag phongs ma gzigs kye ma ngo mtshar che/ /gang zhig la ni tshig sbyin gang zhig la/ /'phral du phun tshogs rgya chen sbyin bya zhes/ /de ltar brtson pa khyed kyi mkhyen rab kyis/ /ci yi phyir na bdag la skyob mi mdzad/ /khyed la dad par gyur pa su mi bde/ /khyed dang bsod nams
