<p>101b.7</p>zer rnam par 'phro/ /gser dang nor bu chu shel lta bur mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba'i sku/ /dri med nyi ma dbang po'i gzhu 'dra bcom ldan g.yas phyogs gshegs pa'i sku/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i zhabs brtan yang dag brtson 'grus mdzes pa'i snam logs can/ /bcom
<p>102a</p>
<p>102a.1</p>ldan seng ge mchod byas lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos phyag byas zhabs/ /bdud kyi bu mos zur mig blta bas gang zhig mi g.yo ting 'dzin ri ltar brtan/ /dpa' bo'i mtshon gyis mi bsnyil cod pan gyis gtugs dbang chen rnams la mgos phyag
<p>102a.2</p>'tshal/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis mngon par bstod pa bgyis pa las/ /bdag gis dge ba gang bsags des ni 'gro kun sangs rgyas myur 'grub shog/ //yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa snyan dngags mkhan chen po
<p>102a.3</p>slob dpon ma ti tsi Tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ e kot+ta ri ga sta ba/ bod skad du/ gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos gcig la ni mngon dgyes shing / /nags su gcig
<p>102a.4</p>pur bzhugs pa dang / /'jig rten rnams kyi mig gcig gyur/ /'jig rten mig gcig phyag 'tshal lo/ /rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gyur pa/ /bden pa gnyis ni rnam par bsgoms/ /grogs gnyis pa ni mi mnga' ba/ /gnyis med gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting
<p>102a.5</p>'dzin gsum dang ldan pa dang / /dkon mchog gsum po cha mnyam zhing / /sdug bsngal gsum gyi chu las rgal/ /'jig rten gsum 'tsho phyag 'tshal lo/ /bstan pa rnam pa bzhi po dang / /bsam gtan bzhi yi rnam pa can/ /sbyor ba bzhi dang rnam bral ba/ /bden
<p>102a.6</p>bzhi mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phung po lnga yi chags bral zhing / /dbang po lnga ni rnam par bsgoms/ /yan lag lnga dang rnam bral ba/ /'gro lnga gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang drug chu bo la gnas shing / /rgyun drug la ni rnam par gnas/ /pha rol phyin drug yongs su
<p>102a.7</p>rdzogs/ /mngon shes drug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub yan lag rin chen bdun/ /'phags pa'i nor bdun stsol ba po/ /yan lag bdun dang rnam bral ba/ /srid bdun gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yan lag brgyad las byung ba yi/ /gang zag brgyad ni ston mdzad cing / /
<p>102b</p>
<p>102b.1</p>'jig rten chos brgyad spangs pa po/ /mi khom brgyad 'joms phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas dgu'i chags las rnam grol zhing / /khong khro dgu ni rnam par spangs/ /shin tu sbyangs pa dgu brnyes pa/ /sa dgu mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun bcu chos
<p>102b.2</p>can/ /sgrib pa bcu ni gcod par mdzad/ /'phags pa'i gnas bcu la dgyes pa/ /stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar 'phags pa stobs bcu ldan la tshig gis mchod pa'i phyir/ /bstod pas der ni bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang thob pa/ /des 'dir dmyal
<p>102b.3</p>dang yi dgas dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal gyis khyab pa'i/ /'gro ba srid pa'i rgya mtsho las ni rgal ba'i rgyur gyur cig /gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa slob dpon ma ti tsi Tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ su ga ta pany+tsa triM sha ta rat+na nA ma mA la
<p>102b.4</p>sto traM/ bod skad du/ bde bar gshegs pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i bstod pa mtshan rin po ches spras pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyobs pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsum la rtag tu
<p>102b.5</p>skyabs su mchi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gdul dka' ba/ /snyigs ma lnga yi rtsod dus 'dir/ /brtson 'grus drag pos sangs rgyas pa/ /shAkya thub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /snying po byang chub mchog brnyes pa/ /bdud dpung rdo rje snying po yis/ /
<p>102b.6</p>rab tu 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen sku las 'od 'phros pas/ /ngan song sdug bsngal zhi mdzad cing / /bdud rnams rnam par skrag mdzad pa/ /rin chen 'od 'phro phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar klu chen dbang po yis/ /gling rnams char gyis tshim byed ltar/ /stong gsum
<p>102b.7</p>chos kyi char 'bebs pa/ /klu dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo khyod kyi bstan pa 'dis/ /bdud dang mu stegs skrag mdzad cing / /gdul bya kun mkhyen 'god mdzad pa'i/ /dpa' bo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rjes gzhan don rab bsgoms pas/ /nyid kyi
<p>103a</p>
<p>103a.1</p>sku srog gtong ba la/ /'gums pa sos ltar rab dgyes pa/ /dpal dgyes la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkhas pa rnams la don snang mdzad/ /bar ma'i rgyud rnams smin mdzad cing / /tha ma'i nyon mongs sreg mdzad pa/ /rin chen me la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>103a.2</p>sangs rgyas kun dang skal pa mnyam/ /chos kyi shes rab snang ba yis/ /phyogs rnams snang bar mdzad de 'khrungs/ /rin chen zla 'od phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku ni blta bas mi ngoms shing / /'dom gang 'od kyis sa le ba/ /gang gis khyod mthong skal ldan pas/ /mthong ba don
<p>103a.3</p>yod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku gsung thugs ni rin chen mchog /dri med spros bral sangs rgyas pas/ /'gro kun nyon mongs gdung ba sel/ /rin chen zla ba phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam chos dri ma med pa'i chus/ /thog mar bdag nyid dag mdzad nas/ /gzhan dag mchog tu dag mdzad
<p>103a.4</p>pa/ /dri med dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsod nams byas pa'i tshogs dag ni/ /sems can kun la yongs bsngo bar/ /thub pa khyod kyis ston mdzad pa/ /dpal sbyin la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig dang zhabs su ldan pa po/ /tshangs pa lags par bram zes bzhed/ /
<p>103a.5</p>rig dang zhabs de khyed la mnga'/ /tshangs pa'i mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa'i zhabs bzhi rab bsgoms shing / /tshangs spyod 'bras bu mchog brnyes pa/ /tshangs pas 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /tshangs pas byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs ni dka'
<p>103a.6</p>thub brtul zhugs dag /yang dag blangs pa gtsang mar mdzad/ /nyon mongs sdig pa 'khrud mdzad pa/ /chu yi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten pa dag bde byed mchod/ /bde byed klu chen ma dros mchod/ /chu lha des kyang khyod mchod pas/ /chu lha'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dren
<p>103a.7</p>pa kun gyis mchod gyur cing / /khyod ni mtshungs med rab zhi bas/ /'gro ba kun gyi dpal mdzad pa/ /dpal bzangs la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod la rgol ba'i nyon mongs pa/ /do gal byed pa thams cad kyang / /tsan+dan spangs pa ltar bsil mdzad/ /tsan+dan dpal
<p>103b</p>
<p>103b.1</p>la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i dpal dang gzi brjid ni/ /sus kyang 'gran par mi bzod de/ /mig gis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /gzi brjid mtha' yas phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa'i 'od zer rab byung bas/ /nga rgyal khengs pa zhi mdzad cing / /dman rnams spro
<p>103b.2</p>ba bskyed par mdzad/ /'od dpal la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma mya ngan 'das pa zhi/ /khyed 'dra thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ /mnga' brnyes pa yang bde gshegs pas/ /mya ngan med dpal phyag 'tshal lo/ /sred pa med pa goms mdzad cing / /'dren pa kun gyi
<p>103b.3</p>mchog gyur pa/ /stobs chen thams cad zil gnon pa/ /sred med bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pas/ /mdzes pa gzhan kun zil gyis gnon/ /mtshan dang dpe byad rab rgyas pa/ /me tog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang 'od
<p>103b.4</p>zer gyis/ /'jig rten thams cad khyab mdzad pa/ /tshangs pa'i 'od zer rnam par rol/ /mngon par mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'od kyis gang la reg pa yang / /tshags med bde ba rab rgyas pas/ /pad+ma'i 'od zer rnam par rol/ /mngon par mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>103b.5</p>thub pa'i bsod nams 'od zer gyis/ /'gro rnams zang zing tshim mdzad pa/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i nor sbyin pa/ /nor dpal la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /dran pa rnams la mnga' brnyes pas/ /thogs pa med cing rab mkhyen pa/ /gang gis khyod dran phongs sel bas/ /dran
<p>103b.6</p>pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /snyan pa'i ba dan sa gsum grags/ /yon tan grangs med mtshan gyi dpal/ /shin tu yongs bsgrags phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs dang dbang po mchog brnyes pas/ /nag po'i phyogs rnams phan mdzad de/ /
<p>103b.7</p>dbang po'i spyi btud dbang po'i tog /rgyal mtshan rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos por sgrogs pa'i tog gi pa/ /phra zhib ye shes rdo rje yis/ /seng ges glang po ji bzhin du/ /shin tu rnam gnon phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gzhan nyon mongs sde bcom pas/ /khyed las dpa'
<p>104a</p>
<p>104a.1</p>mchog gzhan ma mchis/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug g.yul las rgyal/ /shin tu rnam rgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam chen du/ /'gro kun ded dpon rab mdzad de/ /bdud dang ngan song 'jigs las sgrol/ /rnam par gnon
<p>104a.2</p>gshegs phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul rmad byung bas/ /sprul pa bye ba dpag med 'gyed/ /gdul bya kun la snang gyur pas/ /kun snang bkod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mu stegs thar pa phyir ldog cing / /nyan thos zhi ba phyogs gcig la/ /khyod kyi sa mchog rin chen
<p>104a.3</p>rnams/ /pad+ma ltar gnon phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsod nams tshogs las rin po che/ /ye shes tshogs rdzogs pad+ma'i gdan/ /sku gsum lhun grub rab tu bzhugs/ /ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde bar gshegs pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i mtshan/ /rin chen spras pa'i
<p>104a.4</p>bstod pa 'di brjod pas/ /thub pa'i dbang po'i spyod pa ci 'dra bar/ /bdag gi spyod kyang de dang 'dra bar shog /bde bar gshegs pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i bstod pa mtshan rin po ches spras pa zhes bya ba slob dpon ma ti tsi Tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ 
<p>104a.5</p>pa da s+ya aSh+Ta ka sto traM/ bod skad du/ tshig brgyad pa'i bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zla rgyas zhal 'dra khyu mchog 'dra ba'i spyan/ /seng ge'i sgra 'dra glang po'i stobs 'dra zhing / /ri dbang rgyal brtan rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i thugs/ /lha dbang bla ma'i
<p>104a.6</p>thugs dbang phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyan gsum spyan legs pad+ma ltar yangs spyan/ /gnod sbyin klu yi mi 'dras gzigs mdzad cing / /thar pa thob mdzad spyan ni dkyus ring ba/ /spyan stong gzigs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mchog du ma'i yan lag mchog gis btud/ /
<p>104a.7</p>btso ma'i gser ltar 'bar sku mchod 'os sku/ /mtshan bzangs mdzes pas rnam par brgyan pa'i sku/ /bde gshegs de la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /blo gros rgyas shing gser ltar dri ma med/ /blo gros grags shing mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas mkha' ltar dri med spyan
<p>104b</p>
<p>104b.1</p>mnga' ba/ /dpa' bo mi g.yo blo mnga' de la 'dud/ /smra ba'i mchog gyur snyan pa'i don gsung pa/ /yang dag don gsung 'dul ba'i don gsung zhing / /smra ba'i dbang phyug rgol bas mi bskyod gsung / /bden bzhi gsung ba'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan du mi 'dul
<p>104b.2</p>'dul ba'i don du 'dul/ /nyon mongs spong sogs rnams par dag pas 'dul/ /thub pa tshul spyod chen pos legs par mdzad/ /snyoms shing mdzes pa'i tshems ldan mgon la 'dud/ /bsod nams dpag med bsags pas sku mdzes la/ /'dom gang 'od kyi dkyil
<p>104b.3</p>'khor 'bar ba'i sku/ /gser sbyangs btso ma lta bur dri med sku/ /srid las grol sku rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor los zhabs gnas mchog gi mtshan ldan zhabs/ /lha dbang spyi bos legs pa rab tu btud pa'i zhabs/ /zhabs sor dra bas legs brgyan mdzes pa'i zhabs/ /
<p>104b.4</p>dpal be'u g.yung drung gis mtshan zhabs la 'dud/ /tshig brgyad pa'i bstod pa dge bsnyen mtha' yas lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tri rat+na sto traM/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag
<p>104b.5</p>'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyob pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsum la rtag tu bdag phyag 'tshal/ /tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs mkhyen bzhi sku gsum grub/ /rnam rtog mi mnga' ci yang sa le mkhyen/ /chos
<p>104b.6</p>sku mkha' 'dra gzugs sku mdzes sku la ldan/ /sangs rgyas dpag bsam 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos nyid rgyu mthun gsung rab bcu gnyis dang / /chos la skye 'gag med cing spros las dben/ /de la dmigs te yon tan kun grub pa/ /legs rgyu dam pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal
<p>104b.7</p>lo/ /nyon mongs sgrib dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dag /gnyen pos rim par bsal nas sar bzhugs shing / /sems can don mdzad sangs rgyas zhing sbyong ba/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod pa slob dpon chen po ma ti tsi Tas
<p>105a</p>
<p>105a.1</p>mdzad pa rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tri rat+na sto tra br-ib+hi/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa'i 'grel pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /srid pa gsum gyi bla ma dkon
<p>105a.2</p>mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa ni 'gro ba rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mtha' dag skyed pa'i rgyu yin pas na de'i phyir de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ ma 'dres pa dang mtshungs
<p>105a.3</p>par ldan pa'i ma rig pa dag ma lus par spangs pa ni sangs rgyas te gnyid rab tu sangs pa bzhin no/ /yang na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mi shes pa spangs pas shes bya mtha' dag la blo rgyas pas rgyas pa ste pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa lta bu'o/ /de ltar na de dag gi ni spangs pa
<p>105a.4</p>dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pas bstod pa ste/ nyid kyi don phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang du byas te/ gtso zhes smos pa las sa gsum gyi dbang phyug chen por gyur pas na gtso bo ste/ de dag ma lus pas 'don pas lci ba ni gzugs la
<p>105a.5</p>la lci bar gyur pas srong gi mgo gnon pa lta bu'o/ /des ni thams cad zil gyis mnan nas 'dul zhes bstan par 'gyur ro/ /yang na phyin ci ma log pa'i yon tan rin po che sbyin pas na bla ma ste/ de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni sgo gsum gyi rab tu 'dud par byed pa'o/ /
<p>105a.6</p>skyob pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba la 'dis ngan 'gro dang srid par sdug bsngal ba las skyob cing sdug bsngal sel la bde ba sbyin pas na skyob pa zhes bya'o/ /de nyid kyis na chos te rnam par ltung ba las 'dzin pas so/ /de yang gang gis don dam pa'i chos de
<p>105a.7</p>rtogs na slar ngan song dang 'khor bar mi ltung ba'i phyir ro/ /de rtogs pa'i rgyud pa'i rgyu ni bstan pa'i chos yin la/ dngos kyi rgyu ni lam gyi chos yin pas de dag la yang btags te 'dzin pa zhes brjod do/ /yang na skyob pa zhes bya bas ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa phun sum tshogs
<p>105b</p>
<p>105b.1</p>pa bstan la/ chos zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa 'dzin pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan to/ /de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/ /dge 'dun che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni 'di dag lha'i bu'i bdud dag gis kyang ston pa dang lta ba las mi phyed
<p>105b.2</p>pas na dge 'dun te/ de la ston pa las mi phyed pa ni shes nas dad pa thob pas so/ /lta ba las mi phyed pa ni bdag med pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa thob pa'i phyir ro/ /de la nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang rung ste/ kun du sbyor ba gsum
<p>105b.3</p>spangs pa'i 'phags pa rnams ni slob pa dang mi slob pa yang rung ste dge 'dun no/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni shes bya'i sgrib pa mtha' dag kyang spangs la/ bsod nams kyi tshogs mtha' dag kyang rdzogs pas dge 'dun gyi nang du bgrang bar bya ba ma yin la/ sa
<p>105b.4</p>gsum gyi 'gro ba dam pa dang slob pa dang mi slob pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pas dgra bcom pa chen po zhes ni bya'o/ /de ltar mi phyed pa ni rang gi don thob pa yin la/ gzhan gyi don thob par byed pa'i phyir che zhes smos so/ /'di dag gzhan gyi yon sbyong ba che bas na chen
<p>105b.5</p>po ste/ phul ba dang yongs su longs spyod pa gnyis kyis 'gro ba'i rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams mchog 'phel ba'i phyir te/ de yang slob pa dang mi slob pa de dag ni ci rigs par sred pa'i cha shas lhag ma lus zas dang gos la sogs pa la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags phra mo bsgom
<p>105b.6</p>pas spang bar bya ba yod pa dang / sngon gyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu phung po lnga 'dzin pas zas la sogs pas da dung gso dgos pas longs spyod kyi/ sangs rgyas dang chos ni de lta ma yin pas so/ /de dag la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o/ /gsum po de dag
<p>105b.7</p>la rtag tu bdag phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba ni don go sla'o/ /de ltar phyag 'tshal ba'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bzang po thams cad kyi gtso bo spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba 'thob pa'o/ /rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu la myong ba rgyu mthun ni 'khor bar skye ba na mgo
<p>106a</p>
<p>106a.1</p>bo gdugs lta bur 'gyur ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal ba la dga' bar 'gyur ba'o/ /dbang gi 'bras bu ni phyi rol gyi dngos po yid du 'ong ba rnams de'i shes pa'i yul du 'dud pa ltar snang zhing dgyed pa dang gzung du mi rung ba ltar snang bar
<p>106a.2</p>mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa mdor gsungs pa de dag rab tu gsal bar bstan pas 'gro ba dam pa rnams de bas kyang shas cher dad par bya ba dang / rang gi tshogs dri ma med pa bsags pa'i phyir slob dpon ma ti tsi Ta'i zhal snga nas bstod pa gsungs pa/ 
<p>106a.3</p>tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs mkhyen bzhi sku gsum grub/ /ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod pa yin te/ 'dis rdzogs par byed pas na tshogs te/ sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/ /de dag nyid chen po ste rang bzhin dpag tu med pa dang / bskal pa dpag tu med pa
<p>106a.4</p>dang / yul dpag tu med pa la bsags pa'o/ /gnyis zhes bya ba ni bsod nams dang ye shes so/ /de yang sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang / bzod pa ni bsod nams te/ bsam gtan dang shes rab ni ye shes so/ /brtson 'grus ni de gnyis kar gtogs so zhes
<p>106a.5</p>'phags pa dgongs pa nges par 'grel ba las gsungs so/ /de gnyis rdzogs pa ni bskal pa chen po grangs med pa dang por sbyor ba'i lam sbyangs shing gnyis par sa bdun pa'i bar dang / gsum par sa bcu pa'i bar du sbyangs shing dag par byas pa ni rdzogs shing mthar
<p>106a.6</p>thug par 'gyur ba'o/ /des ni rgyu khyad par can bsags pa bstan nas/ de ni 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir mkhyen bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ mkhyen bzhi ni me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa bzhi'o/ /de la me long lta bu'i ye shes ni kun gzhi rnam shes gnas gyur
<p>106a.7</p>pa shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med par mkhyen pa'i ye shes so/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnas gyur pa bdag med pa la bdag med par mkhyen pa'i ye shes so/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pa kun rdzob kyi
<p>106b</p>
<p>106b.1</p>dngos po ma lus pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar ma 'dres par mkhyen pa'o/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pa 'gro ba rnams gdul ba'i bya ba gang yin pa ma lus pa mdzad pa mkhyen pa'o/ /de dag bsdus pa ni sku gsum grub ces bya bas bstan te/ de
<p>106b.2</p>yang bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po'i 'bras bu ni/ gzugs kyi sku gnyis 'grub la/ ye shes kyi tshogs po po'i 'bras ba ni chos kyi sku 'grub pa'o/ /de la me long lta bu'i ye shes ni chos kyi sku gzung ba dang 'dzin pa las grol ba rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba tsam gyi ye shes so/ /
<p>106b.3</p>de'i chos stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sogs pa ye shes tha dad pa du ma tshogs pas na chos kyi tshogs yin la/ chos kyi sku zhes bya ba ni kA ya'i sgra tshogs la 'jug pas so/ /ye shes de yang dngos su na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so/ /so
<p>106b.4</p>sor rtog pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste/ de yang sku de'i nang gi ye shes skye mched tha dad pa la rag las pa las grol ba kun rdzob sna tshogs mkhyen pa dang skur bstan pas gang 'dul bar 'os pa 'dul ba'o/ /des ni 'dir sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku thams
<p>106b.5</p>cad kyi gzhi ni rnam par smin pa'i sku ste/ de'i mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang / sgo lnga'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi snang ba las chos dang sprul pa'i skur bzhag cing / de gnyis kyi rten ye shes dang bcas pa de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes brjod do/ /yang na bsod nams kyi tshogs mtha' yas
<p>106b.6</p>pa las grub pa'i lus khyad par can dang / de'i 'od zer gzugs khyad par can du snang ba ni gzugs kyi sku gnyis te/ gang mig gi yul du gyur pa de nyid gzugs so/ /rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar snang ba'i ye shes ni gtso bo ste/ sna tshogs shes pa dang / bdag med par shes pa
<p>106b.7</p>yang ye shes kyi tshogs las byung bar brjod par bya'o/ /de las gzhan pa bdag med pa tsam de ni don dam pa'i chos dkon mchog tu bzhag gi sangs rgyas su ni mi gzhag ste/ de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes kyi yul yin la/ thob par bya ba'i 'bras bur gzhag par bya'o/ /des na rang gi
<p>107a</p>
<p>107a.1</p>mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i sku ni gsum kho nar brjod par bya'o/ /de ni sku gsum po de'i bdag nyid las dang / dpe dang / mtshan nyid kyis gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ rnam rtog mi mnga' ci yang sa le mkhyen/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ rnam par rtog pa'i
<p>107a.2</p>rigs gsum mam bzhi dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ba ste/ gnyis su 'dzin pa mtha' dag drungs nas phyung ba'i ye shes chen po'o/ /de'i phyir mi mnga' zhes bya ba'i dgag pa 'di ni ma yin par dgag pa ste/ rnam par rtog pa'i rigs de dag ni yod pa ma yin la/ des
<p>107a.3</p>dben pa'i ye shes rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni mnga' bas so/ /des na des ci yang rung ste chos ci yang rung ba rdul phra rab dang ri rab la sogs pa de dag sa le zhes bya ba rab tu gsal bar mkhyen pa ste/ ji ltar mkhyen zhe na/ sgra'i spyi'i rnam par rtog pa'i sgro btags pa dang skur ba
<p>107a.4</p>btab pa dang bral zhing phan tshun mi sgrib la thogs pa med cing mun pa med la shel dang lhang tsher ltar gsal ba'i rnam par dbyer med par mkhyen te/ de nyid ye shes de'i las yin no/ /de'i dpe bstan pa ni chos sku mkha' 'dra zhes bya ste/ 'dus ma byas nam mkha' thogs pa med cing mi
<p>107a.5</p>sgrib pa ltar me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med cing sgrib pa med la/ dmigs pa dang rnam pa yongs su ma chad par snang ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to/ /'dir ye shes lhag ma gsum ni gzugs la sogs pa dang / gang zag la bdag med pa tsam dang / 
<p>107a.6</p>'dul ba'i 'gro ba'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal la sogs pa dang 'dul ba'i thabs shes pas yul so sor nges pa'i ye shes yin la/ ye shes 'di ni yul de dag dang bcas pa'i ye shes de dag nyid chos can du gyur pa dang / de'i chos nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba spyi'i mtshan
<p>107a.7</p>nyid du gyur pa ste/ chos can dang chos nyid du bcas pa mtha' dag mkhyen par gyur pa'o/ /gzugs sku mdzes sku ldan zhes bya ba ni mtshan dang dpe byad rab tu 'bar ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi don ni sngar bstan pa bzhin no/ /dpag bsam
<p>107b</p>
<p>107b.1</p>'dra zhes bya ba ni sku gsum char gyi dpe ste/ 'gro ba rnams kyis ji ltar sems kyis dpags shing bsams pa ltar yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pas na lha'i dpag bsam gyi shing chen po rnam pa bzhi po dang 'dra ba ste/ bsod nams dpag bsam shing khyod de ring gang las
<p>107b.2</p>byung / /zhes bstod pa gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /de yang sku de dag gsum char yang sngon gyi smon lam gyi sa bon dpag tu med pa 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pas/ sngon ji ltar smon lam btab pa bzhin du da ltar gdul bya'i don 'bad pa med par 'byung ba yin la/ khyad par du
<p>107b.3</p>gzugs kyi sku ni mthu thogs pa med par byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyi tshe ba'i gang zag dang 'gro ba yongs su smin par byed pa la dngos su yang 'jug go/ /kha cig na re gzugs sku zhes bya ba ni spyir bstan pa yin la/ mdzes skur ldan zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
<p>107b.4</p>sku'o /dpag bsam 'dra zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i sku'o/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni sku gsum char gyi dbang du byas pa'o zhes zer ro/ /de lta bu'i sku gsum po de dag la lus zhing gi rdul snyed du mos par sprul te phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ste/ tshig gi don snga ma ji lta ba bzhin no/ /chos
<p>107b.5</p>nyid rgyu mthun gsung rab bcu gnyis dang / /zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'i chos la bstod pa ste/ chos nyid ces bya ba la chos nyid bdag rnam pa gnyis kyis dben pa stong pa nyid de/ bdag med pa dang bdag dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i spyi'i mtshan nyid don
<p>107b.6</p>dam pa'i ngo bo'o/ /de'i rgyu mthun pa bstan pa'i chos bdag med par ston pa'i gsung rab ste/ 'dir mthun pa'i rgyu ni rgyu mthun pa ste bskyed par rung ba dang / thob par nus pa'o/ /de la skyed par rung ba ni rgyu des phyin ci ma log par yongs su grub pa'i ye shes skyed pa'o/ /thob par
<p>107b.7</p>nus pa ni ye shes de skyes pas mi 'gyur ba'i yongs su grub pa de bzhin nyid de thob par nus pa'o/ /de dag ni rab tu phul du byung ba'i gsung yin pas gsung rab ste/ phyi rol pa'i tshig la ni snga ma lta bu'i rung ba dang / nus pa med pas rab ma yin no/ /bcu gnyis ni mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs
<p>108a</p>
<p>108a.1</p>kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / de lta bu byung ba dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rmad du byung ba dang / gtan la phab pa'i sde zhes bya ba ste/ 
<p>108a.2</p>de dag dang po ni ston pa'i zhal nas grag pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu ni gang zag gi blo la gnas pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu glegs bam la bris pa'o/ /de yang dang por de la dmigs nas thos pa dang bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab skye zhing de nas bsgoms pas chos nyid de thob pas mthun
<p>108a.3</p>pa'i rgyu brgyud pa nyid du nges pa'o/ /de bas na slob dpon ba su ban d+hus rnam bshad rigs par bshad pa/ ston pa'i zhal nas byung ba skye bo'i mig gi rab rib zhi bar mdzad pa bkra shis kyi/ /'byung gnas sems la zhog cig gang phyir 'di ni lus can rnams kyi rna ba'i bdud rtsi
<p>108a.4</p>dang / /nyon mongs pa yi nang kun sel bar mdzad pa yin pas de don yang dag bsam par gyis/ /rgyu 'di rnams kyis rtag tu gus par sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung dag mnyan par bya ba'i rigs/ /zhes so/ /chos la skye 'gag med cing spros las dben/ /de la dmigs te yon
<p>108a.5</p>tan kun grub pa/ /zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i chos la bstod pa ste/ /chos ni dam pa'i chos so/ /de la don dam par skye ba dang 'gag pa med cing gzhan yang spros pa ste rtag pa dang / chad pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gcig pa dang / tha dad pa'i spros pa de dag las dben
<p>108a.6</p>pa'o/ /de yang dam pa'i chos ni bdag med pa'i rang bzhin yin la/ spros pa de dag ni bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dbang gis btags pa tsam du zad pas na bdag tu 'dzin pa log ma thag tu de dag kyang ldog la/ bdag med pa'i ngang la de dag dang po nas kyang med kyi btags pa glo bur bar zad
<p>108a.7</p>pa'o/ /de ltar spros pa dang bral ba bdag med pa de la bdag med par shes rab rnam pa gsum gyis dmigs pas bdag tu 'dzin pa la sogs de ma thag tu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan thun mong ba rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa 'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa du ma dang / thun mong ma yin
<p>108b</p>
<p>108b.1</p>pa stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan kun grub pas na 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams ni 'dus ma byas las rab tu byung ba'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /legs rgyu dam pa'i chos la zhes bya ba ni lam gyi chos la bstod pa ste/ /de la legs pa ni nges par legs pa ste nye bar zhi
<p>108b.2</p>ba'i bde ba'o/ /de'i rgyu ni skyed par byed pa ste/ des bdag med pa'i ye shes bskyed la/ des kyang nges par legs pa de thob pas so/ /'dis zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i sngon du rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin skyes pa de ni legs rgyu mthar thug pa yin la/ des mjug btul ba mthong ba'i
<p>108b.3</p>lam gyi bar gyi ye shes ni legs rgyur rig par bya'o/ /de nyid dam pa ste/ 'phags pa rnams kyis nyams su myong bar gyur pa dang / ltung ba las 'dzin pas na dam pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/ /nyon mongs sgrib dang shes bya'i sgrib
<p>108b.4</p>pa dag /gnyen pos rim par bsal nas sar zhugs shing / /zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la bstod pa ste/ de la sems kun nas nyon mongs par byed pas na nyon mongs pa ste/ 'dod chags la sogs pa drug go/ /de dag nyid sgrib pa ste/ zad pa dang mi skye ba
<p>108b.5</p>shes pa'i ye shes la sgrib cing mthong ba'i gegs byed pas so/ /shes bya ni chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro ba rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o/ /de la sgrib pa ni rjod par byed pa sgra'i spyi la yod par 'dzin pa ste/ dngos su na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rigs ji snyed
<p>108b.6</p>pa'o/ /sgrib pa de gnyis ka yang rab tu dbye ba mang po dang ldan pas na dag ces pa mang po'i tshig can no/ /gnyis pos zhes bya ba ni bdag med pa gnyen shes pa'i ye shes kyis so/ /rim par bsal nas zhes bya ba ni de dag cig car mi spong gi dang po mthong spang spong la/ /de'i
<p>108b.7</p>'og tu bsgom pas spang bar bya ba spong ba'i phyir ro/ /de las 'bras bu thob pa bstan pa ni sar zhugs shing zhes bya ba ste/ sa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sa ste/ brgyad pa dang / mthong ba dang / bsrabs pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / byas pa rtogs pa dang / rang
<p>109a</p>
<p>109a.1</p>sangs rgyas kyi sa la zhugs pa dang / yang rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma med pa nas chos kyi sprin gyi bar la zhugs pa'o/ /'dir bden pa bzhi rnam pa bcu drug dag yid la byed pa'i ye shes kyi skad cig bcu drug gis phra rgyas brgyad cu rtsa brgyad spangs pas mthong
<p>109a.2</p>ba'i lam la brgyad pa'am rab tu dga' ba'i sa pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu tshul de nyid kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba bcu spangs pa las ni nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i sa lhag ma dag gzhag ste/ 'dod pa'i rnam pa gsum pa'i bar dang / rnam pa drug pa dang / dgu pa dang / srid rtse'i
<p>109a.3</p>dgu pa zad pa las mthor ba dang / bsrabs pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa pa'o/ /cig car kho nar spangs pa dang lam rdzogs pa ni bse ru lta bu'i sa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa lhag ma rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su
<p>109a.4</p>rdzogs pa las rnam par gzhag par rig par bya zhing / de dag gi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis cig car spong la/ shes bya'i sgrib pa ni sa re re la yang rim gyis spang ngo / /la la ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa yang sa re re la rim gyis
<p>109a.5</p>spong ste/ spong byed ni chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes kyis so zhes zer ro/ /de ltar ye shes kyi tshogs la gnas pa bshad nas/ da ni bsod nams kyi tshogs la gnas pa bstan pa'i phyir/ sems can don mdzad sangs rgyas zhing sbyong ba/ /zhes smos te/ sems can rnams kyi
<p>109a.6</p>don ni dgos pa ste bde ba dang phan pa'o/ /de dag mdzad pa ni bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / tshad med pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis ji ltar nus par byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing ni snod dang bcud do/ /de dag sbyong ba ni rgyal ba'i yum las gsungs pa ltar te/ sems can
<p>109a.7</p>gos ngan pa dag mthong na bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can rnams lus gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab par bya'o/ /me tog dbul na bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dus thams cad pa'i me tog rab tu rgyas par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab
<p>109b</p>
<p>109b.1</p>par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni smon lam gyi mthus sbyong bar rig par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun che la zhes bya ba la/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las ring du song bas 'phags pa ste/ dge 'dun ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no/ /che ba ni grangs
<p>109b.2</p>dang yon tan gyis che ba ste/ grangs mtha' yas pa dang / legs par zhugs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan chen po mnga' ba'i phyir ro/ /phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni bstod pa dang bcas pa'i lus kyi yan lag thams cad rab tu 'dud pa'o/ /de ltar yon tan mtha' dag 'dus pa'i
<p>109b.3</p>dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal nas de dag la skyabs su song na ngan song rnams su mi skye bar lha'i gnas su skye ste/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ngan 'gro las yang dag par 'da' ba'o zhes gsungs pa dang / 'di ltar shin tu dang ba'i sems dang yid
<p>109b.4</p>gzhungs pas gzhan du ma yengs pa'i yid gsal bas sangs rgyas sam chos sam dge 'dun la skyabs su song na/ de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten zur na gnas pa zhes bya ba der shin tu dang ba'i sems dang skyabs su song ba'i rgyus skye bar 'gyur ro/ /der
<p>109b.5</p>skyes nas kyang de'i lus gzi brjid dang ldan zhing / lus rang gi 'od kyis brgyan la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /gal te phyag 'tshal ba dang skyabs su song ba'i dge ba de yongs su bsngo ba dang ldan na ni ji ltar bsngos pa'i thar pa'i rgyur 'gyur bar rig par
<p>109b.6</p>bya'o/ /de ltar nyes pa kun spangs shing / /yon tan mtha' yas gter gyur pa/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod pa'i tshig /cung zad bshad pas dge ba'i tshogs/ /gang thob de yis 'gro ba rnams/ /sangs rgyas sa la gnas par shog /dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa'i 'grel
<p>109b.7</p>pa slob dpon rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na shAn+ti dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal gyi lhun po'i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tri rat+na sto traM / bod skad du/ dkon
<p>110a</p>
<p>110a.1</p>mchog gsum gyi bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dmigs med chos kyi sku/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /cir yang sprul sku la/ /gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam dag chos kyi dbyings/ /sgrub pa'i 'phags lam brgyad/ /bstan 
<p>110a.2</p>pa'i gsung rab la/ /gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems rnams dang / /dgra bcom dag la sogs/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams la/ /gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
<p>110a.3</p>@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sha ta pany+tsa sha ti ka nA ma s+ya sto tra/ bod skad du/ brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig la ni nyes pa kun/ /gtan nas yong ye mi mnga' zhing / /gang la'ang rnam pa thams cad du/ /
<p>110a.4</p>yon tan thams cad gnas gyur pa/ /gal te sems shig yod na ni/ /de nyid la ni skyabs 'gro zhing / /de bstod de ni bkur ba dang / /de yi bstan la gnas pa'i rigs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa yon tan kun/ /mnga' la de yang nyam mi mnga'/ /nyes pa bag chags
<p>110a.5</p>bcas de yang / /skyob pa gcig pu la mi mnga'/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang ni/ /gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las la/ /zhe 'gras gyur pa gang gis kyang / /chos dang ldan par glags mi rnyed/ /rgya mtshor gnya' shing bu ga ru/ /rus sbal mgrin pa chud pa ltar/ /dam
<p>110a.6</p>chos dga' ston cher bcas pa'i/ /mi nyid bdag gis thob nas ni/ /mi rtag nyid dang rjes 'brel zhing / /las kyi klags la dogs bcas pa/ /bdag gi lce 'di nyid kyis go/ /snying po ci phyir blang mi bya/ /de ltar thub pa'i yon tan kyi/ /yul lta grangs med shes mod kyi/ /
<p>110a.7</p>rang gi don la gus pa yis/ /de yi phyogs gcig bsgrims te brjod/ /gang gi yon tan grangs dag dang / /mthu la thug pa ma mchis la/ /rmad byung phrin las dpag med can/ /rang byung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di snyed bgyi ba'i mtha' med na/ /'di ltar lags zhes
<p>110b</p>
<p>110b.1</p>ci zhig smos/ /khyod kyi yon tan slad du bdag /bsod nams snyam nas spyi brtol skyes/ /bstod pa gleng bslang ba ste le'u dang po'o// //spyod dam mi spyod snyam pa yi/ /rnam par rtog pa rnam spangs nas/ /'gro ba 'di ni nyam thag ces/ /khyod bdag nyid kyis zhal
<p>110b.2</p>gyis bzhes/ /khyod ni ma bcol lags mdzad pa/ /khyod ni rgyu med bzhin du byams/ /khyod ni ma 'dris mdza' bshes te/ /'brel pa med pa'i gnyen 'dun lags/ /nyid kyi sha yang stsol mdzad na/ /dngos po gzhan lta smos ci 'tshal/ /legs mdzad khyod kyis srog kyang ni/ /
<p>110b.3</p>slong ba'i skye bo rnams la btang / /nyid kyi sku dang srog dag gis/ /lus can gshed mas zin rnams kyi/ /lus dang srog kyang khyod kyis ni/ /lan brgya phrag du bslu ba mdzad/ /ngan 'gros bsnyengs slad ma lags la/ /bzhed pa'i 'gro ba'ang sgrub ma lags/ /dgongs pa
<p>110b.4</p>dag pa 'ba' zhig gis/ /khyod kyis tshul khrims goms par mdzad/ /rtag tu gya gyu rnam spangs shing / /drang brtan rnams ni rtag bsten pas/ /yongs su dag pa'i las rnams kyis/ /khyod ni gzhi rten gcig pur gyur/ /sdug bsngal mang pos gzir ba na/ /khyed
<p>110b.5</p>kyis dge ba'i thugs kyis ni/ /nyon mongs rnams la sran btsugs nas/ /skye bo nyon mongs can la brtse/ /khyod kyis gzhan gyi don slad du/ /sku srog btang nas dgyes gyur gang / /de 'dra srog chags 'gums pa las/ /sos pa rnams la'ang byung ma gyur/ /khyod ni lan
<p>110b.6</p>'ga' ma lags par/ /gtubs kyang sdug bsngal mi dgongs par/ /gshed ma bgyid pa'i sems can la'ang / /gtso bo thugs rjer gyur pa gang / /khyod kyi thugs ni rin po che/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa bon te/ /dpa' khyod kho nas snying por mkhyen/ /de gzhan skye bos
<p>110b.7</p>'ol mi mchi/ /dka' spyad las ni ma bgyis par/ /go 'phang rnyed dka' mi 'thob ces/ /de slad nyid la'ang ma gzigs par/ /khyod kyi brtson 'grus legs par spel/ /khyad par 'phags par bgyi ba la/ /khyod la thang lhod 'ga' ma byung / /de slad khyod kyi khyad par rnams/ /
<p>111a</p>
<p>111a.1</p>thog drung rim pa dbyer ma mchis/ /thugs ni thugs rje chen po dang / /rtag tu rjes su 'brel slad du/ /ting 'dzin 'bras bur bcas pa yi/ /shin tu bde la'ang khyod ma chags/ /gzhan dang thun mong ma lags pa'i/ /bde ba gang de gya nom yang / /dam
<p>111a.2</p>pa'i spyod ldan khyod 'dra la/ /gnod par bas kyi sman ma mchis/ /'dres pa las ni legs bshad nyid/ /snying po skyon med nyi tshe zhig /khyod kyis kun bzhes thugs la bzhag /nyes bshad dug bzhin yongs su spangs/ /rin chen snying po mkhyen khyod kyis/ /legs
<p>111a.3</p>bshad srog gis 'jal ba na/ /skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /byang chub slad du dpa' rtsal bstan/ /de slad grangs med gsum dag tu/ /khyod ni de ltar brtson pa na/ /brtson 'grus 'ba' zhig grogs gyur pas/ /go 'phang bla na med pa brnyes/ /rgyu la bstod pa ste le'u gnyis
<p>111a.4</p>pa'o// //mtho la phrag dog mi mdzad cing / /dma' la rngan can mi mdzad la/ /mnyam la 'gran pa mi mnga' bas/ /khyod ni 'jig rten gtso bor gyur/ /khyod ni yon tan rgyu rnams la/ /mngon bgyis 'bras bu rnams la min/ /yang dag sgrub pa de nyid kyis/ /
<p>111a.5</p>khyod kyi yon tan pha mthar phyin/ /ji ltar khyod kyi zhabs rdul yang / /bsod nams skye ba mched 'gyur ba/ /de ltar khyod kyis legs spyad pas/ /bdag nyid rab tu bskrun pa mdzad/ /nyes pa nyams smad rtsa nas bton/ /yon tan spel nas rnam par sbyangs/ /gzhung
<p>111a.6</p>lugs bzang po des na khyod/ /grub mchog lhag par brnyes pa lags/ /ji ltar bdag gi rgyud la de/ /bag chags lhag ma'ang ma lus pa/ /de ltar rnam pa thams cad du/ /nyes pa khyod kyis rab tu bcom/ /ji ltar gzhan la de dag dang / /'dra ba tsam yang mi
<p>111a.7</p>gda' ba/ /de ltar khyod kyis bsags bsags nas/ /bdag nyid la ni yon tan bsgrubs/ /'jig rten pa yi dpe dngos kun/ /gegs bgyid pa dang sgrib pa can/ /re zhig pa dang nyi tshe ba/ /shin tu rnyed par sra ba lags/ /khyod kyis yon tan bla med la/ /gegs bgyid
<p>111b</p>
<p>111b.1</p>ma mchis rtogs ma mchis/ /brtan pa dang ni rgyun chags pas/ /dpe lta mchis par ga la 'gyur/ /gang tshe khyod kyi dgongs pa'i dkyil/ /gting dang pha rol med brtags na/ /rgya mtsho zab pa nyid kyang ni/ /gnag rjes lta bur sa ler gda'/ /chos rnams kun gyis mi bskyod
<p>111b.2</p>pa/ /khyod kyi brtan pa mngon bsams na/ /sa yi brtan pa nyid kyang ni/ /shir sha'i ge sar rtse ltar chung / /thub pa khyod kyi ye shes kyi/ /snang bas mi shes rab rib dag /'joms pa'i thad na nyi ma yang / /me khyer tsam du'ang mi spyod do/ /khyod kyi gsung thugs mdzad spyod rnams/ /
<p>111b.3</p>dag pa'i gan na ston zla dang / /chu dang nam mkha'i dag pa rnams/ /dri ma can ni lta bur gda'/ /'jig rten legs pa gang ci'ang rung / /thams cad bsngos na'ang der bas te/ /nyon mongs 'jig rten chos rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas chos la khyad mi khor/ /rin chen chos gang brnyes
<p>111b.4</p>nas khyod/ /mchog tu gyur pa de nyid dang / /khyad du bsgrun zhing de dang ni/ /khyod dang bsgrun ldom kho nar bas/ /gang la spyi tsam bstun nas ni/ /cung zad brjod par bgyid pa de/ /smra ba po yi rang dga' dang / /thabs dang gcam bu tsam du bas/ /dpe med pa la bstod pa ste le'u gsum
<p>111b.5</p>pa'o// //khyod ni bdud las rnam rgyal te/ /'gro kun dad par mdzad pa yang / /bdag gis chos nyid rjes bsams na/ /chen po ltar gang ma mthong ngo / /sdang bas rgol bar rtsol byed pa/ /mang po'ang gzhom par bya ba ni/ /khyad par gnas la brten pa yi/ /bzod pa'i tshegs
<p>111b.6</p>su mtshar mi che/ /gang tshe bdud rnams mngon btul ba/ /de yi nub mo kho na la/ /nyon mongs shin tu che spangs pa/ /de nyid rmad du byung ba lags/ /'od zer phreng ba stong ldan pa'i/ /nyi mas mun bsal gang lags dang / /dpa' bo khyod kyis mu stegs las/ /rgyal bar mdzad pa
<p>111b.7</p>ci zhig mtshar/ /'dod chags bral bas chags bcas dang / /zhe sdang bral bas zhe sdang can/ /gti mug bral bas rmongs pa ste/ /gsum pos rtag tu gsum dag btul/ /dam chos rab tu bstod pa dang / /dam chos ma lags smod mdzad kyang / /dam pa dag dang tha ma la/ /
<p>112a</p>
<p>112a.1</p>khyod ni chags dang khro mi mnga'/ /dgra bcom pa dang mu stegs la/ /rjes su chags dang khong khro bar/ /khyod kyi thugs ni mi 'gyur na/ /khyod la bstod du ci zhig mchis/ /yon tan rnams la'ang ma chags la/ /yon tan can la'ang bzhed mi mnga'/ /kye ma'o
<p>112a.2</p>khyod kyi thugs stobs ni/ /rab dang yongs su dag pa lags/ /dbang po rnams ni rab dang ba/ /dus rnams rtag tu mi nyams pas/ /khyod thugs rtag tu dang ba dag /mngon sum gyur pa bzhin du gda'/ /rang bzhin dam pa legs gsungs dang / /mdzad spyod bzang pos
<p>112a.3</p>bsgrags pas na/ /khyod kyi blo gros dgongs pa dag /rnam dag byis pa'i bar la grags/ /rmad du byung ba'i bstod pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o// //nye bar zhi la yid du 'ong / /'bar la gnod pa mdzad mi mnga'/ /dul la rngom brjid che ba yis/ /sku 'dis su zhig dad mi
<p>112a.4</p>mdzad/ /khyod kyi sku de gang gis na/ /lan brgyar mthong dang gang zhig gis/ /dang por mthong ba de gnyis ka /'dra bar mig ni mgu bar mdzad/ /khyod kyi sku ni mdzes pa'i phyir/ /blta bas mi ngoms rang bzhin pas/ /mthong ngo cog ni phyi phyir zhing / /dga' ba bskyed
<p>112a.5</p>par mdzad pa lags/ /rten gyi yon tan dag dang ni/ /brten pa'i yon tan phan tshun du/ /'tsham pas khyod kyi sku dang ni/ /yon tan phun tshogs mchog dang ldan/ /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang 'bar ba/ /khyod kyi sku las ma gtogs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan
<p>112a.6</p>'di/ /gzhan gang zhig la legs gnas 'gyur/ /khyod sku rten pa'i yon tan la/ /nga dpal che zhes gsung gsung ltar/ /de yi yon tan rnams kyang slar/ /des legs bkod ces gsungs pa 'dra/ /sku la bstod pa ste le'u lnga pa'o// //'gro ba 'di dag
<p>112a.7</p>thams cad ni/ /khyad med nyon mongs rnams kyis bcings/ /khyod ni 'gro ba'i nyon mongs dag /dgrol slad yun ring thugs rjes bsdams/ /dang por khyod la phyag bgyi'am/ /'on te gang gis 'khor bar khyod/ /skyon mkhyen yun ring de lta bur/ /bzhugs mdzad thugs rje
<p>112b</p>
<p>112b.1</p>che la bgyi/ /dben pa'i bde ba spang gyur khyod/ /mang po'i nang du bzhugs pa gang / /de khyod thugs rjes dus 'das pa/ /glags shig thod nas bgyis par bas/ /rig pa yis ni mtsho nang nas/ /klu bzhin khyod kyi thugs rje yis/ /dgon pa zhi gnas grong gi mthar/ /gdul ba'i don
<p>112b.2</p>gyi slad du drangs/ /nyer zhi mchog la gnas bzhin du/ /thugs rje gtso dang ldan pas na/ /rol mo mkhan gyi sgyu rtsal yang / /khyod kyi zhabs kyi 'dor bar mdzad/ /rdzu 'phrul seng ge'i sgra dang ni/ /nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa gang / /de ni bzhed spyod mi mnga' ba/ /khyod kyi thugs rjes
<p>112b.3</p>bstan pa lags/ /gzhan gyi don du rab bzang gi/ /nyid kyi don la brtse med pas/ /mgon po khyod nyid 'ba' zhig la/ /thugs rjes thugs rje mdzad ma gyur/ /'di ltar res 'ga' brtan pas gang / /gzhan don bsgrub pa mdzad slad du/ /khyod ni lan brgyar phyogs dag tu/ /
<p>112b.4</p>gtor ma bzhin du btang ba lags/ /de ltar khyod la gnod mdzad kyang / /nongs pa can du mi rtsi bas/ /khyod kyi bzhed pa kho na dang / /mthun 'jug pa ni lags par gda'/ /thugs la bstod pa ste le'u drug pa'o// //tshig bzang ba dang don che dang / /bden pa dang ni snyan pa dang / /
<p>112b.5</p>zab gsal gnyis ka'i don ldan dang / /bsdus dang spros pa dang ldan pa/ /khyod kyi gsung ni de lta bu/ /khyod kyi dgra bos thos na yang / /thams cad mkhyen pa lags so zhes/ /su zhig nges pa skye mi 'gyur/ /mang po ril gyis snyan pa lags/ /bcos ma 'ga' tsam snyan pa
<p>112b.6</p>lags/ /khyod kyi gsung don grub pas kyang / /thams cad legs gsungs kho na lags/ /khyod kyi gsung ni rnam brtags na/ /gang zhig 'jam dang rtsub pa dang / /gang yang de gnyis ldan pa dag /thams cad ro gcig nyid du 'gyur/ /e ma'o shin tu yongs dag pa'i/ /phrin
<p>112b.7</p>las rnams kyang rab tu bzo/ /de yis rin chen gsung rnams kyi/ /snod 'di 'dra ba 'di bgyis so/ /khyod zhal blta na rab sdug pa/ /de las mnyan na snyan pa yi/ /gsung 'di dag ni zla ba las/ /bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bzhin du gda'/ /khyod kyi gsung ni 'dod chags kyi/ /rdul
<p>113a</p>
<p>113a.1</p>rab zhi mdzad char sprin 'dra/ /zhe sdang sbrul ni gdon pa'i phyir/ /nam mkha' lding dang 'dra ba lags/ /yang dang yang du mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib 'joms pas gdugs dang 'dra/ /nga rgyal ri bo mngon 'joms pas/ /brgya byin mtshon cha 'dra ba lags/ /
<p>113a.2</p>don gzigs pas ni mi slu ba/ /nongs mi mnga' phyir rjes su mthun/ /legs par sbyar bas ge sla ste/ /khyod kyi gsung ni legs gsum ldan/ /re zhig dang por khyod kyi gsung / /nyan pa rnams kyi yid 'phrog mdzad/ /de nas yid la bsam bgyis na/ /rdul dang mun pa
<p>113a.3</p>dag kyang sel/ /phongs pa rnams kyi dbugs 'byin cing / /bag med rnams ni skrag par mdzad/ /bde ba can dag skyo bgyid pas/ /khyod gsung kun dang 'tsham par 'jug /mkhas pa rnams kyi dga' ba skyed/ /bar ma rnams kyi blo yang spel/ /tha ma'i rab rib rnam 'joms
<p>113a.4</p>pas/ /gsung 'di skye bo kun la sman/ /lta ba dag las dgar mdzad cing / /mya ngan 'das par nye bar 'dren/ /nyes pa sel mdzad khyod kyi gsung / /yon tan rnams kyi char yang 'bebs/ /kun la ma thogs thugs mnga' zhing / /dgongs pa'ang kun du nyer gnas pas/ /
<p>113a.5</p>de slad khyod kyis lung bstan kun/ /thams cad la yang slu mi mnga'/ /gang slad yul min dus min dang / /snod min rnams su mi 'jug pa/ /de slad khyod gsung don mchis te/ /brtson 'grus legs par brtsams pa bzhin/ /gsung la bstod pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// //
<p>113a.6</p>bgrod pa gcig dang thabs bde dang / /legs par 'brel dang nyes pa med/ /thog ma bar dang mthar dge bas/ /khyod kyi bstan 'dra gzhan la med/ /khyod kyi gzhung lugs de lta bu/ /gcig pu phangs la lta chags pas/ /byis pa gal te smod bgyid na/ /lta dang 'dra ba'i
<p>113a.7</p>dgra ma mchis/ /gzhan ni 'gro ba'i don slad du/ /sdug bsngal mang bstar gang lags pa/ /de bsams khyod bstan ngan na yang / /gnas par bgyi ba la thug na/ /phan pa gsung zhing phan mdzad pa/ /khyod kyi bstan pa ci smos te/ /mgo la zhugs ni 'bar bas kyang / /ci yi
<p>113b</p>
<p>113b.1</p>slad du sgrub mi bgyid/ /khyod kyi bstan pas rang dbang dang / /byang chub bde dang zhi ba dang / /khyod kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang / /legs pa bzhi po 'di kun thob/ /dpa' bo khyod kyi bstan pa 'di/ /mu stegs thams cad skrag mdzad la/ /bdud ni sems khong chud mdzad cing / /
<p>113b.2</p>lha dang mi rnams dbugs kyang 'byin/ /'chi bdag bstan pa khams gsum gyi/ /sa chen dag na spyod bgyid pa/ /mi thogs bzlog pa ma mchis pa'ang / /khyod kyi bstan pas zil gyis mnan/ /khyod kyi bstan pa'i lugs 'tshal ba/ /dga' na bskal par yang gnas la/ /gang
<p>113b.3</p>du bdud kyis mi rdzi ba/ /der yang dga' mgur rab tu mchi/ /lung gi don ni bsam pa dang / /bsgom dang gus par mnyan pa yi/ /dus gsum cha dbye khyod kyi ni/ /bstan las gzhan la mchis ma lags/ /drang srong skyes mchog khyod kyi bstan/ /de ltar legs pas khyab 'di la/ /ma
<p>113b.4</p>gus gang lags de las ni/ /sdug bsngal chen po'ang ci zhig mchis/ /bstan pa la bstod pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o// //khyod thos pas ni spro ba skye/ /mthong bas dad pa skye bar 'gyur/ /khyod gsung thos pas dga' 'gyur te/ /bstan pas rnam par grol bar mdzad/ /khyod kyi
<p>113b.5</p>sras kyis mgu bar 'gyur/ /'phel bas skye dgu rnams kyang dga'/ /gshegs pa na ni phan 'dogs mdzad/ /ldog pa na ni rgud par 'gyur/ /bsgrags pas sdig pa 'phrog par mdzad/ /khyod dran pas ni rangs par 'gyur/ /btsal bas blo gros skye 'gyur te/ /yongs su shes pas
<p>113b.6</p>rnam par 'dag /khyod la bsu bas dpal du byed/ /bsten pas blo gros mchog tu 'gyur/ /bsten na 'jigs pa med par mdzad/ /bsnyen bkur bgyis pas bde bar 'gyur/ /tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pas dag /bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pas dang / /shes rab phun
<p>113b.7</p>tshogs mi 'khrugs pas/ /khyod ni bsod nams mtsho chen lags/ /khyod sku bltar 'os rin chen te/ /legs gsungs mnyan 'os rin chen lags/ /chos ni spyad 'os rin chen pas/ /khyod ni rin chen 'byung gnas lags/ /khyod ni chu bos bdas pa'i gling / /smas pa'i
<p>114a</p>
<p>114a.1</p>bdag nyid skyob pa ste/ /srid pa'i 'jigs pas nyen pa'i skyabs/ /thar 'tshal rnams kyi 'dren pa lags/ /tshul khrims dag phyir snod kyi mchog /zhing gshin 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/ /srog chags kun la phan mdzad phyir/ /grogs kyi phul yang
<p>114a.2</p>khyod lags so/ /phan 'dogs mdzad pas mdza' bshes te/ /'grogs na bde phyir snying du sdug /zhi phyir gcig tu yid du 'ong / /yon tan kun mnga' mchod 'os khyod/ /sdig pa med pas yid dang 'thad/ /sku gsung bzang bas dga' bar mdzad/ /don kun 'grub phyir
<p>114a.3</p>dpal yangs te/ /yon tan legs rten bkra shis lags/ /smon lam la bstod pa ste le'u dgu pa'o// //khyod ni rngan then bgyid la skul/ /chom rkun bgyid pa tshar yang gcod/ /gya gyu can rnams rnal du 'god/ /dal bus bgyid la gzhen skul 'debs/ /dul
<p>114a.4</p>ba rnams ni lam la sbyor/ /dmu rgod rnams la btang snyoms mdzad/ /de slad skyes bu 'dul ba yi/ /kha lo sgyur ba bla med mchog /khyod ni nyam thag rnams la brtse/ /bde bar gnas la phan par dgyes/ /phongs par gnas la thugs rje bas/ /kun la phan par
<p>114a.5</p>bzhed pa lags/ /khyod ni dgra bo rnams la'ang byams/ /nyams par gyur la phan 'dogs mdzad/ /gtum po rnams la thugs brtse bas/ /khyod ni ya rabs rmad cig lags/ /phan 'dogs bgyid slad pha ma dag /gal te bla mar 'tshal na go/ /khyod ni lhag par phan
<p>114a.6</p>'dogs pas/ /bla ma nyid gyur smos ci 'tshal/ /rang gi don la mi lta bas/ /nyid kyi dgra bo ltar gyur cing / /g.yang sa'i mun na gnas rnams la/ /ra ba lta bur gyur pa'ang khyod/ /'jig rten gnyis kar sman gdags dang / /'jig rten las ni 'da' slad du/ /mun par
<p>114a.7</p>gyur pa'i 'jig rten la/ /khyod kyis shes rab snang bar mdzad/ /yul la nye bar spyod pa na/ /lha mi'i spyod pa tha dad kyang / /chos kyi longs spyod thun mong bas/ /khyod la dbye ba mi mnga'o/ /bcom ldan khyod kyis skye ba dang / /na tshod rigs dang yul dang ni/ /dus kyi skyon
<p>114b</p>
<p>114b.1</p>med chos rnams kyis/ /'di dag kun la sman yon btags/ /khyod kyi nyan thos srid bral zhing / /ya mtshan 'dzin pa med rnams la'ang / /lha rnams thal sbyar smon bgyid cing / /ya mtshan che ba lta bur mchod/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas 'khor ba yi/ /nyid gur gyur pa byung
<p>114b.2</p>ba brjid/ /des ni mi yang lha rnams kyis/ /smon par bya ba nyid du gyur/ /lam la 'jug pa la bstod pa ste le'u bcu pa'o// //mnyel dang zhe bde nyams gyur dang / /skye bo ngan dang 'grogs pa dang / /mi mthun pa dang mang po yi/ /skyon yang yon tan bzhin dgongs
<p>114b.3</p>shing / /'gro ba'i don slad ma chags pa'i/ /thugs kyis brtson pa gang mdzad pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi/ /chos nyid bcom ldan de rmad do/ /bshos kyang phal pa gsol mdzad cing / /res 'ga' smyung ba dag kyang mdzad/ /nyam nga'i shul du'ang gshegs
<p>114b.4</p>mdzad cing / /rad rod can du'ang mnal ba mdzad/ /mgon khyod gtso bor gyur lags kyang / /gdul bya rnams la byams slad du/ /sku ngas brngo dang gcam tshul dang / /skad dang cha lugs sgyur ba'ang mdzad/ /kun gyis dga' mgur rang don phyir/ /bran bzhin bskor bar bsgrims
<p>114b.5</p>pa las/ /mgon khyod rtag tu bdag nyid la/ /mnga' ma mchis pa'ang ma lags so/ /khyod la gang dang gang du yang / /ji skad bskul ba'ang mi spong ste/ /nyid kyi sgrub pa bzang po las/ /'da' bar 'gyur ba ma mchis so/ /ji ltar khyod ni gnod bgyid la/ /phan pa lhur mdzad
<p>114b.6</p>de lta bur/ /skye bo dag ni phan bgyid la'ang / /phan pa de ltar lhur mi bgyid/ /khyod ni gnod bgyid dgra bo la/ /phan pa mdzad pa'i bshes lags te/ /rtag tu skyon dag tshol ba la/ /yon tan 'ba' zhig tshol ba lags/ /khyod ni gang na dug bcas shing / /zhugs dang bcas par
<p>114b.7</p>spyan drangs pa/ /der ni brtser bcas gshegs pa dang / /khyod la bdud rtsi can du gyur/ /bzod pas mi snyan brjod pa dang / /'khu ba dag ni bde legs kyis/ /mi snyan smra la bden pas te/ /khyod kyis sdang ba byams pas btul/ /thog ma med dus goms pa yis/ /mi yi rang
<p>115a</p>
<p>115a.1</p>bzhin mang po yang / /khyod kyis ngan song rnam bzlog nas/ /skad cig nyid la yongs su bsgyur/ /dka' ba mdzad pa la bstod pa ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //rtsub pa dang 'jam bgyis pa dang / /'jungs pa rnams ni gtong phod dang / /gtum pa des
<p>115a.2</p>par bgyis pa gang / /de ni khyod kyi thabs mkhas lags/ /dga' bo'i dbang po nyer zhi dang / /nga rgyal khengs pa 'dud pa dang / /sor mo'i phreng ba'ang zhi bgyis na/ /su zhig ngo mtshar bskyed mi bgyid/ /khyod kyi chos kyi ros tshim pas/ /gser las bgyis pa'i mal spangs
<p>115a.3</p>nas/ /ran mang bting ba'i gnas mal du/ /brten rnams bsod nyams nyal bar bgyid/ /khyod kyis dus dang bsam mkhyen pas/ /res 'ga' zhus na'ang mi gsung la/ /spros gyur gzhan la bstan pa dang / /drung du gshegs nas bshad pa'ang mdzad/ /dri med gos la tshon
<p>115a.4</p>bzhin du/ /thog mar sbyin sogs gtam dag gis/ /sems la spro ba bskyed nas ni/ /phyi nas chos ni bstan pa mdzad/ /'khor ba mi bzad gting nas ni/ /'gro ba nyon mongs drang slad du/ /khyod kyis gang zhig ma stsal ba'i/ /thabs dang spyod pa de ma mchis/ /sku yi cha lugs
<p>115a.5</p>rnam mang dang / /gsung gis so so'i skad bzhin du/ /gdul bya'i bsam pa tha dad pa/ /de dang der ni khyod kyis mdzad/ /de dag kun kyang dag pa dang / /mi 'gal ba dang mchod 'os dang / /brjid dang lha mi rnams la ni/ /sman 'dogs bkur ba sha stag lags/ /smra dang
<p>115a.6</p>bgyid pa phal cher ni/ /legs par rdo thogs ma lags kyi/ /bden par gsung ba khyod la ni/ /de gnyis gzhan du gda' ba lags/ /bdag nyid dag pa 'ba' zhig gis/ /khyod kyis 'gro ba'i dpal zhing mdzad/ /'di ltar rnam pa 'di 'dra'i zhing / /'jig rten gsum na
<p>115a.7</p>mchis ma lags/ /thog med srid pa nyam nga bar/ /snga nas gcig tu nyams pa yi/ /sems can kun la sman slad du/ /khyod ni de ltar brtson pa lags/ /mkhas pa la bstod pa le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// //gang gis khyod drin lan lon pa'i/ /sgrub de mchis
<p>115b</p>
<p>115b.1</p>snyam mi bgyid de/ /skye bo gang dag mya ngan 'das/ /de dag gis kyang lan ma lon/ /khyod kyi chos la gnas de dag /rang don kho na bgyid par bas/ /de yi slad du 'o brgyal gang / /de la lan go ci zhig lon/ /khyod ni sems can gnyid log pa'i/ /rgyud la gzigs pa'i
<p>115b.2</p>zhugs tse ba/ /bag med gyur pa rnams kyi ni/ /grogs bzang bag dang bcas pa lags/ /khyod kyis nyon mongs gzhom pa bshad/ /bdud kyi g.yo dag bstan pa mdzad/ /'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi bzad brjod/ /'jigs pa med pa'i phyogs kyang bstan/ /phan dgongs
<p>115b.3</p>thugs rje can gyis ni/ /sems can rnams la bgyi 'tshal ba/ /gang zhig khyod kyis ma mdzad pa/ /gzhan go ci zhig mchis lags kye/ /gal te chos ni 'di dag dang / /spo ba zhig tu btub na ni/ /gdon mi 'tshal bar khyod kyis ni/ /lha sbyin la brten kun la'ang stsol/ /de
<p>115b.4</p>slad 'gro la brda sprod pa/ /'gro ba'i mgon po khyod kyis ni/ /'di na phan tshun byed pa po/ /med pa skad du nges par gsungs/ /'jig rten rnams la thugs brtse bas/ /yun rings sa stengs dam chos bshad/ /'jig rten gsum phan 'dogs nus pa'i/ /slob ma dam pa'ang
<p>115b.5</p>mang du bskrun/ /mngon du gdul bya'i tshogs kyang ni/ /mdzes bzangs yan chad btul lags pas/ /da go khyod la sems can gyi/ /bu lon lhag ma ci mchis na/ /'di ltar rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sku gdung til 'bru bzhin blags nas/ /mjug tu'ang khyod kyis shin tu ni/ /
<p>115b.6</p>dka' spyad yal bar ma dor ro/ /gzugs kyi sku dang chos 'di dag /gzhan don kho nar mdzad do zhes/ /'jig rten yid ches dka' 'di la/ /khyod kyis mya ngan 'das pa bstan/ /de slad chos sku ma lus pa/ /sras kyi mchog la gtad mdzad de/ /gzugs sku til 'bru ltar
<p>115b.7</p>bshig nas/ /khyod ni yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /e ma'o gnas pa e ma'o tshul/ /e ma'o yon tan e ma'o sku/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams la/ /ya mtshan mi che 'ga' ma mchis/ /phan 'dogs mdzad cing blta na sdug /sku gsung phrin las zhi gyur pa/ /khyod la'ang
<p>116a</p>
<p>116a.1</p>sdang bar rab bgyid pa'i/ /rmongs pa mi bzad pa la gzigs/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho rin chen gter/ /yon tan 'byung gnas chos kyi tshogs/ /khyod la sems can gang 'dud pa/ /de dag la yang phyag 'tshal legs/ /mgon khyod yon tan mi bas kyang / /
<p>116a.2</p>bdag gi zho sha bas 'tshal bas/ /des na 'jigs pa mchis slad du/ /glo ba la ni bcags bzhin mchis/ /khyod kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid/ /tshad ma mchis la bsam mi khyab/ /bstan min grangs kyang ma mchis pa/ /khyod bdag nyid kyis mkhyen lags grang / /mtsho chen chab ni
<p>116a.3</p>bas par ma gyur kyang / /skye bo'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bgyid ltar/ /khyod kyi yon tan cha tsam ma bsgrags kyang / /bdag ni mchog tu glo pa dga' zhing mchis/ /bdag gis thub la dad pas spobs skyes pa'i/ /dge ba'i las 'di'i 'bras bu 'khrungs pa yis/ /ngan rtog rlung dmar
<p>116a.4</p>'tshubs pas dkrugs pa yi/ /'gro ba'i sems ni rnal du gnas par shog /bu lon med par bstod pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o// //brgya lnga bcu pa'i bstod pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po bram ze rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI shrad+d+haka
<p>116a.5</p>ra wa r+m+ma dang / lo tsA ba shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sha ta pany+tsa sha ti ka nA ma s+ya sto tra TI ka /bod skad du/ brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa'i 'grel pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>116a.6</p>spel mar bstod pa phyogs glang pos/ /zab mo nye bar bshad pa ni/ /brgya ni lnga bcu pa yi don/ /rmad byung de las rnam shes nas/ /rgyal ba la ni gus pa yi/ /dga' byed snyan pa'i dge slong gis/ /de yi phyogs la dad pa yis/ /rnam par dbye ba rab tu bya/ /de la 'dir
<p>116a.7</p>brgya lnga bcu pa'i bstod pa re zhig dang por gleng bslang ba dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu dang / sman 'dogs pa'i sgo nas bstod pa dang / bcu gsum du rab tu bstan pa ni 'di lta ste/ gleng bslang ba'i bstod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir gcig tu byas nas
<p>116b</p>
<p>116b.1</p>rgyu la bstod pa'o/ /'bras bu la bstod pa ni dpe med pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum ste/ dpe med pa la bstod pa dang / rmad du byung ba la bstod pa dang / sku la bstod pa zhes bya ba'o/ /sman 'dogs pa'i bstod pa ni snying rje la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa brgyad de/ 
<p>116b.2</p>thugs rje la bstod pa dang / gsung la bstod pa dang / bstan pa la bstod pa dang / smon lam la bstod pa dang / lam la 'jug pa la bstod pa dang / dka' ba mdzad pa la bstod pa dang / mkhas par bstod padang / bu lon med pa la bstod pa zhes bya'o/ /de rnams kyi bsdus
<p>116b.3</p>ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag ni/ gleng bslang bstod dang rgyu la ni/ /rnam drug 'bras bu dpe med dang / /rmad du byung dang de bzhin sku/ /sman 'dogs rnam brgyad de yang ni/ /thugs rje gsung dang bstan pa dang / /smon lam dang ni lam 'jug dang / /dka' mdzad nyid dang mkhas pa dang / /
<p>116b.4</p>bu lon med dang bcu gsum mo/ /bstod pa bcu gsum po de rnams kyi re re'i bshad pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni phyis bshad par bya'o/ /de la gleng bslang ba zhes bya ba ni dang por brtsam pa'o/ /gleng bslang ba der don gang dang gang gis bshad pa zhes bya ba bstan pa dang / rgyu la bstod
<p>116b.5</p>pa la sogs pa rnams la yang tshigs su bcad pa gang gis don gang bshad pa de yang rab tu bshad par bya'o/ /re zhig gleng bslang ba'i bstod pa'i tshig gi don ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu nyid dang de
<p>116b.6</p>bzhin gshegs pa'i nyes pa ma lus pa zad pa rjes su dpag pa dang / yon tan ma lus pa mi shes pas kyang bcom ldan 'das la yon tan gyi phyogs gcig tsam gyis bstod pa dang phyag 'tshal ba'i yon tan gyi phyogs tsam bshad pa zhes bya'o/ /'dir yang bsdus pa'i tshigs
<p>116b.7</p>su bcad pa ni/ ston la skyabs 'gro sogs mchod 'os/ /nyes pa med pa rjes su dpag /yon tan mtha' yas kyang ni chas/ /bstod pa 'dir ni phyag 'tshal phyogs/ /de la gang la'ang rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gnyis brtsam
<p>117a</p>
<p>117a.1</p>par bya ste/ gang zhig la ni nyes pa kun/ /gtan nas yod ye mi mnga' zhing / /gang la'ang rnam pa thams cad du/ /yon tan thams cad gnas gyur pa/ /gal te sems shig yod na ni/ /de nyid la ni skyabs 'gro zhing / /de bstod de ni bkur ba dang / /de
<p>117a.2</p>yi bstan la gnas pa'i rigs/ /gang zhig la ni nyes pa kun/ /zhes smros pa la/ de nyid la ni skyabs su 'gro ba'i rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang sbyar ro/ /gang zhig ces bya ba ni thun mong gi sgra yin yang don gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kho na la 'jug go/
<p>117a.3</p>gang gi phyir nyes pa thams cad zad pa dang yon tan ma lus pa dang ldan pa ni gzhan med pa de'i phyir 'di ltar bshad de/ thams cad mkhyen la yon tan kun/ /mnga' la de yang nyams mi mnga'/ /nyes pa bag chags bcas de yang / /skyob pa gcig pu la mi mnga'/ /
<p>117a.4</p>zhes bya'o/ /nyes pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa ste/ nyes pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyir ro/ /yang na lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyud la nyes pa byed pa ni snod ma yin par byed pa zhes bya bas na nyes pa'o/ /mi mnga' zhes bya ba ni mi mnga' ba ste/ skyon du gyur pa ma brnyes
<p>117a.5</p>pa'i phyir ro/ /yod ye zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spangs pa phun sum tshogs pas ngo mtshar ba gsal bar byed pa'o/ /yang na tshig kha bskang ba'i phyir tshig gi phrad do/ /gang zhig la nyes pa mi mnga' ba de skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa zhes bya'o/ /phyi
<p>117a.6</p>rol gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / slob pa rnams la nyes pa med pa'i phyir skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os su thal bar 'gyur zhes pas na/ de bsal bar bya ba'i phyir 'di bshad de/ thams cad ces bya ba ni ma lus pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gal te phyi rol gyi 'dod
<p>117a.7</p>chags dang bral ba de rnams kyi nyes pa med na yang de bzhin du srid pa'i rtse mo'i nyes pa nges par ma spangs pa'i phyir dang / slob pa po rnams kyi yang ji lta bar sbyor bas khams gsum dang / gnyis dang gcig gi thob pa'i bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams ma spangs pa'i phyir ro/ /dgra
<p>117b</p>
<p>117b.1</p>bcom pa rnams la yang khams gsum gyi nyes pa med na de rnams kyang skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os su thal bar 'gyur zhes pas na bshad pa/ gtan nas zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du'o zhes bya ba'o/ /don gang yin zhe na/ gal te dgra bcom pa rnams la yang
<p>117b.2</p>nyes pa thams cad med mod kyi gtan nas med pa ni ma yin te/ yongs su spangs pa'i dus su yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyis yongs su ma spangs pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'o na rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang nyes pa thams cad gtan nas med pas de la
<p>117b.3</p>yang skyabs su 'gro ba'i mchod 'os su thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bas na de rnams las kyang khyad par du bya ba'i phyir bshad pa/ rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gang gi phyir de rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad du 'dod chags pa la sogs
<p>117b.4</p>pa spangs par ma gyur te/ de rnams kyis bag chags ma spangs pa'i phyir ro/ /de bas na de rnams kyang skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os ma yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das la yang nyes pa thams cad ni gtan nas rnam pa thams cad du mi mnga'o/ /de'i phyir na nyes pa ma
<p>117b.5</p>lus pa shin tu mi mnga' ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kho na la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa yin no zhes bshad do/ /gang zhig la ni nyes pa kun mi mnga'/ /zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'i go rims kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di ltar gdon na rjes su mthun par
<p>117b.6</p>mi 'gyur ro zhes pas na/ tshigs su bcad pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir na gtan nas dang / rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba ni go rims su gdon pa'o/ /phyi rol gyi ri bo la sogs pa'i dngos po rnams la yang gtan nas rnam pa thams cad du nyes pa med na de rnams la yang
<p>117b.7</p>skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os su thal bar 'gyur zhes pas na/ de dag dgag par bya ba'i phyir/ bshad pa thams cad nas rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba ni yon tan thams cad ces bya ba dang sbyar ro/ /yang yon tan thams cad gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang thun
<p>118a</p>
<p>118a.1</p>mong du nyon mongs pa med pa dang smon lam gyi ye shes la sogs pa'o/ /thun mong ma yin pa rnams kyang ma 'dres pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'o/ /de rnams kyang chung ngu dang / 'bring la sogs pa'i dbye bas ni ma yin te/ 'on kyang
<p>118a.2</p>chen po nyid la gnas pa zhes bya bas na bshad pa/ rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba ni khyad par thams cad kyis zhes bya ba'i don to/ /khyad par 'phags par bgyi ba la/ /khyod la thang lhod 'ga' ma byung / /de slad khyod kyi khyad par rnams/ /thog drung rim pa dbyer ma mchis/ /zhes pa gang
<p>118a.3</p>'chad par 'gyur ba'o/ /gang la zhes bya ba ni don gyis bcom ldan 'das kho na dang sbyar ro/ /'ang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni khyad par gyi rgyu gsal bar byed pa'o/ /nyes pa ma lus pa zad par gyur pa dang / yon tan gyi khyad par ma lus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir de nyid la ni skyabs su 'gro ba'i rigs
<p>118a.4</p>so zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'o/ /gnas gyur zhes bya ba ni yang dag par gnas pa ste/ bzhed pa tsam gyi phyir dang / mngon du gyur pa'i nus pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /yon tan ni sngar bshad pa ste/ nyes pa'i gnyen por bgrang zhing goms par byas na zhes bya ba'i phyir ro/ /bshad pa ni 'di
<p>118a.5</p>yin te/ nyes pa med pa tsam gyis yon tan med pa skyabs mi nus so/ /skyabs kyi don ni skyabs kyi don zhes bya ste grub pa'i mtha'o/ /ri bo la sogs pa de rnams kyang yon tan med pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ni nyes pa mi mnga' ba dang / yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /de bas na de nyid
<p>118a.6</p>skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa yin gyi ri bo la sogs pa ni ma yin zhes bya'o/ /de nyid kyi phyir mang po skyabs su 'gro ba ni/ ri bo dag dang nags tshal dang / /skyed mos tshal dang shing drung dang / /mi rnams 'jigs pas bsdigs pa yi/ /skyabs 'gro 'di ni mchog ma
<p>118a.7</p>yin/ /skyabs 'gro 'di ni dam pa min/ /de la skyabs su 'gro bas ni/ /sdug bsngal kun las grol mi 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad du yon tan gnas par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos la sogs pa rnams las khyad
<p>118b</p>
<p>118b.1</p>par du gyur pa'i phyir skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa yin na yang de bzhin du spangs pa phun sum tshogs pas kyang bcom ldan 'das bstod par 'gyur ro zhes bya bas na/ gtan nas rnam pa thams cad du/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bshad do/ /
<p>118b.2</p>de zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i nyes pa thams cad mi mnga' ba dang / yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa yang ngo / /nyid ces bya ba ni nges par gzung ba'o/ /nges par gzung ba gang yin pa na/ skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'o/ /de ltar gyur ba las gzhan pa ni skyabs su 'gro ba
<p>118b.3</p>la sogs pa'i snod ma yin no zhes bya ba'o/ /skyabs 'gro zhing zhes bya ba ni skyabs khas blangs pa'i phyir ro/ /skyabs kyi don ni skyabs kyi don/ /zhes sngar bshad de/ des ni yid kyi las la spro bar byed do/ /de bstod ces bya ba ni yang dag par gyur pa'i yon tan la bstod pa'o/ /
<p>118b.4</p>'gro ba'i rigs zhes bya ba ni thams cad la sbyar ro/ /des ni ngag gi las la spro bar byed do/ /de ni bkur ba dang zhes bya ba ni thal mo sbyar ba la sogs pas bsnyen bkur bya zhes par dgongs pas so/ /des ni lus kyi las la spro bar byed do/ /de'i bstan la gnas zhes bya ba ni
<p>118b.5</p>lus dang ngag dang yid dag gis des bkag pa mi spyad pa dang / rjes su gnang ba sgrub par byed pa'o/ /de lta bus ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la gnas par 'gyur te/ des ni sgrub pa la spro bar byed do/ /rigs pa zhes bya ba ni rigs pa las ma 'das pa ste/ rigs
<p>118b.6</p>pa dang mthun pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gal te sems shig yod na ni/ /zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la phan pa'i sems gzung bar bya ste/ gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bdag la phan par sems pas na zhes bya'o/ /gzhan du na phyugs rnams la yang sems yod de/ de rnams
<p>118b.7</p>kyis ni nyes pa dang yon tan brtag pa'i nus pa dman pas bdag la phan par mi sems pa'o/ /de bas na bdag la phan par sems pa gang yin pa des ni nyes pa thams cad mi mnga' ba dang / yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa la skyabs su 'gro ba bya ba dang / de'i bstan pa
<p>119a</p>
<p>119a.1</p>la gnas par bya'o zhes bstan to/ /de lta bas na tshigs su bcad pa de gnyis kyis ni ston pa la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os bstan to/ /dgongs pa gang gis slob dpon 'di nyid kyis skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa 'di lta
<p>119a.2</p>bus gsal bar byas so zhes bya ba bshad par bya ste/ 'dir yang slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos zhar la bstan to/ /kha cig na re skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa mi shes pas 'di skad zer te/ de ring gang la skyabs su mchi/ /ji srid bdag la sems yod
<p>119a.3</p>na/ /gang gi bstan la gnas pa dang / /gang bstod gang la bsnyen bkur bgyi/ /zhes bya ba de'i phyir/ gtan nas rnam pa thams cad du/ /zhes bya ba rgyas par slob dpon gyis bshad do/ /'dir yang 'di ltar 'chad par 'dod pas gang gi phyir 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i
<p>119a.4</p>'jig rten pas skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa tshol bar byed pa de rnams gang la 'jigs pa gang gis 'di nyid smras pa zhes bya'o/ /'di nyid spel ma'i spel mar gnas brtan shAkya blos bshad pa ni/ 'bar zhing tsha ba'i 'dod chags sogs/ /me yis lus ni
<p>119a.5</p>bsregs gyur cing / /skye mched kun la gnod byed pa'i/ /dmyal bar yid ni skrag gyur pas/ /de ring gang la skyabs su mchi/ /zhes pa ni rgyas pa'o/ /bshad pa ni 'di yin te/ 'dod chags la sogs pa'i mes yang dag par gdungs pa'i lus dang ldan pa dbang po kun la
<p>119a.6</p>gnod pa'i dmyal ba las yid skrag nas skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa tshol bar byed pa dag gi dbang du byas nas/ gtan nas rnam pa thams cad du/ /zhes bya ba ni rgyas par bshad do/ /skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa de dang 'dra ba gang yin zhe na/ 
<p>119a.7</p>mngon sum du ma bshad pa de'i phyir 'di bshad par bya ste/ /thams cad mkhyen la yon tan kun/ /mnga' la de yang nyams mi mnga'/ /nyes pa bag chags bcas de yang / /skyob pa gcig pu la mi mnga'/ /nyes pa bag chags bcas de zhes bya ba la/ bag chags dang bcas
<p>119b</p>
<p>119b.1</p>par 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni bag chags bcas pa ste nyes pa'o/ /de la bag chags zhes bya ba gang yin zhe na/ de la gsung rab la mkhas pa kha cig ni ji ltar me tog dang bcas pa'i til rnams kyi dri dang ldan pa'i me tog bsal na yang de dang 'dra ba'i dri gzhan 'byung zhes zer ro/ /yang
<p>119b.2</p>na ji ltar lu gu rgyud du sprel ba las grol ba'i skyes bus yun ring por goms pa'i dbang gis sngar gyi 'gro ba dang 'dra bar 'gro ba de bzhin du nyes pa spangs par gyur na yang 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi nyes pa'i bud shing bstan pa'i phyir dang / 'phags pa'i lam gyi me myur ba ma
<p>119b.3</p>yin pa'i phyir seng ldeng gi bud shing gi dman pa'i mes bsregs pa'i sol ba dang 'dra ba nyes pa dang mtshungs pa sems dang sems las byung ba'i khyad par lung du ma bstan pa rgyud la lhag mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bag chags zhes bya'o/ /gang gi phyir de bzhin du 'phags pa shA
<p>119b.4</p>ri'i bu'i chags pa'i bag chags thos pa ni gang gi tshe gnas brtan mod gal gyi bu chen po'i yan lag dang nying lag bram ze rab tu byung ba dbyig pa'i gtsug phud can gyis dbyug pas brdegs shing bu ram gyi shing dang 'dra bar brdungs pa de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgras de sman pa dag la
<p>119b.5</p>gtad de zhag bdun gyis 'di sos par gyis shig /gzhan du na khyod kyi rnyed pa kun du dbral bar bya'o zhes pa na/ slob dpon de yang rgan pa'i phyir dang / shin tu brdegs pa'i phyir gso bar ma nus pa de'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar dogs par gyur to/ /de'i yang yongs
<p>119b.6</p>su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa'i dgongs pa shes nas thog ma med pa'i dus kyi rgyud la bag chags kyi lhag ma dang ldan pa 'phags pa shA ri'i bu dge slong khri phrag bdun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa snga dro yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de'i 'chi ba bzod ma nus pas gnas brtan
<p>119b.7</p>mod gal gyi bu chen po dge slong stong phrag bdun cu rtsa drug dang bcas pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das zhes bya'o/ /chu bo gang+gAs kyang de'i nyin la gtsug lag khang khyer bas na gnas brtan pi lin+da'i bus gzugs 'tshong ma rengs par gyur cig ces chu bo gang+gA la smras so/ /de ni tshe
<p>120a</p>
<p>120a.1</p>snga ma la bram ze yin pas na de ni de'i nga rgyal gyi bag chags so/ /de bas na skye bo'i rtsod pas chu bo gang+gA la dmod pa dor ro zhes bya ste/ de'i phyir na de dang 'dra ba'i bag chags dang bcas pa zhes bya'o/ /des bas na nyon mongs ba'i bud shing dman pa'i phyir dang / 
<p>120a.2</p>'phags pa'i lam gyi me shin tu rno ba'i phyir mar dang til mar gyi rno ba'i mes bsregs pa'i dngos po dang 'dra ba'i skyon ni mi mnga' ste spangs pa'i phyir ro/ /gang gi yin zhe na/ skyob pa zhes bya bar bshad do/ /ji ltar bdag gi rgyud la de/ /bag chags lhag ma'ang ma lus pa/ /
<p>120a.3</p>de ltar rnam pa thams cad du/ /nyes pa khyod kyis rab tu bcom/ /zhes de ltar 'chad par 'gyur te/ gang zhig la ni de lta bu'i nyes pa med pa dang / 'di lta bu'i yon tan mnga' ba de ni skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis khas blangs so/ /de
<p>120a.4</p>bzhin du yang bcom ldan 'das kyi ni ji ltar bshad pa'i nyes pa mi mnga' ba dang yon tan kho na mnga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de yang zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bshad pa'i rnam pa can gyi nyes pa gzung ngo / /nyes pa zhes bya ba'i don ni bshad zin te/ mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba yang ngo / /gcig pu zhes
<p>120a.5</p>bya ba ni nges par 'dzin pa'o/ /gcig kho na yin gyi gnyis pa ni ma yin no/ /gcig gang zhe na/ bshad pa/ skyob pa'i dbang thob pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /bcom ldan 'das gcig pu chos rnams la skyob pa zhes bya ste/ skyob pa gzhan med do zhes bya bas na de ltar gsungs pa'o/ /
<p>120a.6</p>yang na ta spri khams ni skyong ba'i don te nges par Ni ni'i rkyen can no/ /des na gdul bya'i dus 'das nas nges par skyob par byed pas na/ skyob pa zhes bshad do/ /chu srin gyi gzhi rgya mtshos kyang / /dus ni shin tu 'da' byed la/ /gdul bya'i sems can rnams kyi ni/ /dus las
<p>120a.7</p>sangs rgyas 'da' mi mdzad/ /ces de bzhin du gsungs pa'o/ /kun zhes bya ba ni yon tan dang sbyar ro/ /thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad mkhyen par gyur pas na thams cad mkhyen pa ni yon tan dang ye shes kyi khyad par ro/ /yang na thams
<p>120b</p>
<p>120b.1</p>cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba ni drug pa'i mtha' can te skyob pa dang sbyar ro/ /de yang zhes bya ba ni yon tan no/ /nyams mi mnga' zhes bya ba ni mi 'gyur ba'i ngang tshul can no/ /des ni ston pa'i chos nyid mi nyams pa bstan to/ /yang na nyams pa mi mnga' ba ni nyes pa mi mnga' ba skyob pa
<p>120b.2</p>thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/ /de'i yon tan la bstod pa brjod pas ni bcom ldan 'das kho na la bstod pa dang sbyar ro/ /de'i phyir na nyes pa bag chags dang bcas pa ma lus pa spangs pa dang / yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba yang bcom ldan 'das la
<p>120b.3</p>skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa'i rgyu bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyes pa bag chags dang bcas pa yang mi mnga' ba zhes ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur zhe na bshad pa/ 'dir rjes su dpag pa bshad par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang ni/ /gsung dang
<p>120b.4</p>thugs kyi phrin las la/ /zhe 'gras gyur pa gang gis kyang / /chos dang ldan par glags mi rnyed/ /zhe 'gras gyur pas mi rnyed ces bya ba ni rgyas pa'o/ /mi zhes bya ba ni dgag pa bshad pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi la glags mi rnyed ces bya ba dang 'dir sbyar ro/ /kyang zhes bya ba
<p>120b.5</p>ni gang gi zhes bya ba'i don la'o/ /gang du mi rnyed ce na bshad pa/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs zhes bya ste/ sku gsung thugs so/ /phrin las kyi sgra ni re re dang sbyar ro/ /gang gis mi rnyed ce na bshad pa/ zhes 'gras pa zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'o/ /
<p>120b.6</p>rtog pa chung ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi 'on kyang skyon tshol bal gzhol bas kyang zhes bya ba'i don to/ /char dus kyi zla ba bzhi'i bar du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'dug pa phyi ma'i mis skyes bu chen po'i mtshang btsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa rnams dpyad par bya ba'i phyir
<p>120b.7</p>yang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyes pa tsam yang ma mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni mdo'i don to/ /'o na mdzes ma rab tu byung ba la brten pas mu stegs pa gzhan gyis glags rnyed do zhes bya bas na/ bshad pa/ chos dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sgra ni bden pa la 'jug pa'o/ /
<p>121a</p>
<p>121a.1</p>nges na bshad pa ni 'di yin te/ bden pa dang bcas par 'jug pa gang yin pa des ni glags mi rnyed do/ /gang gis bden pa spangs nas bcom ldan 'das la smod par byed pa de la dgag pa lta smos ci dgos/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa bltams pas mu stegs pa
<p>121a.2</p>de rnams rnyed pa dang bkur sti ma rnyed pas mdzes ma rab tu byung ba rang gis bsad nas bcom ldan 'das la mi bsngags pa'i gtam bsgrags pa ni dge sbyong gau ta mas 'di ni bsnyen bkur byed du bcug nas bsad do zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas mu stegs pa kha cig rnyed pa dang bkur sti rnyed pas
<p>121a.3</p>'thab krol mkhan gyi mu stegs pa gzhan la smras pa/ mdzes ma khyed cag rang gis bsad na dge sbyong gau ta ma la smod dam zhes pa rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas yul nas bskrad do/ /de bzhin du tsi tsa dka' thub ma'i mi bsngags pa'i dpe brjod par bya'o/ /rnyed pa zhes
<p>121a.4</p>bya ba ni 'thob pa'o/ /gang gis zhes bya ba ni zhe 'gras pa dang sbyar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i tshig go/ /glags zhes bya ba ni skyon tshol ba dang / nyes pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/ /gal te nyes pa yod na de las byung ba'i sku
<p>121a.5</p>dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las kyi tshul dang mi mthun pa'i spyod pa tshol na su zhig gis rnyed par 'gyur ba ste/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa la nyes pa mi mnga'o/ /de lta bus ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyes pa zad pa'i rjes su dpag pa bstan nas/ bstod pa bya ba'i dgos pa
<p>121a.6</p>bshad par bya ste/ 'khor ba thog ma med par lce gcod pa dang / ngan song du skye ba la sogs pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni bdag bslus pa yin no/ /rgya mtshor gnya' shing bu ga ru/ /zhes bya ba'i rgya
<p>121a.7</p>che bas tshigs su bcad pa gnyis bshad par bya ste/ rgya mtshor gnya' shing bu ga ru/ /rus sbal mgrin pa tshud pa ltar/ /dam chos dga' ston cher bcas pa'i/ /mi nyid bdag gis thob nas ni/ /mi rtag nyid dang rjes 'brel zhing / /las kyi glags la dogs bcas pa/ /bdag
<p>121b</p>
<p>121b.1</p>gi lce 'di nyid kyis go/ /snying po ci phyir blang mi bya/ /bdag gis zhes bya bas ni bdag nyid bstan to/ /thob nas zhes bya ba ni thob pa'o/ /mi nyid ni skye ba'o/ /dam chos dga' ston cher bcas pa/ /zhes bya ba ni mi nyid kyi khyad par ro/ /dam pa'i chos ni dam pa'i chos so/ /
<p>121b.2</p>yang na mdzes pa'i chos ni dam pa'i chos so/ /gal te chos kyi sgra 'di ni gsung rab dang mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa mang po la 'jug pa yang de bzhin du 'dir yang sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab brjod pa'o/ /de bzhin du mdo las chos bstan pa yang nye bar zhi ba dang / yongs
<p>121b.3</p>su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o/ /chen po yang yin la dga' ston yang yin pas na dga' ston chen po ste/ mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa dag gi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro/ /dam chos dga' ston chen po dang 'dra ba ni dga' ston chen po'o/ /
<p>121b.4</p>dam chos dga' ston chen po dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni dam chos dga' ston chen po dang bcas pa ste mi nyid thob nas zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro/ /rgya mtsho ni rgya mtsho chen po'o/ /de la gnya' shing ni thod 'dzin pa'i yo byad do/ /de'i bu ga ni bu ga'o/ /de la rus sbal gyi mgrin pa ni
<p>121b.5</p>de ru tshud pa'o/ /rgya mtshor gnya' shing bu ga ru/ /rus sbal mgrin pa tshud pa ltar ni mi nyid dpe gang la yod pa de ni rgya mtshor gnya' shing bu ga ru rus sbal mgrin pa tshud pa dang 'dra ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ dge slong dag 'dir sa chen po chu bo
<p>121b.6</p>gcig dang / rgya mtsho gcig tu gyur to zhes bya ba rgya che bas gleng gzhi dang yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo sde'o/ /de la yan lag gi don ni 'di yin te/ ji ltar rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa rlung gis phan tshun shin tu g.yo ba bu ga gcig dang ldan pa'i gnya' shing gi bu gar lo brgya 'das
<p>121b.7</p>nas lan cig ldang ba'i rus sbal gyi mgrin pa bya rog dang shing ta la'i 'bras bu'i rigs pas dka' bas 'jug pa de bzhin du ngan song gi rgya mtsho chen por lhung ba'i srog chags mi dge ba'i las kyi lam chen po'i rlung gis bdas pas mi'i 'gro ba la 'jug pa rnyed pa dka' ba zhes bya'o/ /
<p>122a</p>
<p>122a.1</p>de bas na mi nyid rnyed par dka' ba thob nas ci zhig bya zhe na/ smras pa/ mi rtag nyid dang rjes 'brel zhing / /zhes smos pa la/ mi rtag pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa'i rgyu'o/ /kha cig na re 'jig pa kho na zhes zer ro/ /de dang 'brel ba ni rtag tu mi rtag pa'i rjes su 'gro ba ste/ 
<p>122a.2</p>'dus byas pa rnams skad cig mas 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /bdag gi lce zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir bde ba'i skal pa dang bcas pa'i mi rtag pa nyid bstan nas/ 'tsho ba nyid kyi bdag gi lce'i nye bar 'tsho ba bshad par bya ste/ las kyi glags la dogs bcas pa/ /
<p>122a.3</p>zhes bya ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las byed pa'i mi rnams gang yin pa de rnams las dge ba'i las las byung ba ni mi nyid do/ /dge ba'i las de rnams kyi mi dge ba'i las rnams ni glags so/ /de dang dogs pa ni som nyi dang bcas pa ste/ 'tsho ba nyid kyi lce gcod pa dang / nad
<p>122a.4</p>la sogs pa rnams zil gyis gnon pa yod pa'i phyir ro/ /snying po blang ba ni blang ba'o/ /lce'i snying po gang yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la yang dag par bstod pa'o/ /de bzhin du yang bshad pa/ dam chos tshig gi snying po ste/ de las gzhan pa bya rog sgra/ /
