<p>181a.5</p>dang thar pa'i phyir/ /yon tan goms byas bdag gi min/ /gal te sems shig yod na ni/ /de nyid la ni skyabs 'gro zhing / /de bstod de ni bkur ba dang / /de yi bstan la gnas pa'i rigs/ /gang zhig nyes de gzhan la gnod/ /de ni yon tan gang
<p>181a.6</p>gzhan smad/ /nyes pa rang gi nyes bcom pa/ /'tsho ba rang don yon tan no/ /thams cad mkhyen la yon tan kun/ /mnga' la de yang nyams mi mnga'/ /nyes pa bag chags bcas de yang / /skyob pa gcig pu la mi mnga'/ /spyod pa la ni mi smod phyir/ /
<p>181a.7</p>thub pa skyon ni med par grub/ /bde bar grags pa'i chos spangs nas/ /skye bo dkar ba smod pa med/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang ni/ /gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las la/ /zhe 'gras gyur pa gang gis kyang / /chos dang ldan par glags mi rnyed/ /che ba'i yon
<p>181b</p>
<p>181b.1</p>tan cha yis kyang / /tshig rnyed nges par ma blangs par/ /gal te ston bstod mi byed na/ /mi [(]kham [,]khom [)]gnas bzhin bdag bcom 'gyur/ /rgya mtshor gnya' shing bu ga ru/ /rus sbal mgrin pa chud pa ltar/ /dam chos dga' ston cher bcas pa'i/ /mi nyid bdag gis
<p>181b.2</p>thob nas ni/ /mang du bcad par gyur pa ste/ /mthar yang bskal pa'i skyon gyis gnas/ /lce ni don can ma gyur te/ /gzhan du bdag ni bslus par gyur/ /mi rtag nyid dang rjes 'brang zhing / /las kyi glags la dogs bcas pa/ /bdag gi lce 'di nyid kyis go/ /
<p>181b.3</p>snying po ci phyir blang mi bya/ /yon tan gyi mtha' ma rtogs pas/ /gal te bstod pa mi byed na/ /shA ri'i bu la sogs pas kyang / /nges par bstod par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar thub pa'i yon tan gyis/ /yul lta grangs med shes mod kyis / /rang gi don la gus pa yis/ /
<p>181b.4</p>de yi phyogs gcig bsgrims te brjod/ /gang zhig gzhan la slob pa dang / /dman phyir legs par ma bslabs gang / /nyes pa zad kyang de slob cing / /gang phyir don gyis khyod mi slob/ /gang gi yon tan grangs dag dang / /mthu la thug pa ma mchis la/ /rmad byung phrin las
<p>181b.5</p>dpag med can/ /rang byung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan grangs kyi mthu yis ni/ /slob la smra bar nus pa dang / /mtha' can gzhal bar byed nus kyi/ /mi slob pa yi mdun du min/ /'di snyed bgyi ba'i mtha' med na/ /'di ltar lags zhes ci zhig smos/ /khyod kyi yon
<p>181b.6</p>tan slad du bdag /bsod nams snyam nas spyi brtol skyes/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las bstod pa gleng bslang ba zhes bya ba ste le'u dang po'o// //bde nas snying rje med pa ni/ /spyod dam mi spyod rnam
<p>181b.7</p>mi spyod/ /rang gi bde bas gzhan dbang phyir/ /de nyid dang ni nges par sbyar/ /spyod dam mi spyod snyam pa yi/ /rnam par rtog pa rnam spangs nas/ /'gro ba 'di ni nyam thag ces/ /khyod bdag nyid kyis zhal gyis bzhes/ /snying rje rnam par spangs nas ni/ /gzhan gyi gzhan ni
<p>182a</p>
<p>182a.1</p>bcol ba byed/ /la lar bdag phan la brtson pas/ /rang gi bde phyir rab tu 'jug /khyod ni ma bcol legs mdzad pa/ /khyod ni rgyu med bzhin du byams/ /khyod ni ma 'dris mdza' bshes te/ /'brel pa med pa'i gnyen 'dun lags/ /sbyin pa'i
<p>182a.2</p>pha rol phyin pa'i phyir/ /thugs rjes 'gro ba blangs nas ni/ /slong la dgyes pa 'phel 'gyur ba/ /ba spu du ma ldang dang bcas/ /nyid kyi sha yang stsol mdzad na/ /dngos po gzhan lta smos ci 'tshal/ /legs mdzad khyod kyi srog kyang ni/ /slong ba'i skye bo rnams la btang / /
<p>182a.3</p>bdag la bdag nyid spangs nas ni/ /gzhan la bdag nyid blangs pas na/ /rtswa yis rin chen rigs chen ltar/ /dgyes pa mi nyams ldan pa yis/ /nyid kyi sku dang srog dag gis/ /lus can gshed mas zin rnams kyis/ /lus dang srog kyang khyod kyis ni/ /lan brgya
<p>182a.4</p>phrag tu bslu ba mdzad/ /'jig rten bdag lta'i bsam pa can/ /snying rje'i sems ni med pa ste/ /sdug bsngal 'jigs sam bde 'dod pas/ /tshul khrims kun du blangs nas srung / /ngan 'gros bsnyengs slad ma lags la/ /bzhed pa'i 'gro ba'ang sgrub ma
<p>182a.5</p>lags/ /dgongs pa dag pa 'ba' zhig gis/ /khyod kyis tshul khrims goms par mdzad/ /phyi rol rkyen gyis ma rdzogs dang / /rang sbyor phun tshogs med pa'i phyir/ /bsam pa rnam par dag pas kyang / /tshul khrims pha rol dag mi 'gyur/ /rtag tu gya gyu rnam spangs
<p>182a.6</p>shing / /drang brtan rnams ni rtag bsten pas/ /yongs su dag pa'i las rnams kyis/ /khyod ni gzhi rten gcig pur gyur/ /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i rgyu/ /thugs rje'i dbang gis mchod bya yang / /ma 'ongs sdug bsngal bsnyengs pa yis/ /gzhan nyid rang nyid la
<p>182a.7</p>nyes pas/ /sdug bsngal mang pos gzir ba ni/ /khyod kyis dga' ba'i thugs kyi ni/ /nyon mongs rnams ni sran btsugs nas/ /skye bo nyon mongs can la brtse/ /gzir bar gyur pa rnams la yang / /nyes pa rnams ni mi sems pa/ /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin 'dod phyir/ /
<p>182b</p>
<p>182b.1</p>byas pa nyid ni rjes lta bas/ /khyod kyis gzhan gyi don slad du/ /sku srog btang nas dgyes gyur gang / /de 'dra srog chags 'gum pa las/ /sos pa rnams la'ang byung ma gyur/ /phan byed mchod pas dga' gyur pa/ /ngo mtshar che ba'i sems mi rtsi/ /mgon po khyod ni
<p>182b.2</p>dgyes pa gang / /bdag gi de ni ngo mtshar dgongs/ /khyod ni lan 'ga' ma lags par/ /gtubs kyang sdug bsngal mi dgongs par/ /gshed ma bgyid pa'i sems can la'ang / /gtso bo thugs rjer gyur pa gang / /gang yang gshed ma nyid kyis ni/ /ral gri
<p>182b.3</p>nyid kyis bcad byas nas/ /byang chub gnyer bar gzigs nas ni/ /byams pa la ni bzhugs par gyur/ /khyod kyi thugs ni rin po che/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa bon te/ /dpa' khyod kho nas snying por mkhyen/ /de gzhan skye bos 'ol mi mchis/ /de ltar bdag nyid
<p>182b.4</p>gyur pa yang / /sems can rtag tu sdug bsngal can/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas chos rnams la/ /so sor brtags nas brtson 'grus bya/ /dka' spyad las ni ma bgyis par/ /go 'phang rnyed dka' mi 'thob ces/ /de slad nyid la'ang ma gzigs par/ /khyod kyis brtson
<p>182b.5</p>'grus legs par spel/ /khyad par yon tan rnyed nas ni/ /nyes pa rnam par spangs pa dang / /sems can don du khur khyer yang / /thugs ni kun du mi bsnyel te/ /khyad par 'phags par bgyi ba la/ /khyod la thang lhod 'ga' ma byung / /de slad khyod kyi khyad par rnams/ /
<p>182b.6</p>thog drung rim par dbyer ma mchis/ /bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa ni/ /dag pa'i rjes su cis mi mchi/ /lta dang nga rgyal snang med pa/ /gang gi shes rab kyis ni bsal/ /thugs ni thugs rje chen po dang / /rtag tu rjes su 'brel slad du/ /ting 'dzin 'bras bur bcas pa
<p>182b.7</p>yi/ /shin tu bde la'ang khyod ma chags/ /kha cig mu stegs pa rnams ni/ /longs spyod kyis ni nges legs 'thad/ /gzhan la gcig tu nyid kyis ni/ /longs spyod dgag pa ma mdzad do/ /gzhan dang thun mong ma lags pa'i/ /bde ba gang de gya nom yang / /dam pa'i
<p>183a</p>
<p>183a.1</p>spyod ldan khyod 'dra la/ /gnod par bas kyi sman ma mchis/ /khyod kyi shes rab mtshungs min te/ /dud 'gro du ma rnams la yang / /gang zhig ye shes rnam dag phyir/ /ji ltar rjes su mchi mi bgyid/ /'dres pa la ni legs bshad nyid / /snying po skyon med
<p>183a.2</p>nyi tshe zhig /khyod kyi kun bzhes thugs la bzhag /nyes bshad dug bzhin yongs su spangs/ /legs bshad chen po sku srog gis/ /tshigs su bcad pa'i phyed tsam yang / /gang zhig shes rab rnam 'phel phyir/ /ji ltar rjes su mchi mi bgyid/ /khyod nyid gcig pus
<p>183a.3</p>rnam mkhyen mdzad/ /rin chen snying po mkhyen khyod kyis/ /legs bshad srog gis mjal ba na/ /skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /byang chub slad du dpa' stsal bstan/ /sems can brtson 'grus 'phags pa ni/ /grangs med par ni gyur pa yang / /spyod med zha bo rnams kyi
<p>183a.4</p>gang / /skye bos thob par mi nus so/ /de slad grangs med gsum dag tu/ /khyod ni de ltar brtson pa na/ /brtson 'grus 'ba' zhig 'grogs gyur pas/ /go 'phang bla na med pa brnyes/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyed pa zhes
<p>183a.5</p>bya ba las rgyu'i sgo nas bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o// //yon tan thams cad cung zad gzigs/ /gsol pa na yang mnal mi mnga'/ /nye bar blangs pa brtan mdzad cing / /khyad par la ni thugs ni chags/ /mtho la phrag dog mi mdzad cing / /
<p>183a.6</p>dman la rngan chen mi mdzad la/ /mnyam la 'gran pa ma mchis pas/ /khyod ni 'jig rten gtso bor gyur/ /bka' bas sgrub la nyams mi mnga'/ /yun ring du ni mi gnas shing / /chags bcas kyang ni phal che ba/ /'bras bu las ni shin tu chung / /khyod ni yon tan rgyu rnams
<p>183a.7</p>la/ /mngon dgyes 'bras bu rnams la min/ /yang dag sgrub pa de nyid kyis/ /khyod ni yon tan pha mthar phyin/ /thub dbang nyid ni dka' bas grub/ /de ltar smra ba'i skye bo rnams/ /snying rje phongs pas mi sems pa/ /brtson 'grus mi g.yo blangs nas ni/ /ji ltar
<p>183b</p>
<p>183b.1</p>khyod kyi zhabs rdul yang / /bsod nams skye ba mched gyur pa/ /de ltar khyod kyi longs spyad pas/ /bdag nyid rab tu bskrun pa mdzad/ /'jig rten pa yi 'phags lam dang / /brtson 'grus shes rab kyis kyang ni/ /tshe rabs snga ma'i mthar yang ni/ /khyod ni yang dag
<p>183b.2</p>byung ba yis/ /nyes pa nyams smad rtsa nas bton/ /yon tan spel nas rnam par sbyangs/ /gzhung lugs bzang po des na khyod/ /grub mchog lhag par brnyes pa lags/ /rtag tu ngal zhing mgon med pa/ /slong zhing bde ba ma mchis te/ /sems can rnams la
<p>183b.3</p>nyams med pa'i/ /nyon mongs mang po spyod mthong nas/ /ji ltar bdag gi rgyud la de/ /bag chags lhag ma'ang ma lus pa/ /de ltar rnam pa thams cad du/ /nyes pa khyod kyis rab tu bcom/ /gzhan gyi phun tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /khyod ni gtso bor mthong nas ni/ /
<p>183b.4</p>bdag gi yon tan dman pa'i phyir/ /gzhan min brtson 'grus phrin las can/ /ji ltar gzhan la de dag dang / /'dra ba tsam yang mi gda' ba/ /de ltar khyod kyis bsags bsags nas/ /bdag nyid la ni yon tan bsgrub / /chung dang dman dang 'tsho ba med/ /kha na
<p>183b.5</p>ma tho chags bcas dang / /tshim par mi byed legs mtha' med/ /thun mong gsal dang mi ldan te/ /'jig rten pa yis dpe dngos kun/ /gegs bgyid pa dang sgrib pa can/ /re zhig pa dang nyi tshe ba/ /shin tu rnyed par sla ba lags/ /mang ba dang ni rab kyi
<p>183b.6</p>rab/ /kun tu mtsho dang dri ma gcod/ /tshim par mdzad dang bde mtha' can/ /thun mong min pa'i snang ba mnga'/ /khyod kyi yon tan bla med la/ /gegs bgyid ma mchis rtog ma mchis/ /brtan pa dang ni rgyun chags pas/ /dpe lta mchis par ga la 'gyur/ /nyan
<p>183b.7</p>thos blo mchog rnams kyis kyang / /bskal pa rnams kyis ma rtogs pa/ /lha ma yin gyis gting rnyed pa'i/ /khyod kyi dgongs 'dra ga la mchis/ /gang tshe khyod kyis dgongs pa'i dkyel/ /gting dang pha rol med brtags na/ /rgya mtsho zab pa nyid kyang ni/ /gnag rjes
<p>184a</p>
<p>184a.1</p>lta bur sa ler gda'/ /'dod pa'i mtha' la ma chags pas/ /gang zhig kha cig gis skyon min/ /khyod kyi bka' ni brtan bcas pa/ /su zhig gis ni mjal bar nus/ /chos rnams kun gyi mi bskyod pa/ /khyod kyis brtan pa mngon bsam na/ /
<p>184a.2</p>sa yi brtan pa nyid kyang ni/ /shir sha'i ge sar rtse ltar chung / /bde ba 'dod pas phyi rol pa/ /nyi ma'i rjes su nyal byed de/ /khyod ni nyi ma dang mtshungs min/ /thun mong gi ni dbye bar brjod/ /thub pa khyod kyi ye shes kyi/ /snang bas mi shes rab rib dag /'joms
<p>184a.3</p>pa'i thad na nyi ma yang / /me khyer tsam du mi spyod do/ /sbyor dang bsam pa dag pa yis/ /sngon yang nyes pa mi mnga' la/ /khyod kyi spyod pa bsam min pas/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni sus bsam nus/ /khyod kyi gsung thugs mdzad spyod rnams/ /dag pa'i gan na ston zla
<p>184a.4</p>dang / /chu dang nam mkha'i dag pa rnams/ /dri ma can nyid lta bur gda'/ /gzhal du med pa'i yon tan rnams/ /dpe yi tshul kyis sus gzhal nus/ /khyad par la ni sbyor ba'i phyir/ /tshig tsam yang ni mang po yin/ /'jig rten legs pa gang ci'ang rung / /thams cad sngo
<p>184a.5</p>na'ang der bas te/ /nyon mongs 'jig rten chos rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas chos la khyad mi 'khor / /bse ru'i rwa dang 'dra ba gang / /gang yang khyod kyi rjes 'gro slob/ /grol ba tsam gyis khyod dang mtshungs/ /rmad byung yon tan nyid kyis min/ /rin chen chos gang brnyes
<p>184a.6</p>nas khyod/ /mchog tu gyur pa de nyid dang / /khyod du bsgrun zhing de dang ni/ /khyod dang bsgrun ldon kho nar bas/ /yang na de yang khyod mtshungs min/ /gang phyir gnyis ka mnyam pa ni/ /tshad ma mkhan gyis brjod mi nus/ /des ni sus kyang rtogs mi 'gyur/ /gang la spyi tsam
<p>184a.7</p>bsgrun nas ni/ /cung zad brjod par bgyis pa de/ /smra ba po yi rang dga' dang / /thabs dang gcam bu tsam du bas/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las dpe med par bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum pa'o// //
<p>184b</p>
<p>184b.1</p>'gro las bdud las rnam par rgyal/ /rjes su dpag pas rnam par lhag /khyod kyi nyan thos kyis kyang ni/ /mnyam gnas bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /khyod ni bdud las rnam rgyal te/ /'gro kun dad par mdzad pa yang / /bdag gi chos nyid rjes bsams nas/ /
<p>184b.2</p>chen po ltar gang ma mthong ngo / /khyod ni stobs gnas ma yin yang / /gang gis rgyal bar bya ba'i rigs/ /de yis srid gzhan rgyal ba'i phyir/ /bdud kyi bran dang mngag gzhug rnams/ /sdang bas gol par rtsol byed pa/ /mang po'ang gzhol bar bya ba ni/ /khyad
<p>184b.3</p>par gnas la brten pa yi/ /bzod pa'i tshegs su mtshar mi che/ /g.yeng ba'i rkyen dang mjal na yang / /gzhan la mi bsten pa yis ni/ /'khor ba thog ma med pa ni/ /khyod bdag nyid kyis dgyes par mdzad/ /gang tshe bdud rnams mngon btul ba/ /de yi nub mo kho na
<p>184b.4</p>la/ /nyon mongs shin tu che spangs pa/ /de nyid rmad du byung ba lags/ /gang gi de ltar bsam min yang / /lhag par nyon mongs las rgyal gyur/ /skye bo gzhan dang thun mong gang / /mu stegs las rgyal de smos ci/ /'od zer phreng ba stong ldan pa'i/ /nyi mas mun
<p>184b.5</p>bsal gang lags dang / /dpa' bo khyod kyis mu stegs las/ /rgyal bar mdzad pa ci zhig mtshar/ /chags sdang gti mug bcas pa dang / /de nyid dang ni 'gro ba srid/ /phra rgyas spangs pa rnams kyis ni/ /rgol ba'i tshe na rnam dpyod yin/ /'dod chags bral bas
<p>184b.6</p>chags bcas dang / /zhe sdang bral bas zhe sdang can/ /gti mug bral bas rmongs pa ste/ /gsum pos rtag tu gsum dag btul/ /btang snyoms gnas la gnas pa gang / /ngo mtshar min zhing dga' ba min/ /'jug pa dang ni ldog pa'i phyir/ /de ni ngo mtshar
<p>184b.7</p>zhes bya ste/ /dam chos rab tu bstod pa dang / /dam chos ma lags smod mdzad kyang / /dam pa dag dang tha ma la/ /khyod ni chags dang khro mi mnga'/ /yun ring por ni mngon 'dod pa'i/ /yid la re ba skong ba dang / /mi rigs pa ni rtsod pa yis/ /chos nyid la ni
<p>185a</p>
<p>185a.1</p>gegs byed la/ /dgra bcom pa dang mu stegs la/ /rjes su chags dang khong khro bar/ /khyod kyi thugs ni mi 'gyur na / /khyod la bstod du ci zhig mchis/ /gang zhig 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan phyir/ /srog kyang khyod kyis mi dgongs na/ /gzigs pa dang
<p>185a.2</p>ni gsan pa dang / /khyod kyis ma gzigs ma gsan bzhin/ /yon tan rnams la'ang ma chags la/ /yon tan can la'ang bzhed mi mnga'/ /kye ma'o khyod kyi thugs stobs ni/ /rab dang yongs su dag pa lags/ /phan tshun rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir/ /nges par lus dang
<p>185a.3</p>sems dag gi /mya ngan dga' sogs gnas skabs ni/ /re dogs kyis kyang shin tu bsgribs/ /dbang po rnams ni rab dang ba/ /dus rnams rtag tu mi nyams pas/ /khyod thugs rtag tu dang ba dag /mngon sum gyur pa bzhin du gda'/ /shin tu nyung ngu 'dod pa
<p>185a.4</p>yis/ /'bad pa yis ni sbas na yang / /nyes zad shin tu ma lus pas / /gzhan don gyis ni drangs pas na/ /rang bzhin dam pa legs gsungs dang / /mdzad spyod bzang pos bsgrags pas na/ /khyod kyi blo gros dgongs pa dag /rnam dag byis pa'i bar la grags/ /sangs
<p>185a.5</p>rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las rmad du byung bar bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi pa'o// //gang gis khyod kyi sku mthong bas/ /sems ni dang bar ma gyur pa/ /de la mig ni med pa ste/ /yang na yod kyang don med
<p>185a.6</p>pa'o/ /nye bar zhi la yid du 'ong / /'bar la gnod pa mdzad mi mnga'/ /dul la rngom brjid che ba yi/ /sku 'dis su zhig dad mi mdzad/ /gang yang lta dang zhi ba'am/ /yul ni shin tu rnyed pa na/ /thams cad chags dang bral 'gyur zhing / /'di ni mthong ba'i nang na mchog /khyod
<p>185a.7</p>kyi sku de gang gis ni/ /lan brgya mthong dang gang zhig gis/ /dang por mthong ba de gnyis ka /'dra bar mig ni mgu bar mdzad/ /rnam par sdang ba'i sems ldan yang / /mthong bas ngoms pa cis mi 'gyur/ /khyad par la mkhas ma yin yang / /gang zhig yi dgas rnams
<p>185b</p>
<p>185b.1</p>kyis ni/ /khyod kyi sku ni mdzes pa'i phyir/ /blta bas mi ngoms rang bzhin pas/ /mthong ngo cog ni phyi phyir zhing / /dga' ba skyed par mdzad pa lags/ /dub par ma dgongs ngo mtshar te/ /rjes su mthun pa'i don mdzad cing / /phrin las gsal bar gyur pa na/ /gang gi 
<p>185b.2</p>'bad pa med par 'phrul/ /rten gyi yon tan dag dang ni/ /brten pa'i yon tan phan tshun du/ /'tsham pas khyod kyi sku dang ni/ /yon tan phun tshogs mchog dang ldan/ /khyod la yon tan mi mnga' na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di ni/ /gzhan la gang zhig la ni rten/ /gzhan
<p>185b.3</p>mi bas ni rnam par spras/ /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang 'bar ba/ /khyod kyi sku las ma gtogs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan 'di/ /gzhan gang zhig la legs gnas 'gyur/ /phun sum tshogs las lhag pa'i sku/ /gzhan dang mtshungs min thob pa ni/ /
<p>185b.4</p>brten pa yi ni khyad par gyis/ /phun sum tshogs pa lhag par 'chang / /khyod sku rten pa'i yon tan la/ /nga dpal che zhes gsung gsung ltar/ /de yi yon tan rnams kyang slar/ /nged legs bkod ces gsung ba 'dra/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dang
<p>185b.5</p>pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las sku la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u lnga pa'o// //gsod dang bkres skom grang dro dang / /mi srun smad pa la sogs mang / /gsum la dub pa med bzod cing / /ngan song gi ni sdug bsngal yang / /'gro ba 'di dag thams
<p>185b.6</p>cad ni/ /khyad med nyon mongs rnams kyis bcings/ /khyod ni 'gro ba'i nyon mongs dag /dgrol slad yun rings thugs rjes bsdams/ /bcings pa'i rgyu ni nyon mongs pas/ /'gro ba yis ni nyon mongs bzod/ /khyod ni thugs rje yis bcings pas/ /bzod pa gang de ngo
<p>185b.7</p>mtshar lags/ /dang por khyod la phyag bgyi 'am/ /'on te gang gis 'khor bar khyod/ /skyon mkhyen yun ring de lta bur/ /bzhugs mdzad thugs rje che la bgyi/ /de ltar sdug bsngal btang snyoms nas/ /dben pa'i gnas su bzhugs par mdzad/ /shin tu gsal bar
<p>186a</p>
<p>186a.1</p>bya ba'i phyir/ /de ltar gyi yang bzod par mdzad/ /dben pa'i bde ba spangs gyur khyod/ /mang po'i nang du bzhugs pa gang / /de khyod thugs rje dus 'das pa/ /glags shig thod nas bgyis par bas/ /'jig rten spyod pa 'dra ba mang / /ma
<p>186a.2</p>'ongs bde ba la brten nas/ /da ltar byung la gus pa yis/ /sems can rnams la rnam dpyad nas/ /rig pa yi ni mtsho nang nas/ /klu bzhin khyod kyi thugs rje yis/ /dgon pa zhi gnas grong gi mthar/ /gdul ba'i don gyi slad du drangs/ /gzhan la chags shing
<p>186a.3</p>dgongs pa yis/ /thugs rje btsun mos mi bya med/ /yang na khyod ni de chags pas/ /rang dang mthun pas spangs nas gang / /nyer zhi mchog la gnas bzhin du/ /thugs rje gtso dang ldan pas na/ /rol mo mkhan gyi sgyu rtsal yang / /khyod kyi zhabs kyis 'dor bar
<p>186a.4</p>mdzad/ /don dam pa ni ma brnyes pas/ /sngon ni de bzhin dka' spyod min/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni brnyes pa yis/ /zhi gnas bdag nyid spangs nas kyang / /rdzu 'phrul seng ge'i sgra dang ni/ /nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa gang / /de ni bzhed spyod mi mnga' ba/ /khyod kyi thugs
<p>186a.5</p>rje bstan pa lags/ /gal te sems can don mdzad 'di/ /sems can yod na mi 'gyur ba/ /gus pas gzhan du mi 'dre la/ /ji ltar mi bzad ltar brtse med/ /gzhan gyi don du rab bzang gi /nyid kyi don la brtse med pas/ /mgon po khyod nyid 'ba' zhig la/ /
<p>186a.6</p>thugs rjes thugs rje mdzad ma gyur/ /yang na khyod nyid dka' ba rnams/ /spyod pa ma nyams des ni mdzad/ /khyod kyis nyid don las lhag par/ /gzhan don rjes su gzigs par mdzad/ /'di ltar res 'ga' bstan pas gang / /gzhan don grub par mdzad slad du/ /
<p>186a.7</p>khyod ni lan brgyar phyogs dag [(]du[,]tu[)]/ /gtor ma bzhin du btang ba lags/ /gang zhig rjes su mi mthun pa'i/ /rol mo mkhan gyi bzo sogs ni/ /ngan pa'i las la'ang drang bar mdzad/ /de nyid de ni mi 'thad do/ /de ltar khyod la gnod mdzad kyang / /nongs pa can du mi rtsi 
<p>186b</p>
<p>186b.1</p>bas/ /khyod kyi bzhed pa kho na dang / /mthun 'jug pa ni lags par gda'/ /gtong min yod de chags pa min/ /chags pa yod de dngos mi shes/ /kha cig dngos po shes na yang / /rjes su mthun min gtong ba yang / /gtong ba min la chags pa yang / /dngos po
<p>186b.2</p>shes na rjes su mthun/ /thugs rje de yis spyod legs mang / /gang gi smra bar byed par nus/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las thugs rje la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u drug pa'o// //tshig bzang ba dang don
<p>186b.3</p>che dang / /bden pa dang ni snyan pa dang / /rab gsal gnyis ka'i don ldan dang / /bsdus dang spros pa dang ldan pa/ /nyon mongs 'joms dang rtsub min dang / /gsal dang bde blag rtogs pa dang / /sna tshogs don ni ma 'khrugs dang / /snying po can dang mang ba
<p>186b.4</p>yang / /khyod kyi gsung ni de lta bu/ /khyod kyi dgra bos thos na yang / /thams cad mkhyen pa lags so zhes/ /su zhig nges pa bskyed mi 'gyur/ /rjes su chags dang bar ma dang / /sdang bas gnod pa byed pa la/ /nyes kun skyug par mdzad pa'i phyir/ /thams cad la ni
<p>186b.5</p>thugs mnyam mnga'/ /mang po ril gyis snyan ma lags/ /bcos pa 'ga' tsam snyan pa lags/ /khyod kyi gsung ni don grub pas/ /thams cad legs gsung kho na lags/ /mos khams dbang po'i dbye ba yis/ /gang phyir bsam pa sna tshogs pa/ /de bas thabs
<p>186b.6</p>la mkhas pa yis/ /skyes bu 'dul mchog kha lo sgyur/ /khyod kyi gsung ni rnam brtags na/ /gang zhig 'jam dang rtsub pa dang / /gang yang de gnyis ldan pa dag /thams cad ro gcig nyid du 'gyur/ /yun ring 'phel bar 'gyur ba ni/ /thugs rje brtson 'grus phun
<p>186b.7</p>tshogs pas/ /dgongs pa yang dag shes rab kyang / /thams cad la ni brtson dang ldan/ /e ma'o shin tu yongs dag pa'i/ /phrin las rnams kyang rab tu bzo/ /de yis rin chen gsung rnams kyi/ /snod 'di 'dra ba 'di bgyis so/ /snod kyi skyon dang 'brel pas na/ /
<p>187a</p>
<p>187a.1</p>rna bar bdud rtsi 'di 'dra ba'ang / /ro ni phrogs par gyur pa ste/ /lha yi chu ni rgya mtsho bzhin/ /khyod zhal blta na rab sdug pa/ /de las mnyan na snyan pa yi / /gsung 'di dag ni zla ba las/ /bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bzhin du gda'/ /sngo ba thi sogs dbye ba
<p>187a.2</p>yis/ /mi sdug pa ni bstan pa dang / /byams pa dang ni snying rje yang / /spyod pa'i gnyen po'i phyogs kyis ni/ /khyod kyi gsung ni 'dod chags kyi/ /rdul rab zhi mdzad char sprin 'dra/ /zhe sdang sbrul ni gdon pa'i phyir/ /nam mkha' lding dang 'dra ba lags/ /gzhan yang
<p>187a.3</p>rten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa yis/ /de bzhin las bdag gir bya ba/ /bdag med pa gang dbyer med pas/ /yang dang yang du mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib 'joms pas gdugs dang 'dra/ /nga rgyal ri bo mngon 'joms pas/ /brgya byin mtshon cha
<p>187a.4</p>'dra ba lags/ /gal te 'di ni ma gsungs na/ /bde gshegs dgra bcom sangs rgyas dang / /de ltar rtogs nyid phun tshogs pa'i/ /khyod kyi bden gsung sus rtogs 'gyur/ /don gzigs pas na mi slu ba/ /nongs mi mnga' phyir rjes su mthun/ /legs par sbyar bas go
<p>187a.5</p>sla ste/ /khyod kyi gsung ni legs gsum ldan/ /zab pa dang ni snyan pa dang / /go sla dang ni legs sbyar dang / /gdul bya dang ni rjes su mthun/ /gdug pa la yang bden don phyir/ /re zhig dang por khyod kyi gsung / /nyan pa rnams kyi yid 'phrog mdzad/ /de nas yid
<p>187a.6</p>la bsams bgyis na/ /rdul dang mun pa dag kyang sel/ /longs spyod nyung ngu tsam zhig dang / /skye ba dang ni 'jig pa yang / /gzhan yang 'gro ba gzhan dbang la/ /nges par 'byung ba ston par mdzad/ /phongs pa rnams kyi dbugs 'byin cing / /bag med rnams ni skrag
<p>187a.7</p>par mdzad/ /bde ba can dag skyo bgyid las / /khyod gsung kun dang 'tsham par 'jug /yongs smin dbang gis shes rab ni/ /sgom pa'i rang bzhin skyed mdzad cing / /de las ldang ba'i dus su ni/ /thos bsam rang bzhin gyis kyang ni/ /mkhas pa rnams ni dga' ba
<p>187b</p>
<p>187b.1</p>bskyed/ /bar ma rnams kyi blo yang spel/ /tha ma'i rab rib rnam 'joms pas/ /gsung 'di skye bo kun la sman/ /shes rab spyan ni zag pa med/ /dang po bden pa skyed par mdzad/ /de 'og dbang po'i dbye ba yis/ /bsgom pa dang ni mi slob lam/ /lta ba dag
<p>187b.2</p>la dgar mdzad cing / /mya ngan 'das par nye bar 'dren/ /nyes pa sel mdzad khyod kyi gsung / /yon tan rnams kyi char yang 'bebs/ /'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas pa yis/ /sngon dus lo rgyus gsung ba'i phyir/ /skal can rnams la don dam pa/ /shin tu ma 'das pa
<p>187b.3</p>yis kyang / /kun la ma thogs thugs mnga' zhing / /dgongs pa'ang kun tu nyer gnas pas/ /de slad khyod kyis lung bstan kun/ /thams cad la yang slu mi mnga'/ /khyod kyi nyan thos mchog rnams kyi/ /rigs dang smin dang mos pa yis/ /mi shes pas ni bsgribs
<p>187b.4</p>pa'i tshig /khyod ni thugs dgongs ma nyams pas/ /gang slad dus min yul min dang / /snod min rnams su mi 'jug pa/ /de slad khyod gsung don mchis te/ /brtson 'grus legs par brtsams pa bzhin/ /khyod gsung yon tan cha tsam la'ang / /bdag gis bstod
<p>187b.5</p>par nus ma yin/ /gang gis khyod kyang 'dod chung ba'i/ /rab tu gsal bar kun du 'dren/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las gsung la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bdun pa'o// //bgrod pa gcig dang thabs
<p>187b.6</p>bde dang / /legs par 'brel dang nyes pa med/ /thog ma bar dang mthar dge bas/ /khyod kyi bstan 'dra gzhan la med/ /gzhan rnams kyang ni thar don min/ /dka' bas thob cing bde 'gro min/ /mi rtag phan tshun 'gal ba ste/ /de lam 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir/ /khyod
<p>187b.7</p>kyi gzhung lugs de lta bu/ /gcig pu phongs la lta chags pas/ /byis pa gal te smod bgyid na/ /lta dang 'dra ba'i dgra ma mchis/ /byang chub sems ni nyer blangs nas/ /gzhan don la chags thugs mnga' bas/ /khyod bskal bye bar skad cig bzhin/ /dmyal
<p>188a</p>
<p>188a.1</p>bar yang ni de bzhin bzhugs/ /'gro ba yi ni don slad du/ /sdug bsngal mang ltar gang lags pa/ /de bsams khyod bstan ngan na yang / /gnas par bgyi ba la thug na/ /nyon mongs bde ba chung byed pa'i/ /mi yi bdag po'i bka' lung gis/ /
<p>188a.2</p>dmyal ba yi yang las rnams la'ang / /byas pa gzo bas 'jug par mthong / /phan pa gsung zhing phan pa mdzad/ /khyod kyi bstan pa ci smos te/ /mgo la zhugs ni 'bar bas kyang / /ci yi slad du sgrub mi bgyid/ /zhi gnas ye shes rdzogs pa dang / /rtogs par
<p>188a.3</p>gyur nas dad pa dang / /nyon mongs kun las rnam 'grol phyir/ /byis pa slob dang mkhas rnams kyis/ /khyod kyi bstan pas rang dbang dang / /byang chub bde dang zhi ba dang / /khyod kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang / /legs pa bzhi po 'di kun thob/ /stong pa nyid ni gsung ba
<p>188a.4</p>dang / /srid par smon pa mi mnga' dang / /mtshan ma med pa rnyed mdzad pa/ /gang de chags sdang med pa'i phyir/ /dpa' bo khyod kyi bstan pa 'di/ /mu stegs thams cad skrag mdzad la/ /bdud ni sems khong chud mdzad cing / /lha dang mi rnams dbugs kyang 'byin/ /
<p>188a.5</p>bdag tu lta bas 'dus byas la/ /smod med mya ngan 'das mi 'thad/ /de slad de yi mi mthun pa/ /'chi bdag gis ni 'tshe bar 'gyur/ /'chi bdag bstan pa khams gsum gyi/ /sa chen dag la spyod bgyid pa/ /mi thogs zlog pa ma mchis pa'ang / /khyod kyi bstan pas
<p>188a.6</p>zil gyis mnan/ /skyes nas nges par 'jig pa'i phyir/ /'on te nyon mongs bzhin 'chi 'pho/ /khyod sras kyis kyang dbang thob phyir/ /de las 'di ni khyad ches 'phags/ /khyod kyi bstan pa'i lugs 'tshal ba/ /dga' na bskal par yang gnas la/ /gang du bdud kyis
<p>188a.7</p>mi rdzi ba/ /der yang dga' mgur rab tu mchi/ /thabs sogs sgrub la mkhas pa yis/ /shes rab gsum po rnam 'phel phyir/ /gang tshe sems ni nges sbyar dang / /gzhag dang sdang ba zhes bya 'dis/ /lung gi don ni bsams pa dang / /bsgoms dang gus par mnyan
<p>188b</p>
<p>188b.1</p>pa yi/ /dus gsum cha dbye khyod kyi ni/ /bstan las gzhan la mchis ma lags/ /rig pa snga phyir ma 'phel zhing / /bsam bya'i gnas dang bral ba'i phyir/ /mu stegs gzhan gyi mthong bzhin yang / /lta la srid pa'i gdon gyis dkrugs/ /drang srong skyes mchog
<p>188b.2</p>khyod kyi bstan/ /de ltar legs pas khyab 'di la/ /ma gus gang lags de las ni/ /sdug bsngal chen po'ang ci zhig mchis/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las bstan pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u brgyad
<p>188b.3</p>pa'o// //gang zhig snga mar smon lam mdzad/ /yang na mthong dang thos pa yang / /'gro ba rnams la smon mdzad pa/ /de ltar yang ni don ldan 'khums/ /khyod thos pas ni spro ba skyed/ /mthong bas dad pa skye bar 'gyur/ /khyod gsung thos pas dga' 'gyur te/ /
<p>188b.4</p>bstan pas rnam par grol bar mdzad/ /kye ma'o gnas skabs thams cad du/ /skye dgu rnams la sman mdzad pa'i/ /chos bstan pas ni byed pa na/ /gang mthar bde ba sgrub pa'i phyir/ /khyod kyi sras kyis mgu bar 'gyur/ /'phel bas skye dgu rnams kyang dga'/ /
<p>188b.5</p>gshegs pa na ni phan 'dogs mdzad/ /ldog pa na ni 'god pa mdzad/ /gang zhig dad pas brlan sems kyis/ /yon tan dran pa gsal bas kyang / /gal te khyod ni bde mdzad na/ /de las ngo mtshar ma mchis lags/ /bsgrags pas sdig pa 'phrog par mdzad/ /
<p>188b.6</p>khyod dran pas ni rangs par 'gyur/ /btsal bas blo gros skye 'gyur te/ /yongs su shes pas rnam par 'dag /de bzhin skyabs 'gro len pa dang / /sbyin dang slob pa rjes byed pa'i/ /'jigs 'joms mdzad pa ci ngo mtshar/ /gang zhig chos la mngon 'dod pas/ /khyod
<p>188b.7</p>la bsu bas dpal du byed/ /bsten pas blo gros mchog tu 'gyur/ /bsten na 'jigs pa med par mdzad/ /bsnyen bkur bgyis pas bde bar 'gyur/ /glags skabs tshol bar byed pas kyang / /khyod kyi drung du nyer mchis na/ /phyi nas gdung ba dang ldan phyir/ /sman pa
<p>189a</p>
<p>189a.1</p>bzhin du de bzhin khyod/ /tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pas dag /bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pas dang / /shes rab phun tshogs mi 'khrugs pas/ /khyod ni bsod nams mtsho chen lags/ /mtshang 'bru ba la brtson pa ste/ /ba ra dwa dza la sogs kyang / /
<p>189a.2</p>nges legs dang 'dra cis mi 'gyur/ /khyod la de ni ngo mtshar ci/ /khyod sku bltar 'os rin chen te/ /legs gsungs mnyan 'os rin chen lags/ /chos ni spyad 'os rin chen pas/ /khyod ni rin chen 'byung gnas lags/ /'jigs pa mi bzad rnams su yang / /khyod ni dran
<p>189a.3</p>pa tsam gyis gang / /zhi bar gyur pa de la yang / /mtshar min gang zhig thugs rje'i bdag /khyod ni chu bos bdas pa'i gling / /smas pa'i bdag nyid skyob pa ste/ /srid pa'i 'jigs pas nyen pa'i skyabs/ /thar 'tshal rnams kyi 'dren pa lags/ /me tog gcig ni rab phul
<p>189a.4</p>bas/ /gang zhig ngan 'gror ltung ma gyur/ /de la dus nges bstan pa la/ /mtshar min khyod sngon 'di 'dra lags/ /tshul khrims dag phyir snod kyi mchog /zhing gshin 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/ /srog chags kun la phan mdzad phyir/ /grogs kyi phul yang khyod lags so/ /
<p>189a.5</p>gang zhig gis khyod mthong tsam gyis/ /skyon yon la ni mi mkhas pa/ /dud 'gro dang ni gzhan min 'gyur/ /de la drin sogs mtshar ba lags/ /phan 'dogs mdzad pas mdza' bshes te/ /'grogs na bde phyir snying du sdug /zhi phyir gcig tu yid du 'ong / /yon tan kun mnga'
<p>189a.6</p>mchod 'os khyod/ /gang zhig mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /ngan song gi ni sdug bsngal yang / /nye bar zhi ba de la yang / /gnas min 'jig rten dogs pa can/ /sdig pa med pas yid dang 'thad/ /sku gsung bzang bas dga' bar mdzad/ /don kun 'grub phyir dpal yangs te/ /
<p>189a.7</p>yon tan legs rten bkra shis lags/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las smon lam gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u dgu pa'o// //snga phyir sems gnas bsgrub slad du/ /rmugs la sogs pa zhi ba'i
<p>189b</p>
<p>189b.1</p>phyir/ /phyi rol g.yeng ba zhi don du/ /nang gi chog shes spangs pa'i phyir/ /khyod ni rngan then bgyid la skul / /chom rkun bgyid pa tshar yang gcod/ /gya gyu can rnams rnal du 'god/ /dal bus bgyid la bzhen skul 'debs/ /zhi gnas nges par rdzogs nas ni/ /phyi nas
<p>189b.2</p>bden la sbyar bar mdzad/ /bsgom pa khyad par mdzad slad du/ /sa bon med par spangs par mdzad/ /dul ba rnams ni lam la sbyor / /dmu rgod rnams la btang snyoms mdzad/ /de slad skyes bu 'dul ba yi/ /kha los sgyur ba bla med mchog /thad du phyin nas khyod
<p>189b.3</p>mtshang 'bru/ /gang zhig sa bon med par spangs/ /'on kyang de la btang snyoms min/ /phan pa'i dus la gzhes par mdzad/ /khyod ni nyam thag rnams la brtse/ /bde bar gnas la phan par bgyid/ /phongs par gnas la thugs rje bas/ /kun la phan par bzhed pa
<p>189b.4</p>lags/ /gang zhig bar ma la phan bzhed/ /de ni shin tu ngo mtshar min/ /gang zhig slar yang byas 'joms pa'i/ /gnyen dang grogs rnams la ni bzhin/ /khyod ni dgra bo rnams la'ang byams/ /nyams par gyur la phan 'dogs mdzad/ /gtum po rnams
<p>189b.5</p>la thugs brtse bas/ /khyod ni ya rabs rmad cig lags/ /skye ba gcig tu phyi rol gyi/ /bza' btung gos la sogs pa yi/ /nyon mongs pa yi dbang gis ni/ /lus tsam la ni phan byed dag /phan 'dogs bgyi slad pha ma dag /gal te bla mar 'tshal na go/ /
<p>189b.6</p>khyod ni lhag par phan 'dogs pas/ /bla ma nyid gyur smos ci 'tshal/ /thar pa'i sa bon ji ltar yang / /de rnams dge ba la btsud nas/ /dus gcig yongs su smin slad du/ /dus ni kun du 'da' bar mdzad/ /rang gi don la mi lta bas/ /nyid kyi dgra bo ltar gyur
<p>189b.7</p>cing / /g.yang sa'i mu na gnas rnams la/ /ra ba lta bur gyur pa'ang khyod/ /de nas ji ltar snod gyur pa'i/ /yongs su smin par gzigs nas ni/ /slar yang thugs ni ma bsnyel zhing / /sman gdags bsam gtan la brtson lags/ /'jig rten gnyis kar sman
<p>190a</p>
<p>190a.1</p>gdags slad/ /'jig rten las ni 'da' slad du/ /mun par gyur pa'i 'jig rten la/ /khyod kyis shes rab snang bar mdzad/ /de las tha dad med pa yis/ /rgyu bcas rgyu ni med pa yang / /'phags pa'i lam nas 'god mdzad dang / /khyod kyi 'jig rten la
<p>190a.2</p>ston mdzad/ /yul la nye bar spyad pa na/ /lha min spyod pa tha dad kyi/ /khyod kyi longs spyod thun mong bas/ /khyod la dbye ba mi mnga'o/ /gang du rgyu ni med pa la/ /khyod kyis bstan par rab btsud na/ /de la thar pa'i rgyu bcas la/ /mdor bsdus pas na smos ci dgos/ /
<p>190a.3</p>bcom ldan khyod kyis skye ba dang / /na tshod rigs dang yul dang ni/ /dus kyi skyon med chos rnams kyis/ /'di dag kun la sman yon btags/ /'di ni sman dang 'di mchog ces/ /khyod kyi ltos pa bsal nas ni/ /de ltar yon tan 'phags 'dren pa/ /'bad pas ji
<p>190a.4</p>ltar bdag nyid bzhin/ /khyod kyi nyan thos sred bral zhing / /ya mtshan 'dzin pa med rnams la'ang / /lha rnams thal sbyar smon bgyid cing / /ya mtshan che ba lta bur mchod/ /bdag nyid 'jigs pas bde thob pa'i/ /yul dag spangs par gyur nas ni/ /'gran zla bzhin
<p>190a.5</p>du gcig nas gcig /mchog tu rjes su 'brang ba byed/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas 'khor ba yi/ /nying khur gyur pa byung ba brjid/ /des na mi yang lha rnams kyi / /smon par bya ba nyid du gyur/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya
<p>190a.6</p>ba las lam la 'jug pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu pa'o// //mnyel dang zhi bde nyams gyur dang / /skye bo ngan dang 'grogs pa dang / /mi mthun pa dang mang po yi/ /skyon yang yon tan bzhin dgongs shing / /gzhan la sman pa mdzad la chags/ /
<p>190a.7</p>thugs rje yis ni thugs bcings pas/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum gyis ni/ /khyod kyis sdug bsngal mi dgongs so/ /'gro ba'i don slad ma chags pa'i/ /thugs kyis brtson pa mdzad pa gang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi/ /chos nyid bcom ldan de rmad do/ /
<p>190b</p>
<p>190b.1</p>zhi gnas bde ba ma thob pa/ /sngon mdzad gang de ngo mtshar min/ /khyod kyis zhi gnas thob pa yang / /spangs pa'i mdzad pa ngo mtshar to / /bshos kyang phal pa gsol mdzad cing / /res 'ga' smyung ba dag kyang mdzad/ /nyam nga'i tshul du'ang gshegs mdzad cing / /rad rod
<p>190b.2</p>can du'ang man la ba mdzad/ /slar yang phyag gi bdud rtsi yis/ /gzhan rnams la ni phan pa mdzad/ /de nyid kyis ni mi 'grang ba'i/ /mi srun spyod pas phal pa bzhin/ /mgon khyod gtso bor gyur lags kyang / /gdul bya rnams la byams slad du/ /sku ngas brdo dang gcam
<p>190b.3</p>tshul dang / /skad dang cha lugs sgyur ba'ang mdzad/ /mang po'i rang don mthar thug dang / /de ni khyod kyi che ba lags/ /de la mngon 'dod don la yang / /de lta'i sdug bsngal sdom pa mdzad/ /kun gyis dga' mgur rang don phyir/ /bran bzhin bskos par bsgrims pa
<p>190b.4</p>lags/ /mgon khyod rtag tu bdag nyid la/ /mnga' ma mchis pa'ang ma lags so/ /lci dang cha lugs yang dgongs pa'ang / /de tshe khyod la ga la ste/ /gang phyir gzhan ma spangs nas kyang / /sdug bsngal ldan pa mthar phyin pas/ /khyod la gang dang gang du yang / /ji skad
<p>190b.5</p>skul yang mi spong ste/ /nyid kyi sgrub pa bzang po las/ /'da' bar 'gyur ba ma mchis so/ /pha 'am yang na gzhan legs la/ /byams pa'am yang na snying rje yis/ /khyod yon phrag dog gis gdungs dang / /de bzhin rgyu med dgra bo la/ /ji ltar khyod ni gnod bgyid
<p>190b.6</p>la/ /phan pa lhur mdzad de lta bu / /skye bo dag ni phan bgyid la'ang / /phan pa de ltar lhur mi bgyid/ /nyes rtog gdon gyis zos pa ni/ /phyir zhing shin tu mi bzad la/ /mgon po rang sems rjes mthun pas/ /khyod kyi nyes pa mthong ba la/ /khyod ni gnod bgyid
<p>190b.7</p>dgra bo la/ /phan pa mdzad pa'i bshes lags te/ /rtag tu skyon dag tshol ba la/ /yon tan 'ba' zhig tshol ba'ang lags/ /shin tu dge ba'i spyod ldan pa/ /mgo dang yid dang tshig dag gis/ /khyod ni phyag 'tshal mchod 'os la/ /rtag tu bdag ni phyag
<p>191a</p>
<p>191a.1</p>'tshal bstod/ /khyod ni gang na dug bcas shing / /zhugs dang bcas par spyan drangs pa/ /der ni brtser bcas gshegs pa dang / /khyod la bdud rtsi can du gyur / /shin tu phan tshun 'gal ba can/ /sems can rnams kyi log rtog pas/ /
<p>191a.2</p>mi bskyod de la phan 'jug pa'i/ /thugs ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bzod pas mi snyan brjod pa dang / /'khu ba dag ni bde legs kyis/ /mi snyan smra la bden pa ste/ /khyod kyis sdang ba byams pas btul/ /dgra rnams la ni 'bad min pas/ /thugs kyis
<p>191a.3</p>kyang ni rtag tu btul/ /bzlog la yang dag 'jog mdzad pa'i/ /rgyal mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog ma med dus goms pa yis / /mi yi rang bzhin mang po yang / /khyod kyis ngan song rnam bzlog nas/ /skad cig nyid la yongs su bsgyur/ /shin tu bzang
<p>191a.4</p>min khams tsam yang / /yun ring [(]gyis [,]gis [)]ni 'phel mdzad pa/ /sman pa'i spyod pa rjes 'jug pa/ /sman mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las dka' ba mdzad pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste
<p>191a.5</p>le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //rtsub po dang 'jam bgyid pa dang / /'jungs pa rnams ni gtong phod dang / /gtum pa des par bgyis pa gang / /de ni khyod kyi thabs mkhas lags/ /rang rig rjes su mi gcod cing / /dge ba gong du 'dren byed pa/ /skye ba gzhan
<p>191a.6</p>du mdzad pa'i phyir/ /dge mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dga' bo dbang po nyer zhi dang / /nga rgyal khengs pa 'dud pa dang / /sor mo'i phreng ba 'ang zhi bgyis na/ /su zhig ngo mtshar skye mi bgyid/ /shin tu mchog don mdzad slad du/ /dmu rgod rnams ni bde ba yis/ /
<p>191a.7</p>shin tu ngo mtshar gyur pa yis/ /'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyi chos kyis ros tshim pas/ /gser las bgyis pa'i mal spangs nas/ /ran mang gting ba'i gnas mal du/ /brtan rnams bsod nyams nyal bar bgyid/ /gzhan gyi dbang gis lus
<p>191b</p>
<p>191b.1</p>tsam ni/ /shin tu tshim dang rjes mthun min/ /gang phyir gzhan gyis tshim byed las/ /tshim mdzad mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /khyod kyis dus dang bsam mkhyen pas/ /res 'ga' zhus na'ang mi gsung la/ /spros 'gyur gzhan la bstan pa dang / /drung du gshegs
<p>191b.2</p>nas bshad pa'ang mdzad/ /rgyu min mkhas pa ma yin phyir/ /thams cad du ni tshig mi 'grub/ /de ni shin tu spangs mdzad phyir/ /bden gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri med gos la tshon bzhin du/ /thog mar sbyin sogs gtam dag gis/ /sems la spro ba bskyed nas
<p>191b.3</p>ni/ /phyi nas chos ni bstan pa mdzad/ /rig dang thabs la mi mkhas pa'i/ /tshig gis sems ni 'gug mi 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi sems ni bkug mdzad nas/ /'chi med gsol mdzad la phyag 'tshal/ /'khor ba mi bzad gting nas ni/ /'gro ba nyon mongs drang
<p>191b.4</p>slad du/ /khyod kyis gang zhig ma stsal ba'i/ /thabs dang spyod pa de ma mchis/ /kha cig pha rol 'dod slad du/ /brtson 'grus ldan la thabs mi mkhas/ /thabs mkhas brtson 'grus med pa las/ /'dren mdzad mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /sku yi cha lugs rnam
<p>191b.5</p>mang dang / /gsung gis so so'i skad bzhin du/ /gdul ba'i bsam pa tha dad pa/ /de dang der ni khyod kyis mdzad/ /gzhan gyi cha lugs sna tshogs ni/ /don med yang na gzhan gsod phyir/ /don ldan sku ni sna tshogs pa'i/ /don kun mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag
<p>191b.6</p>kun kyang dag pa dang / /mi 'gal ba dang mchod 'os dang / /brjid dang lha mi rnams la ni/ /sman 'dogs bkur ba sha stag lags/ /phyi rol rnams kyi spyod pa ni/ /gzhan gsod pa dang smod pa ste/ /bkra shis gzhan don du ldan pa'i/ /spyod pa mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /
<p>191b.7</p>smra dang bgyid pa phal cher ni/ /legs pa rngo thogs ma lags kyi/ /bden par gsung ba khyed la ni/ /de gnyis gzhan du gda' ba lags/ /gzhan gyi spyod pa mig ni gzhan/ /nyon mongs phal cher 'khrugs pa yang / /spyod pa dang ni don mthun pa'i/ /legs gsung khyod
<p>192a</p>
<p>192a.1</p>la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nyid dag pa 'ba' zhig gis/ /khyod kyis 'gro ba'i dpal zhing mdzad/ /'di ltar rnam pa 'di 'dra'i zhing / /'jig rten gsum na mchis ma lags/ /gal te dbye byed rnams kyi ni/ /'ba' zhig khyod ni smad gyur na/ /de
<p>192a.2</p>bzhin dpag med dge ldan pa'i/ /sgor gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog med srid pa nyam nga bar/ /snga nas gcig tu nyams pa yi/ /sems can kun la sman slad du/ /khyod ni de ltar brtson pa lags/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs
<p>192a.3</p>pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las mkhas par bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// //gang phyir mya ngan gyis nyams pas/ /ston pa rnyed par dka' ba yang / /slar yang dka' la brtson ldan pa/ /khyod la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi khyod drin lan lon pa'i/ /
<p>192a.4</p>sgrub de mchis snyam mi bgyid de/ /skye bo gang dag mya ngan 'das/ /de dag gis kyang lan ma lon/ /rang don byed par bdag mchog cing / /de ltar gang gis rmad byung gsungs/ /thog mar ma thogs phun sum tshogs/ /ston mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyi chos la
<p>192a.5</p>gnas de dag /rang don kho na bgyid par bas/ /de yi slad du 'o brgyal gang / /de la lan go ci zhig lon/ /khyod ni sems can gnyid log pas/ /rgyud la gzigs pa'i zhugs tse ba/ /bag med gyur pa rnams kyi ni/ /grogs bzang bag dang bcas pa lags/ /gti mug
<p>192a.6</p>mnal ni bcom pa'i phyir/ /shin tu sad khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /snod dang snod min sogs dpyod phyir/ /'jig rten mkhyen la slar phyag 'tshal/ /khyod kyis nyon mongs gzhom pa bshad/ /bdud kyi g.yo dag bstan pa mdzad/ /'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi bzad brjod/ /
<p>192a.7</p>'jigs pa med pa'i phyogs kyang bstan/ /gal te gzhan gyis rgyud rnams kyi/ /nyon mongs bdud las rgyal gyur pa/ /bdud kun las rgyal smos ci 'tshal/ /phan dgongs thugs rje can gyis ni/ /sems can rnams la bgyi 'tshal ba/ /gang zhig khyod kyis ma mdzad pa/ /
<p>192b</p>
<p>192b.1</p>gzhan go ci zhig mchis lags kye/ /mgon khyod grangs dang 'phags pa dang / /bla ma yan lag gnyen 'dun gyis/ /dgongs pa mdzad pa gang lags pa/ /de phyir kun bdag la phyag 'tshal/ /gal te chos ni 'di dag kyang / /spo ba zhig tu btub na ni/ /gdon mi 'tshal
<p>192b.2</p>bar khyod kyi ni/ /lha sbyin la brten kun la'ang stsol / /khyod kyi mdzad par mi spyod gang / /de ni nges par bgyid mi rigs/ /gnas ma yin las ldog pa dang / /gnas la zhugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de slad 'gro la brda sprod pa/ /'gro ba'i mgon po khyod kyis ni/ /'di ni phan tshun byed pa po/ /med pa
<p>192b.3</p>skad du nges par gsungs/ /khyod kyis mi spyod pa yis kyang / /gang phyir ldog pa'i mi 'thad na/ /de phyir gnas skabs thams cad du/ /lta bcas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo / /'jig rten rnams la thugs brtse bas/ /yun ring sa steng dam chos bshad/ /'jig rten gsum
<p>192b.4</p>phan 'dogs nus pa'i/ /slob ma dam pa'ang mang du bskrun/ /bskrun nas gdul ba'i khyad par gyis/ /bstan pa rgyas ni btab nas kyang / /mngon du btul ba'i tshogs kyang ni/ /mdzes bzang yan chad btul lags pas/ /de ko khyod la sems can gyi/ /bu lon
<p>192b.5</p>lhag ma ci mchis na/ /chos kyi sku yis ma lus pa'i/ /'gro ba dag dang ldan khyod kyis/ /slob dpon khu tshur bcing min phyir/ /bu lon lhag ma gzhan ci [(]mchas[,]mchis[)]/ /'di ltar rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sku gdung til 'bru bzhin blags nas/ /mjug tu'ang
<p>192b.6</p>khyod kyis shin tu ni/ /dka' spyad yal bar ma dor ro/ /yang na gzugs sku'i mthar yang ni/ /sems can don mdzad nyid gzigs nas/ /nyid kyi bde la chags mi mnga'/ /de la ltos pa dor bar mdzad/ /gzugs kyi sku dang chos 'di dag /gzhan don kho nar mdzad
<p>192b.7</p>do zhes/ /'jig rten yid ches dka' 'di la/ /khyod kyis mya ngan 'das pa bstan/ /de ni spyod bzang mthar thug pa'i/ /sems can gzhan don mdzad pa nyid/ /gang zhig thog ma dbus mthar yang / /khyod kyis ma nyams nyid du 'khums/ /de slad chos sku ma lus pa/ /
<p>193a</p>
<p>193a.1</p>sras kyi mchog la gtad mdzad de / /gzugs sku til 'bru ltar bshig nas/ /khyod ni yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /de ltar thog ma dbus mtha' ru/ /chos gzugs sku gnyis bdag nyid kyis/ /sems can don la phan mdzad phyir/ /bu lon mi mnga'
<p>193a.2</p>la phyag 'tshal/ /e ma'o gnas pa e ma'o tshul/ /e ma'o yon tan e ma'o sku/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams la/ /ya mtshan mi che 'ga' ma mchis/ /tshul khrims dang ni bsam gtan rgyu/ /de'i 'bras gzugs dang gzugs med pa'ang / /gang phyir khyod kyis
<p>193a.3</p>ma dgongs te/ /de phyir bas min khyod phyag 'tshal/ /phan 'dogs mdzad cing blta na sdug /sku gsung phrin las zhi gyur pa/ /khyod la'ang sdang bar rab bgyid pa'i/ /rmongs pa mi bzad pa la gzigs/ /khyod la sdang bar byed pa la/ /sman mdzad pa ni bsam mi nus/ /de
<p>193a.4</p>sman mdzad pa bsam min pas/ /rtag tu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsod nams rgya mtshor rin chen gter/ /yon tan 'byung gnas chos kyi tshogs/ /khyod la sems can gang 'dud pa/ /de dag la yang phyag 'tshal lags/ /khyod kyi zhabs rdul gyis brgyan pa'i/ /yul gang
<p>193a.5</p>de la'ang phyag 'tshal nas/ /dge ba'i bstan pa la mkhas pa'i/ /mtshan gyis brgyan pa smos ci 'tshal/ /mgon khyod yon tan mi bas kyang / /bdag gi zho sha bas 'tshal bas/ /des na 'jigs pa mchis slad du/ /glo ba la ni gcags shing mchis/ /khyod ni rang sangs
<p>193a.6</p>rgyas kyis min/ /nyan thos mchog gtso bos ma yin/ /byang chub nye ba'i byang sems kyis/ /rtogs mi 'gyur na gzhan ci smos/ /khyod kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid/ /tshad ma mchis la bsam mi khyab/ /bstan min grangs kyang ma mchis pa/ /khyod bdag nyid kyis mkhyen lags grang / /
<p>193a.7</p>bsam min tshogs des phun sum tshogs thob pa/ /gzhan don spyod pa ngo mtshar dge las kyi/ /yon tan cha tsam brjod par bdag rmongs pas/ /rang don dgongs pas mi nus par yang byas/ /mtsho chen chab ni bas par ma gyur kyang / /skye bo'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bgyid ltar/ /
<p>193b</p>
<p>193b.1</p>khyod kyi yon tan cha tsam ma sgrogs kyang / /bdag ni mchog tu glo ba dga' zhing mchis/ /btsun pas mdzad pa'i bstod pa'i drung du ni/ /rjod nyung mdzes pa ma yin ci zhig 'gran/ /'o na'ang bdag ni mi shes pa yis spel/ /skye bo'i rna bar ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur/ /bdag
<p>193b.2</p>gis thub la dad pas spobs skyes pa'i/ /dge ba'i las 'di'i 'bras bu 'khrungs pas ni/ /ngan rtog rlung dmar 'tshub mas dkrugs pa yi/ /'gro ba'i sems ni rnal du gnas par shog /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba
<p>193b.3</p>las bu lon med par bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o// //spel mar bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po ma ti tsi Ta dang / slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po dag gi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku ma ra ka la sha dang / zhu
<p>193b.4</p>chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong bsod nams bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta sto traM/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal
<p>193b.5</p>lo/ /bstan pa 'gro ba kun gyi mchog gyur cing / /gzhan don rdzogs mdzad pa la rnam par mkhas/ /nyon mongs sbrul chen kun du 'byin mdzad pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /zag bcas bag chags thams cad spangs gyur cing / /don kun
<p>193b.6</p>de nyid nges par gzigs mdzad pa/ /skye dgu thams cad don la brtson gyur pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /dam chos rin chen 'byung gnas snod gyur cing / /lam mchog mya ngan 'das pa ston mdzad la/ /yid la re ba kun du rdzogs mdzad pa'i/ /
<p>193b.7</p>de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /'jig rten rnams la rjes brtser mngon par gus/ /byams dang thugs rje yongs su bsgos gyur cing / /kun don spyod pa yongs su rdzogs mdzad pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /kun don bsam
<p>194a</p>
<p>194a.1</p>pa yongs su rdzogs mdzad pa'i/ /gdul bya'i pad+ma 'byed pa'i spyan dang ldan/ /rgya chen slob ma dam pa'i yon tan bskyed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /bskal pa mtha' yas tshogs ni bsags gyur cing / /tshangs dbang lha dbang
<p>194a.2</p>rnams kyis phyag byas la/ /sku la 'dom gang 'od kyis brgyan gyur pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /nyes pa'i rtsa ba ma lus bcom gyur cing / /ye shes me yis dri ma'i shing bsregs la/ /shes rab dam pa yongs su rdzogs mdzad pa'i/ /de
<p>194a.3</p>bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /nyon mongs bag chags bcas kun rnam bcom zhing / /grags pa chen po kun du grags gyur la/ /mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan/ /pad+ma lta bu'i spyan ni rab rgyas shing / /btso ma'i gser gyi phung po 'dra
<p>194a.4</p>ba yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /bsod nams rgya chen rmad byung 'di yis ni/ /bdag nyid nyon mongs bag chags bcas 'byin cing / /'khor ba'i nyon mongs rgya mtsho chen po 'dir/ /nub par gyur pa'i 'gro ba 'don par shog /de bzhin gshegs pa
<p>194a.5</p>thams cad la bstod pa rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga wAn shAkya mu ni sto tra/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'das pa 'jig rten sgron me mdzad/ /khyod
<p>194a.6</p>ni 'jig rten don mdzad blo gros bzang / /snang ba brnyes shing nyon mongs dri bsal ba/ /'jig rten snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyin la dgyes shing stobs bcu'i mchog mnga' ba/ /gdul bya 'dul bzhin gdul bya'i pha rol byon/ /bcom ldan lha dang mi dang klus
<p>194a.7</p>mchod pa/ /gdul bya'i mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan mchog 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad cing / /'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog 'dra/ /dge ba mtshan gyi dam pa'i gzugs mnga' ba/ /srid gsum mtshungs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol gshegs
<p>194b</p>
<p>194b.1</p>pas gzhan gyi tshogs rdzogs shing / /pha rol phas rgol tshogs 'joms mi g.yo ba/ /sems can gzhan gyi sems dang spyod la mkhas/ /pha rol tshogs 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgra bcom rgyal po nyon bcil dri bsal ba/ /'tsho ba dag cing brtul zhugs tshul
<p>194b.2</p>khrims gnas/ /lha yi lha mchog dri med dri bral ba/ /thugs rje mchog ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chu bo bzhi brgal bden bzhi'i bka' mchid gsung / /mig sbyin bdud rtsi chos kyi bka' mchid can/ /mnyam thugs 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i thugs/ /chos la mnyam
<p>194b.3</p>gnas mi rnams kha lo sgyur/ /yon tan mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnam par dag dang ldan/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs lta bur snyan pa'i gsung / /thams cad dbyangs kyi yan lag gsung tshul rdzogs/ /bden pa snyan gsung khyod la phyag
<p>194b.4</p>'tshal lo/ /stong pa mtshan ma med cing smon dang bral/ /zab mo blta dka' shin tu rtogs par dka'/ /thar la 'jug par mkhas pa'i blo gros can/ /thar pa'i lam dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyu la brten pa'i mkhas pa blo gros can/ /mtha' gnyis lta ba rtag tu
<p>194b.5</p>mi mkhas pa/ /las kyi 'bras bu rnam smin kho nar gsung / /lta ba'i mun bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang nas ma byon gang du'ang gshegs ma lags/ /rtag tu dben pa'i chos rnams rab gsung ba/ /smig rgyu sgyu bzhin nga yir mi mnga' ba/ /dge ba'i chos tshul
<p>194b.6</p>khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye dang mi skye gang du skyes ma lags/ /skye dang 'jig dang gang du mi gsal ba/ /chos kyi gnas nyid ji ltar gnas la gnas/ /gnas dang mi gnas rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin kho na ba bzhin yang dag gsung / /rtag tu mi g.yo de bzhin
<p>194b.7</p>nyid la bzhugs/ /ri rab rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'dra ba'i sku/ /mi g.yo ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstod pa slob dpon dkon mchog gsum gyi 'bangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
<p>195a</p>
<p>195a.1</p>@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI mA n+ma hA bo d+hi b+ha n+tU raka s+ya sto traM/ bod skad du/ dpal ldan rje btsun byang chub chen po'i bstod pa/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad dkar spyan mnga' rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /thugs rje'i go 'phang thams cad mkhyen/ /shAkya seng ge
<p>195a.2</p>kun du bzang / /ston pa la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /dpal stug dpal ldan gtso bo ste/ /zhi mdzad tshul khrims phung po can/ /zhi ba dpal ldan dpal mdzad pa/ /zhi ba'i sku mngar bdag phyag 'tshal/ /grub pa bdag med gsung mdzad pa/ /kha na ma tho'i gnas ma mchis/ /
<p>195a.3</p>lugs mkhyen dri ma mi mnga'i bdag /rnyog mi mnga' la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /'gran zla nga rgyal mi mnga' zhing / /rnam rtog mi mnga' de bzhin gshegs/ /nyon mongs kun gyis mi bsgul pa/ /spros mi mnga' la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /sna tshogs dbang phyug rnam grol mkhyen/ /sna
<p>195a.4</p>tshogs gzugs can rnam par 'dren/ /sna tshogs mtshan rnams yang dag rdzogs/ /'dod chags bral la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gdul dka' 'dul mdzad sems can mchog /dag pa thub pa zas gtsang sras/ /bde gshegs legs rtogs zhi mdzad pa/ /dge bar
<p>195a.5</p>grags la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rnyog pa las grol 'dod pa'i dgra /rnyog pa mi mnga' pad+ma 'chang / /mdzes pa'i sku mnga' thugs brtse'i snod/ /pad+ma'i 'od mngar bdag phyag 'tshal/ /blo gros chen po brtson 'grus che/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po/ /mchod pa chen po
<p>195a.6</p>bstan pa che/ /sgra gcan chen por bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rig dang zhabs ni phun sum tshogs/ /sna tshogs dbang po dri med 'od/ /rnam dul cha byad yangs pa can/ /skyon dang bral la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /'phags pa gtsang mdzad kun la sman/ /gzhan gyis mi thub nyams
<p>195a.7</p>mi mnga'/ /bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i mgon/ /dpag med 'od mngar bdag phyag 'tshal/ /lha yi lha ste lha chen po/ /lha yis phyag byas zad mi mnga'/ /tshad mar gyur pa lha yi dbang / /lha rdzas gzugs mngar bdag phyag 'tshal/ /don dam mchog tu gsal mdzad pa/ /
<p>195b</p>
<p>195b.1</p>mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa ste/ /mchog tu gzhan la phan mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /bdud bzhi'i dgra las rnam par rgyal/ /zhi ba zhi mdzad de nyid mkhyen/ /de nyid snying po rtag tu spyod/ /ded dpon la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /dbang po thul ba nyon mongs
<p>195b.2</p>thul/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po skyes bu mchog /tshangs pa dam pa mchog gyur pa/ /bsod nams zhing la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /'dod chags bral ba bcom ldan 'das/ /khyod kyi sku nyid la bstod pas/ /dmyal ba'i me nang gnas pa rnams/ /bsil ba'i gnas ni thob gyur cig /
<p>195b.3</p>dpal ldan rje btsun byang chub chen po'i bstod pa mchog sred kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o/ /'di yang gangs can skad nyid du/ /rje btsun sprul pa'i sku mchog gi/ /bka' bzhin zha lu lo tsA ba/ /dge slong chos skyong bzang pos bsgyur// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/
<p>195b.4</p>bud+d+ha sta ba da sha /bod skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa bcu pa/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchog gi byang chub rgyu ni dang por bskyed pa las/ /'gro la rnam par phan phyir 'chi med thar mdzad de/ /yang dag 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro bdud las rgyal ba can/ /rgyal ba shAkya thub
<p>195b.5</p>la rab tu phyag bgyi'o/ /thub pa'i rgyal po dam pa gzhan gyi mgon po mchog /gcig tu brtson pas tshangs pa mchog la nges gnas shing / /so so'i blo can phas rgol las ldan dbang por ni/ /ri dgas bdag po shAkya thub la phyag bgyi'o/ /thub pa mar me mdzad la sogs la
<p>195b.6</p>mchog thob pas/ /'bar ba'i rin chen dam pa thor cog la 'chang ba'i/ /'dzin ma'i bdag po tshangs dang rgas med kyis bstod pa/ /sdig spangs shAkya thub la rab tu phyag bgyi'o/ /thub pa rgya che'i 'od zer rgyan gyis yongs su bskor/ /me chu'i yangs pa dag dang rab rgyas
<p>195b.7</p>gsal ba'i 'od/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten yul la khyab par spro ba can/ /shAkya thub la deng bdag rab tu phyag bgyi'o/ /thub pa skyes mchog bden pa mchog tu ston pa po/ /'jig rten lha dang lha min mya ngan 'das bgyid pa'i/ /thabs mdzad pa la cho ga bzhin du mkhas
<p>196a</p>
<p>196a.1</p>pa ste/ /dge 'os shAkya thub la rab tu phyag bgyi'o/ /thub pa'i dbus su mngon dgyes thugs rjes gnas pa ste/ /ting 'dzin mchog gis 'dod dang drag po rnam rmongs shing / /mchog gi bim pa lta bu'i zhal sgros phul dang ldan/ /dam pa shAkya thub la rab
<p>196a.2</p>tu phyag bgyi'o/ /thub pa'i chos 'dzin pa las nad dang rims 'phrog cing / /zhabs zung dag la 'phrog byed cod pan gyis rab mtshan/ /zung 'jug ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu bzhugs pa yi/ /mchog sbyin shAkya thub la rab tu phyag bgyi'o/ /thub pa seng ge dam pa mi yi seng ge mchog /
<p>196a.3</p>tshangs pa mi mjed bdag pos mchog gyur gdugs bsgreng zhing / /nor 'dzin gtso mo'i re ba'i phyag gis mngon btud pa/ /phyag 'os shAkya thub la rab tu phyag bgyi'o/ /thub pa zhi byed rnams kyi gtsug gi bde gshegs te/ /ma lus nyes pa spangs shing yon tan chu yi gter/ /
<p>196a.4</p>mtha' dag skye bo'i sdug bsngal sel ba gter lta bu/ /sdig sel shAkya thub la rab tu phyag bgyi'o/ /thub pa brtson pas 'gro ba'i don sgrub mdzad pa la/ /mkha' lding bdag po'i mgon te ltung gyur sems can rnams/ /yang dag 'dren zhing pha rol bde bar mdzad pa yi/ /ston
<p>196a.5</p>pa shAkya thub la rab tu phyag bgyi'o/ /dpal shAkya thub pa'i bstod pa bcu pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //'di ni dpal nags kyi rin po che'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa ste/ paN+Di ta chen po de nyid kyi bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba'i dA ri dra pa rgya mtsho'i sdes bsgyur ba'i yi ge pa ni blo
<p>196a.6</p>dang ldan pa byams pa kun dga'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ gu Na a par+yan+ta sto traM/ bod skad du/ yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan mtha' mi 'tshal bas gal te khyod bsngags
<p>196a.7</p>mi brjod na/ /'ga' yang khyod bstod mi bgyid khyod kyi 'byor ba 'gro bas rtogs ma mchis/ /gang slad 'gro 'dis khyod la bstod pa bgyis kyang nongs pa ma mchis pa/ /de slad don 'dir bdag ni blo gros rab tu chung yang brtson pa lags/ /srid gsum dag la phan brtson blo
<p>196b</p>
<p>196b.1</p>mnga' ngan song gnas na'ang bsngags par 'os/ /rang don smon pa'i blo gros can ni mya ngan 'das kyang ma lags zhes/ /de slad khyod ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas mi ldog brtan zhing mi g.yo bas/ /'jig rten skye zhing 'chi bas nyam thag yongs su bskyab par brtson pa lags/ /
<p>196b.2</p>srid pa'i 'gro ba dag tu sdug bsngal rnams kyis smas pa'i sems can la/ /bdag gi blo gros rtsub pos sdug bsngal rnam mang de dang de bsgrubs pas/ /de phyir bdag gis de dag rnams la bde ba bskyed phyir bzod bya zhes/ /de slad khyod ni 'gro la zhi ba'i bde ba bskyed slad brtson
<p>196b.3</p>pa lags/ /sems can gang dag ma rig ldongs pas bsam pa rgud pa'i blo gros can/ /pha dang bur gyur rnams kyis bdag la gnyen snyam byams pas phan btags pa/ /de dag btang nas gcig pu thar par byed pa bdag gi tshul min zhes/ /de slad khyod kyis 'gro ba mgon med
<p>196b.4</p>nges thar bgyi slad smon lam btab/ /sngon chad 'khor bar sdug bsngal kun du myong gyur tshe na bdag la ni/ /gang dag yun ring ngo shes byams sems ldan pas lan brgyar grogs byas pa/ /bde ba thob tshe de dag bkol nas ji ltar yongs su spyad bya zhes/ /de slad khyod ni
<p>196b.5</p>bdud rtsi 'ang sems can kun dang thun mong gsol bar brtson/ /mchog sbyin 'gro bar sems can rnams dang lhan cig longs spyod 'das dgongs nas/ /de dag nges par yongs su mi gtong bas na khyod kyi bstan pa ni/ /ji ltar khyod nyid ne tsor 'khrungs tshe ljon shing gzhon
<p>196b.6</p>nu lags spyad pa'i/ /ljon shing rgas par gyur kyang yongs su mi gtong de ltar brtson pa lags/ /gang slad 'gro ba mya ngan ma 'das mya ngan khyod 'da' blo ma byung / /bde gshegs go 'phang brnyes par nus pa ma lags de mi mdzad/ /de slad khyod ni kun mkhyen yon tan gter
<p>196b.7</p>dag brnyes mdzad slad du brtson/ /stobs bcu'i yon tan bdag gir mdzad pa las gzhan khyod la phra mi mnga'/ /gang su la la dag gis bde gshegs go 'phang brnyes pa de dag kyang / /'di bas shin tu smad pa'i gnas skabs dag tu lhung ba byung ngo zhes/ /de slad khyod kyis
<p>197a</p>
<p>197a.1</p>nyam ngar lhung ba'i tshe yang bdag nyid smad ma mdzad/ /bdag la smod pa mi rung skyes bu dar ba zhum par bgyid ma lags/ /gang slad gal te rang la rag las 'bad pas byang chub thob gyur na/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang rnyed dka' ma lags snyam du khyod kyi blo gros
<p>197a.2</p>byung / de slad khyod kyis nyam nga'i dus su'ang kun mkhyen smon lam brtan bzlog pa/ /dman la dga' ba rnams kyi tshig dag khyod kyis khyad du bsad par mdzad/ /nyon mongs chu bo rab 'khrug pa dang ngan 'gro la dag rtag tu gdangs pa dang / /so so'i skye bo'i g.yo dang
<p>197a.3</p>sdig pa'i grogs po rtag par rgyun du gnas pa dang / /thub rnams rnyed par dka' zhes de ltar sems zhum 'gro ba gtong ba'i rgyu/ /gang lags de nyid khyod kyi thugs rje rtag tu skye ba'i rgyur yang gyur/ /ji ltar 'gro ba rnams la khyod blo shin tu byams pa skye ba ltar/ /'jig rten
<p>197a.4</p>'di dag rang la'ang byams pa'i blo gros skye bar mi 'gyur la/ /'jig rten phongs pa'i gnas skabs gyur na bdag nyid dag kyang gtong bar bgyid/ /khyod ni shin tu nyam nga'i dus su'ang 'gro ba gtong ba bzhed ma mchis/ /gang zhig skye bo dman dang phongs pa re ba'i bsam ldan
<p>197a.5</p>mthong na yang / /brtse med 'bras bu 'dod pas smod gzhan yon tan dag dang ldan tshol ba/ /bsam brlag de ni sbyin pa byed kyang slong ba rnams dang mtshungs so zhes/ /de slad khyod ni thugs rjes slong ba rnams la sbyin par bzhed la zhugs/ /'ga' zhig rang nyid ma dul bzhin du
<p>197a.6</p>rigs par ldan pa'i tshig smra yang / /rang gi tshig dang 'gal bar spyod pas gzhan dag 'dul bar mi nus zhes/ /khyod kyis dgongs nas de slad 'gro ba mtha' dag thugs la bzhag mdzad nas/ /re zhig bdag nyid ma dul ba nyid dul bar mdzad phyir brtson pa lags/ /gang slad
<p>197a.7</p>mkhas pa rnams kyi mi dge'i las kyang zhi ba'i bde bar 'gyur mod kyi/ /'on kyang 'phags pas mi dge ba dag kun du bsten 'os ma yin zhes/ /de slad khyod ni rtag tu rang bzhin yongs su dag pas sdig las log /ngan song 'jigs pas ma lags lha yi bde spyad bzhed
<p>197b</p>
<p>197b.1</p>pa'i phyir ma lags/ /gang dag 'gro la mi lta bdag nyid zhi bar 'gro bar bgyi slad spyod bgyid pa/ /des kyang ci ste brtson pa ma bsten slan chad bsam rdzogs mi 'gyur na/ /gang gis 'gro ba ma lus bsgral phyir brtson pa brtsams pas ci smon zhes/ /de slad khyod kyis rang gi
<p>197b.2</p>bde la ma gzigs byang chub slad du brtson/ /khyod kyis 'byor ba chung ba'i tshe yang sbyin par bzhed pa ma spangs la/ /bdog pa chung yang slong ba rnams la zhum mi mnga' ba'i thugs kyis stsal/ /dbang phyug chen po mnga' yang tshul dang 'gal ba'i tha snyad mi mnga' la/ /na tshod
<p>197b.3</p>lang tshor gyur kyang 'dod pa rnams la thugs ni chags mi mnga'/ /khyod kyis thos dang blo gros che ba'i tshe na'ang bdag bstod ma mdzad la/ /'gro ba yon tan chung ba gzhan rnams kyang ni mthon por bkur bar gyur/ /yon tan tshogs la gnas tshe nyid kyi spyod pa nyes pa chung ngu'ang
<p>197b.4</p>bzung / 'gro ba dmu rgod rnams la rtsol ba mi mnga' bde bar gnas pas bzhugs/ /khyod kyi thugs ni srid dang nyon mongs skyo bas zhi la dgyes gyur kyang / /thugs rje nyid kyis mdzad pa'i yon tan skye bo rnams dang rjes su mthun/ /byed pa ma gtogs gzhan gyis 'bras
<p>197b.5</p>bu mi myong bar ni khyod mkhyen kyang / /'on kyang sems can rnams kyi 'byor pa skyed slad bsod nams gter rnams bdar/ /khyod la shes rab la sogs yon tan gang dag rtag tu mnga' gyur pa/ /de dag khyod kyis 'gro ba dag gi don rnams nyid du nye bar spyad/ /de las
<p>197b.6</p>khyod kyi bsod nams 'bras bu gzhan du mchis pa ma lags la/ /de dag 'gro ba'i 'byor slad yongs su bsngos kyang don ma mchis ma lags/ /khyod la gzhan la sman pa'i thabs dang 'bral ba'i dus 'ga'a'ang byung ma gyur/ /thabs chung ma gyur 'bras bu ma mchis ma
<p>197b.7</p>lags 'bras bu chung ma lags/ /bsod nams chung ngu rtsom pa dag la khyod ni mngon dgyes ma lags la/ /bsod nams chu bo dag gis ngoms par ma gyur chab kyi rgya mtsho bzhin/ /mtshan mo ston ka'i zla ba nya ba'i mdangs kyis nyams dgar gyur pa dang / /rdzing bu
<p>198a</p>
<p>198a.1</p>ut+pal rgyas pa gnyid bral mig la rngom brjid byed rnams dang / /ri bo ljon shing me tog rgyas pa brgya yis rtse mo dkrigs rnams kyis/ /gzhan la gcig tu sman dgyes khyod kyi blo gros phrogs par rngo mi thogs/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal dag gis smad tshe khyod ni
<p>198a.2</p>nyid la byams pa yis/ /yul gyi dga' ba ston nyams su blang bya min zhes thugs rje'i blos mkhyen nas/ /gling bzhi'i dbang phyug mnga' yang yul rnams kyis ni thugs kyang mi phrogs la/ /khyod kyis gzhan sman lhur bzhes mdzad pas dus dag shin tu 'das par bgyis/ /
<p>198a.3</p>phyug cing 'byor ba slong ba rnams kyis legs par spyad par ma byas dang / /dur khrod ljon shing me tog rgyas pa'i ljid kyis g.yur za mtshungs so zhes/ /de slad bsod nams dman pa'i 'byor bdag la slong rnams mi spyod pas/ /khyod kyi dkor nor slong ba ma mchis pa
<p>198a.4</p>ni thugs la gcags par gyur/ /gang zhig brtse med srid pas tshong ba bzhin du 'bras bu'i phyir btsal nas/ /de ni 'bras bu yang ni slang ba rnams la sbyin par spro ma mchis/ /gang gi slad du khyod kyi gtong ba rnams dus gzhan la sman gyur pa/ /de slad de yi
<p>198a.5</p>'bras bu'ang slong ba rnams kyis rang gi lag par bzung / /ri ngos ljon shing 'bras bu smin pa dag tu bya rnams lta bu dang / /dgon pa'i rdzing bu bskyed shing bzang pos bskor bar ngal rnams ltar/ /'dzem med slong ba dgyes pa khyod la bag phebs 'byor ba
<p>198a.6</p>'tshal ba yi/ /slongs mo pa dag kun nas myur bar mngon du lhags nas sdod tsing mchis/ /dpal 'byor 'bangs dang btsun mo rang gi sha dang srog kyang gtong ba na/ /khyod kyis sras gzhon rab sdug ston zla tshes pa dri med gzugs ldan pa'ang / /slong ba rnams
<p>198a.7</p>la gtong bar mdzad la brtson par gyur pa ji lta ba/ /de ltar gtong la goms pa khyod kyi thugs la brtan pa nyid kyang byung / /gang zhig thos par gyur na'ang 'jig rten 'di la gnod pa skye 'gyur dang / /gang yang khyod nyid kyis kyang yun ring sku nyams bzhes par mi
<p>198b</p>
<p>198b.1</p>spyod pa'i/ /spyod pa de dag khyod la goms pas dus su rang gi ngang nyid gyur/ /de slad yon tan dag ni yongs goms ma bgyis spel bar dka' ba lags/ /ji ltar sman pa gdon gyis zin la gdon rnams bsal bar bgyid slad du/ /rdeg cing tshig rtsub smra ba spyod kyang
<p>198b.2</p>zin pa nyid la rdeg mi bgyid/ /de ltar khyod kyang nyon mongs nyid la brtse dang bral bas spyod mdzad kyi/ /'gro ba nyon mongs gyur pa la ni khyod nyid thugs rje mdzad pa lags/ /khyod kyis rtag tu yon tan nor lhag rnams la gus pas bsags pa mdzad/ /mnyam pa rnams la
<p>198b.3</p>yon tan goms par bgyi slad byams pa'i thugs kyis spyad/ /dman la thugs rjes brtson pa mchog gis yon tan rnams bskrun te/ /'gro ba rnams la khyod kyis ji ltar rigs par legs par mdzad par zhugs/ /ji ltar ma ma rang lus sna tshogs thabs tshul
<p>198b.4</p>mang po 'dzin bgyid kyang / /gzhon nu'i nad bsal ched lags dga' bskyed ba byed ma lags lus phyir ma lags pa/ /de ltar khyod kyang brtson pa chen pos yon tan bdag nyid bskrun mdzad pa/ /'gro ba'i longs spyod ched lags grags dang gzhan dag zil mnan ched ma lags/ /
<p>198b.5</p>khyod kyi blo gros gzhan la sman pa'i thabs mkhyen mdzad slad zhugs gyur pa/ /'di ltar khyod nyid thugs rjes rnam pa de dag nyid la zhugs lags gda'/ /khyod ni brtson 'grus 'phags pas brtsal ba che yang mnyel bar ma gyur pa/ /de gsum dag gis khyod kyis gzhan sman ma
<p>198b.6</p>bsgrubs cung zad byung ma gyur/ /khyod ni 'bad rtsol chen po can gyi phrin las mnga' bar mi bzhed la/ /spyod pa shin tu rmad du byung ba gcig tu bsam yas 'di yang byung / /gang slad khyod kyi sems can ma mchis pa 'di thugs su chud gyur kyang / /'di ltar sems can don
<p>198b.7</p>gyi slad du grangs med dus su'ang srid par bzhugs/ /gang slad shes rab don dam bstan cing snying rje kun rdzob ston mdzad pa/ /de slad don bzhin dgongs mdzad khyod la sems can mchis pa ma lags kyang / /gang tshe khyod ni stobs bcu bskyed pa'i thugs rje dag dang ldan
<p>199a</p>
<p>199a.1</p>gyur pa/ /de tshe 'gro ba nyam thag rnams la khyod byams bu la pha byams bzhin/ /'gro ba gtugs dang nyon mongs bas pas byang chub mchog thob ma mchis la/ /nyon mongs phyogs pas rang las sman par bgyid pa'ang thob 'gyur ma lags pas/ /
<p>199a.2</p>de slad khyod kyis byang chub brnyes slad brtson 'grus brtan pa mdzad pa na/ /nyon mongs nges par ma bsregs ran gyi dum bu bzhin du spang bar mdzad/ /khyod kyi nyon mongs dran dang mkhyen pas bzung bas yon tan sna tshogs 'grub/ /nyon mongs spang bar gyur pa byang chub rgyur
<p>199a.3</p>yang nye bar 'gyur lags te/ /'di ltar de yis khyod blo shol gom yul can du yang ma bgyis la/ /'gro ba rnams su skye ba brgyud pa'ang yon tan rnams kyi zhing du mdzad/ /'gro ba nyon mongs gyur dang sdug bsngal brgya dag byung bas bcom pa yis/ /rtsol dang bral
<p>199a.4</p>zhing mgon ma mchis pas grang dang gang du spyod bgyid pa/ /'gro ba de ni nyon mongs dgra thul khyod kyi thugs rjes spyod pa na/ /srid pa len dang stong dang gnas pa dag la mnga' dbang mchis pa lags/ /ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi ni yul can phra rgyas rnams bcom
<p>199a.5</p>nas/ /de dag spangs pa'i thabs tshul gang lags dam pa'i tshogs la yun ring bshad pa mdzad/ /sa gsum sman pa'i thabs mkhas mnga' ba khyod kyis phyir yang drangs nas ni/ /dud 'gro dag tu'ang smon pa mdzad nas skye ba brgya phrag rnams kyang mdzad/ /sngon
<p>199a.6</p>gyi mi dge'i phrin las rnam par smin par ma nges gang lags pa/ /de dag dud 'gro'i 'gro bar gshegs la gzhol ba khyod la mnga' mchis pas/ /khyod kyis rnam smin ched du drangs te thugs la dgongs pa'i don bsgrubs pa/ /drang srong gis bshad gsang sngags zhi
<p>199a.7</p>bas dug gi shugs dag bzlog pa bzhin/ /khyod kyis rtag tu mi dge'i chos dang g.yul dag spang bar gyur pa na/ /'gro ba dar mdzad mkhas pa khyod kyis 'gro ba de dang der spyod pa'i/ /tshul khrims ma 'bad brtul zhugs ldan pa bzhin du gyur pa ji lta ba/ /de
<p>199b</p>
<p>199b.1</p>ltar dam pa'i spyod lugs byang chub sgrub pa dag la goms par mdzad/ /ma bzhin res 'ga' 'ang thugs rje dag dang ma bral mgon ma mchis rnams kyis/ /sdug bsngal de dang de dag bsal slad 'gro ba sdug bsngal can dag tu/ /bsnyengs dang bral bar spyod pa mdzad
<p>199b.2</p>pa khyod kyi thabs la mkhas pa ni/ /bsgrub par dga' dang brnyes par dka' ba 'ga' yang byung bar ma gyur lags/ /gang slad sna tshogs thabs kyis 'gro ba sdig pa bying 'dul khyod la ni/ /dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dag kyang bde 'gro bzhin du don chen kho nar gyur/ /ngan song dag tu
<p>199b.3</p>'khrungs na'ang legs par spyod pa nyams pa mi mnga' ba/ /de slad khyod kyi sdig pa'ang yon tan 'gyur bar dge ba nyid dang mtshungs/ /khyod la legs brten kha cig byang chub gsum la blo gros ci rigs zhugs/ /de bzhin gzhan dag bsam gtan gzugs med dag la go
<p>199b.4</p>'phang gzhag pa mdzad/ /kha cig gtong bar zhugs shing nges tshul mchid kyis 'tshal gyur pas/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la sman yon tan ma btags pa ni 'ga' ma mchis/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten dag na 'gro ba gang rnams nges par thar 'tshal ba/ /bde 'gror nye bar drangs shing
<p>199b.5</p>dge ba yongs su smin pa nyid du mdzad/ /khyod kyis 'gro ba zhi mdzad slad du 'gro ba rnams su spyod pa na/ /drang srong chen po gzhan dag dus bzhin byung bas zhi bar mdzad pa bzhin/ /gang slad khyod ni 'gro ba'i skye ba bcad dang rdzogs sangs rgyas mdzad ma gtogs par/ /gzhan
<p>199b.6</p>gyis skye ba zhi bar mi 'gyur snyam du blo gros nges gyur pa/ /de slad byung chub gzhol ba'i thugs mnga' khyod kyis srid rtse man chad kyi/ /lam rnams tshul bzhin ston par mdzad pas dus dag 'das par gyur pa lags/ /gang zhig rtogs par ma gyur pa yis 'jig rten ma rig
<p>199b.7</p>ldongs gyur la/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal mang por rgyu zhing 'chi bdag mtshams las mi 'da' ba'i/ /'phags lam 'jigs med sngon gyi drang srong che rnams rjes gshegs gang lags pa/ /de ni khyod kyis 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal mthar gtugs slad du nyid kyis mkhyen/ /ji ltar dus
<p>200a</p>
<p>200a.1</p>mtha'i tshe na nyi ma du mas chab bskams 'jig rten 'di/ /zhugs chen mched pa khros pa lta bus thal ba dag kyang sreg bgyid pa/ /de ltar dregs bral khyod kyis nyon mongs bsrabs par gyur pa'i bag chags kyang / /ye shes zhugs chen 'ang ra ba dag gis nges par
<p>200a.2</p>bsregs par gyur pa lags/ /gang dag sa gsum bla ma rnams la nges par gnas par 'tshal ba dag /mun pa chung ngu dang yang lhan cig gnas par 'gal ba gang lags pa'i/ /yon tan mtha' yas de dag mngon par sangs rgyas tshe na dus gcig tu/ /shing la bya rnams
<p>200a.3</p>gnas 'cha' bzhin du gyur pa khyod kyis gang las brnyes/ /nyi ma 'od zer gsal ba stong ldan zla ba sprin dang bral gyur pa/ /lhag par dga' bar bgyid pa nam mkha'i dkyil na nges par gnas gyur kyang / /gang gis khebs pa'i 'gro ba srid pa'i dgon pa thibs por 'khyam
<p>200a.4</p>bgyid pa'i/ /ma rig mun nag de dag rab tu zhi ba'i thabs tshul khyod kyis bstan/ /sdug bsngal khyab pa 'di yin de rab skye bar 'gyur ba'i kun 'byung 'di/ /de mthar gtugs pa 'di yin de rtogs gyur la gzhol ba'i thabs 'di zhes/ /de ltar tshangs pa khyod kyis dag
<p>200a.5</p>pa zla 'od gtsang ma dag kyang bstan/ /de dag rtogs bgyis skye ba dman yang tshangs pa'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /ji srid nyi ma'i snang ba gang lags de ni nub kyi ri dbang gis/ /nyi ma nub par ma bgyis de srid rab rib rab tu zhi bar bgyid/ /khyod kyis skye shi mthar
<p>200a.6</p>gtugs bgyi slad thabs tshul bstan pa gang lags pa/ /de ni khyod nyid zhi bar gshegs kyang snying gi mun nag zhi mdzad lags/ /de ltar tshangs pa'i gtso bo lha yi bla mar gyur pa tshangs gter gyis/ /bstod bgyis bstod par 'os pa bde gshegs mngon sum bzhugs
<p>200a.7</p>bzhin bstod bgyis pas/ /bdag gi bsod nams gter dag bsags pa gang lags de yis 'gro ba rnams/ /drang srong chen po rnams kyis dgongs pa'i legs pa gang lags der gyur cig /yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa slob dpon dkon mchog 'bangs
<p>200b</p>
<p>200b.1</p>kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarbadz+nya de ba dang / lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ gu Na a par+yan+ta sto tra
<p>200b.2</p>TI kA/ bod skad du/ yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa'i 'grel pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan mtha' mi 'tshal zhes bya ba gleng bslang ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ni bsdus pa'i don bzhi po 'di lta ste/ yon tan yongs su mi shes
<p>200b.3</p>pa dang / sgro 'dogs pa med par bya ba dang / nga rgyal med par bya ba dang / 'dod pa'i don bsgrub par bya ba rnams bstan to/ /de la dang pos ni yon tan yongs su mi shes pa bstan to/ /gang slad 'gro 'dis khyod la bstod pa bgyis kyang zhes bya ba 'dis ni sgro 'dogs pa med pa
<p>200b.4</p>nyid do/ /rab tu chung yang zhes bya ba 'dis ni nga rgyal med pa nyid do/ /don 'dir bdag ni blo gros rab tu chung yang brtson pa lags/ zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'dod pa'i don bsgrub par bya ba bstan to/ /de la ngan song gnas na'ang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga bcus
<p>200b.5</p>bstod pa rtsom par byed do/ /de la bstod pa ni thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan rjod par byed pa'o/ /de yang gnas skabs gsum po rgyu'i gnas skabs dang / 'bras bu'i gnas skabs dang / sems can gyi don byed pa'i gnas skabs rnams dang ldan pa yin no/ /de la rgyu'i
<p>200b.6</p>gnas skabs ni sems bskyed pa la sogs pa nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i bar dag yin no/ /'bras bu'i gnas skabs ni yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i ye shes bskyed pa dang / skyon dang yon tan thams cad spangs shing brnyes pa'i gnas skabs yin
<p>200b.7</p>no/ /sems can gyi don bya ba'i gnas skabs ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa bstan pa nas nub pa la thug pa'i bar dag yin no/ /de la rgyu'i gnas skabs ni bsam pa'i gnas skabs dang / sbyor ba'i gnas skabs dang / dbang mdzad pa'i gnas skabs
<p>201a</p>
<p>201a.1</p>rnams so/ /bsam pa'i gnas skabs ni gzhan gyi don la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i smon lam gang yin pa'o/ /de'i nye bar bstan pa yang bzhi ste/ sdug bsngal bskyed pa la so sor rtog pa dang / phan btags pa la so sor rtog pa dang / grogs
<p>201a.2</p>byas pa la so sor rtog pa dang yang dag par longs spyad pa la so sor rtog pa'o/ /byang chub kyi smon lam de'i rgyu bzhi ste/ rigs dang dge bshes snying rje dang / /sdug bsngal rnams kyis mi ldog pa/ /rgyu bzhi rkyen ni 'di dag gis/ /byang chub sems ni rab tu 'jug /
<p>201a.3</p>ces gsungs pa dag ste/ de ltar na don bcus ni bsam pa bstan to/ /de la ngan song gnas na'ang zhes bya ba 'dis ni gzhan gyi don la 'gyur ba'i smon lam bstan to/ /de'i nye bar rtog pa bzhi ste/ re zhig de la sdug bsngal rnams kyis smas pa'i sems can la zhes bya ba
<p>201a.4</p>'di dag ni sdug bsngal bskyed pa la so sor rtog pa'o/ /ma rig ldongs pas zhes bya ba 'di dag ni phan btags pa la so sor rtog pa'o/ /sngon chad 'khor bar zhes bya ba 'di dag ni grogs byas pa la so sor rtog pa'o/ /longs spyad 'das dgongs zhes bya ba 'di dag ni
<p>201a.5</p>yang dag par longs spyad pa la so sor rtog pa'o/ /gang slad 'gro ba mya ngan ma 'das zhes bya ba 'di dag ni byang chub kyi smon lam yin no/ /de'i rgyu yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ de la re zhig smad pa'i gnas skabs dag tu zhes bya ba 'di dag ni rigs yod pa nyid yin no/ /gang slad
<p>201a.6</p>gal te rang la rag las zhes bya ba 'di dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa'o/ /nyon mongs chu bo rab 'khrug ces bya ba 'di dag ni snying rje yin no/ /'jig rten 'di dag rang la'ang zhes bya ba 'di dag ni sdug bsngal gyis mi ldog pa yin te/ de ltar tshigs su bcad pa
<p>201a.7</p>bcus don bcu bstan pa yin no/ /bsam pa'i gnas skabs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// //sbyor ba'i gnas skabs zhes bya ba yang pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ji snyed pa yin no/ /de yang rnam pa gnyis te/ mos pas spyod pa rnams kyi dang / sa thob pa rnams
<p>201b</p>
<p>201b.1</p>kyi'o/ /de la re zhig mos pas spyod pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bcu ste/ 'di ltar sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / smon lam dang / stobs dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag go/ /
<p>201b.2</p>de la gang zhig skye bo dman dang phongs pa re ba'i bsam ldan mthong na yang / /zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to/ /rigs par ldan pa'i tshig smra yang zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to/ /gang slad mkhas pa rnams kyi mi
<p>201b.3</p>dge'i las kyang zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs pa'i sgo nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to/ /bdag nyid zhi bar bgyi slad ces bya ba 'di dag gis ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to/ /sbyin par bzhed pa ma spangs zhes bya ba 'di dag gis
<p>201b.4</p>ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs pa'i sgo nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to/ /bdag bstod ma mdzad la zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs pa'i sgo nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to/ /srid dang nyon mongs skyo bas zhes bya ba 'di dag dang / 
<p>201b.5</p>shes rab la sogs yon tan zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis brgal ba dang / lan dang bcas par thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to/ /dus 'ga' 'ang byung ma gyur zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni phun sum tshogs pa rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
<p>201b.6</p>bstan to/ /mtshan mo ston ka'i zla ba zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal dag gis smas tshe zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to/ /mos pas spyod pa rnams kyi sbyor ba'i gnas skabs te le'u gnyis
<p>201b.7</p>pa'o// //sa thob pa rnams kyi sbyin pa ni phun sum tshogs pa rdzogs pa bzhi dang ldan pa yin te/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / len pa po phun sum tshogs pa dang / sbyin par bya ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /phyug cing 'byor pa zhes
<p>202a</p>
<p>202a.1</p>bya ba 'di dag gis ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa nyid do/ /sbyin par spro ma mchis zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /ri ngos ljon shing 'bras bu smin pa dag tu bya rnams lta bu zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni len pa po phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /
<p>202a.2</p>dpal 'byor 'bangs dang btsun mo zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni sbyin par bya ba phun sum tshogs pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'jig rten 'di la gnod pa skye zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /ji ltar sman pa gdon
<p>202a.3</p>gyis zin la zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /khyod kyis rtag tu yon tan nor lhag rnams la gus pas zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni thabs kyis rgyas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /ji ltar ma ma rang lus zhes bya ba 'di dag
<p>202a.4</p>gis ni skye bas stong pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to/ /khyod kyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni thabs dang bcas pa'i brtson pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du thugs su chud pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /phrin las mnga' bar mi bzhed ces bya ba 'di dag dang
