<p>242a.3</p>dpal snying srid mtha' gzigs/ /glog 'od gser gyi ri bo seng ges byin/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal mtshan phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchog dga' grags pa brtson 'grus brtan grags rdzogs/ /bsnyengs bral mchod 'os lha dang sgron chen dang / /'jig rten 'od dang spos dri zhim po
<p>242a.4</p>dang / /yon tan mchog 'dzin mun bral phyag 'tshal lo/ /seng ge'i 'gram dang rin chen grags skyon zhi/ /bdud rtsi 'chang dang mi'i zla shin tu gzigs/ /rab brgyan nor 'od ri bo brtsegs pa'i tog /chos 'byung don nges ldan la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos byin rin chen 'byung
<p>242a.5</p>gnas skye dbang mtshungs/ /stobs kyis gshegs dang blo gnas gdugs mdzes dang / /gtso bo shin tu 'phags pa dpal seng sgra/ /rnam par rol ldan rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu 'od me tog ri dang klu dga' dang / /spos kyi dbang phyug shin tu grags stobs lha/ /yon tan
<p>242a.6</p>'phreng ldan klu'i lag mig rgyan dang / /legs par sbyangs pa'i blo la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /zil gnon mtha' yas spyan dang bden pa gsung / /nyi ma'i 'od dang nges blo mtha' yas gzugs/ /rnam snang rin chen tog dang the tshom spangs/ /'jig rten 'das pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>242a.7</p>don yod rnam par gnon dang rtogs mdzad dang / /me tog rgyal mtshan ri dbang rgyal gzi chen/ /don mdzad gzigs dang grags yas rin chen lha/ /don mkhyen blo rdzogs rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mya ngan med dang dri bral tshangs lha dang / /sa dbang me tog spyan dang rnam 'byes sku/ /chos 'od
<p>242b</p>
<p>242b.1</p>kun gzigs yon tan 'od gsal dang / /dri med zla ba'i zhal la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen 'od dang rin chen tog dang ni/ /grags pa'i bla ma 'od byed gzi dpag med/ /dus mkhyen seng ge'i sku dang mkhas blo dang / /rgyal dka' yon tan phung po phyag 'tshal lo/ /zla ba'i tog dang mthu ni thob pa dang / /
<p>242b.2</p>mthu rtsal mtha' yas zla ba dri med dang / /don rnams thams cad gzigs dang dpa' bo dang / /'byor ldan bsod nams sgron ma phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan 'od 'phro blo ni yangs pa dang / /legs skyes nor lha yid gnyis spong ba dang / /'dzin pa dpag med mchog sred choms med dang / /mi gnas
<p>242b.3</p>pa dang der gnas phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs chen gtso bo 'gro ba'i 'od zer dang / /phal chen rgyal dang gzi brjid mtha' yas dang / /don blo sman pa'i rgyal po tha ba spangs/ /rims nad med dang legs byin phyag 'tshal lo/ /grags byin me tog byin dang skyes bus byin/ /rdo rje'i sde dang phal chen
<p>242b.4</p>byin pa dang / /zhi ba'i blo gros spos glang sred med bu/ /des pa dang ni mi tshugs phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi zla glog gi tog dang mchod pa dang / /dpal sbas dang ni ye shes nyi ma dang / /don grub lhun po brtsegs dang dgra 'dul dang / /pad+ma dgra bcom grags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes 'gros dang nyon
<p>242b.5</p>mongs bral ba dang / /'dam bu dang ni spos bzang yul 'khor rangs/ /lha grags srid mtha' gzigs dang zla ba dang / /sgra gcan rin chen zla la phyag 'tshal lo/ /seng ge rgyal mtshan dang ni bsam gtan dgyes/ /rdzogs ldan rnam rol yon tan rin chen dang / /dgra bcom grags pa pad ngos
<p>242b.6</p>mdzod spu ldan/ /spobs grags rdo rje nor bu phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshe dpag med dang nor bu bkod pa dang / /dbang chen yon tan 'byung gnas lhun po grags/ /'od zer bcu pa ma smad glang po'i 'gros/ /yid 'thad rin chen zla ba phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi ba rab gsal rgyal po kha lo sgyur/ /dga' ba'i dbang
<p>242b.7</p>phyug gtsug na rin po che/ /bsnyengs bral rin chen snying po zla ba'i zhal/ /dri ma med grags zhi brjid phyag 'tshal lo/ /dga' tog sgra gcan lha dang na tshod bzang / /lha dga' rin chen phung po mdzes par gshegs/ /seng ge'i phyogs pa shin tu mthor gshegs dang / /skye dbang blo gros bzang po phyag
<p>243a</p>
<p>243a.1</p>'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'od dang rin chen gzi brjid dang / /skal ldan shing rta kun rgyal dga' ba bkod/ /stegs mdzad dang ni spos glang blo 'od 'phro/ /ri bo'i rgyal mtshan spos bzang phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos brtan dang ni gzi brjid drag shul can/ /chos kyi nor bu bzang
<p>243a.2</p>byin bde gshegs zla/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang seng ge zla ba dpal/ /legs skyes thub med tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /grags pa bshes gnyen dang ni bden pa dang / /dka' thub chen po lhun po'i 'od zer dang / /yon tan brtsegs pa mchod grags chos grags dang / /sbyin 'od
<p>243a.3</p>glog 'byin bden gsung phyag 'tshal lo/ /'tsho byed na tshod bzang po legs tshogs can/ /rnam nges blo gros srid mtha' nor bu'i spos/ /rgyal dgyes seng ge'i 'od zer rnam snang mdzad/ /grags mchog thugs rab gzhungs la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor bu zla ba drag shul 'od zer
<p>243a.4</p>dang / brtul zhugs thub med 'gros mchod nor bu'i tshogs/ /'jig rten bla ma glang seng zla ba dang / /rin 'od sgra gcan sbed la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan rgya mtsho 'od zer ldan pa dang / /rab tu zhi stabs 'jig rten bzang po dang / /mya ngan med pa shugs bcu stobs dgyes dang / /
<p>243a.5</p>mthu dpal mthu thob mthu chen phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan snying po bden par spyod pa dang / /dge mchog rgyal po skar rgyal 'od zer che/ /glog 'od yon tan rgya chen rin po che/ /dpal 'od dang ni bdud 'dul phyag 'tshal lo/ /go bgos seng ge'i phyag dang me tog bzang / /rin chen mthon po
<p>243a.6</p>dang ni rgya mtsho dag /sa 'dzin don blo mnga' ba yon tan bsags/ /yon tan tshogs dang rin me phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten zla ba dang / /dbyangs snyan tshangs pa'i tog dang tshogs can gtso/ /seng ge'i stabs dang drag shul byin pa dang / /chos dbang gzi 'od
<p>243a.7</p>'od chen phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen grags pa tshogs gsal grags mtha' yas/ /'od zer don yod lha yi drang srong dang / /skye dbang dge 'dun brtan dang phyogs bzang dang / /tog dang yul 'khor me tog phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi blo gros rlung gi shugs ltar gshegs/ /legs bsam
<p>243b</p>
<p>243b.1</p>grags pa snang ldan lha tshogs dang / /yon tan bsrungs don blo gros bsnyengs pa med/ /grogs brtan 'od gnas mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor zhabs thar pa'i gzi brjid ngos bzang dang / /blo bzang kun du gzi brjid ye shes mchog /tshangs par gnas dang bden pa gsung ba dang / /blo bzang
<p>243b.2</p>dang ni stobs byin phyag 'tshal lo/ /seng stabs me tog tog dang shes 'byung gnas/ /me tog byin dang yon tan snying po dang / /rin chen grags pa grags pa rmad byung dang / /mi tshugs bsnyengs med nyi 'od phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs gshegs lha yi mthu rtsal ye shes dgyes/ /lta bden nor bu'i
<p>243b.3</p>snying po yon tan grags/ /ye shes dpal dang bcings med brtul zhugs brtan/ /lha yi gzi brjid rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs thub dal bzhud brtul zhugs dka' thub dang / /'od zer phung po dang ni gzi brjid che/ /tsam pa ka dang dga' mdzad tshogs can bzang / /dbang po'i rgyal mtshan
<p>243b.4</p>dgyes chen phyag 'tshal lo/ /sna ma'i me tog 'od dang tshogs can 'od/ /skrun mdzad mdangs 'gro don legs nges pa dang / /khyu mchog dang ni lag bzang 'od zer che/ /bsam byin bsod nams 'od la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen dbyangs dang rdo rje'i sde dang ni/ /'byor ldan seng ge'i stobs dang
<p>243b.5</p>dri med spyan/ /'od srungs dang ni blo gsal ye shes 'gros/ /gzi brjid drag shul 'od chen phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi ma'i 'od dang dri ma med pa'i 'od/ /gzi brjid rnam 'byes khangs med sbrang rtsi'i zhal/ /zla 'od glog 'byin rab zhir gshegs pa dang / /mi 'khrugs dgra bcom grags la phyag
<p>243b.6</p>'tshal lo/ /chos kyi yon tan zhing bzang bkod rgyal po/ /mngon par 'phags dang sbyin sreg 'od 'phro dang / /pad dpal rin chen bkod dang shin tu bzang / /rin chen mchog dang thugs gzhungs phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgya mtshos byin dang tshangs tog zla ba'i gdugs/ /'od 'phro dri med rgyal po ye
<p>243b.7</p>shes grags/ /kun rgyal yon tan 'od dang sgra grags dang / /zla rgyas rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+ma'i 'od zer brtul zhugs bzang po dang / /sgron rgyal glog gi 'od dang 'od zer rgyal/ /skar mkhan grags rdzogs pad+ma'i snying po dang / /rgyal dang spyan mdos rnams la phyag
<p>244a</p>
<p>244a.1</p>'tshal lo/ /rnyog pa med don dang ni drag shul sde/ /bsod nams gzi brjid mthu rtsal thogs med blo/ /sgra gcan lha dang shes phung kha lo sgyur/ /skye mtshungs me tog tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgra gcan 'dzin dang sman chen rgyu skar rgyal/ /sman rgyal bsod nams
<p>244a.2</p>glang po gcod mdzad dang / /rnam grags rgyal po nyi ma'i 'od zer dang / /chos mdzod blo gros bzang po phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan dbang mtshungs dang ni rdo rje'i sde/ /shes rab brtsegs pa legs gnas blo sbyangs dang / /tshangs dbyangs yon tan mchog dang 'brug sgra dang / /mngon shes tog dang
<p>244a.3</p>tog 'od phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge ba tshangs pa skyes mchog spyan sdug pa/ /klus byin bden pa'i tog dang brgyan pa dang / /zhum pa med pa'i dbyangs dang rin chen 'od/ /dbyangs byin rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /seng ge dang ni 'od zer sna tshogs dang / /ye shes dpa' bo pad phur me tog
<p>244a.4</p>rgyas /mthu stobs bsod nams phung po gzugs mchog dang / /skar mkhan zla ba sgron ma phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzi brjid phung po byang chub rgyal po dang / /mi zad mngon rtogs spyan dang yan lag rgyas/ /yul 'khor shes rab mchog ma gzi chim mdzad/ /shes byin mgon po 'jam dbyangs phyag
<p>244a.5</p>'tshal lo/ /chags pa med pa'i mdzod dang gtso bos byin/ /gtso bo ye shes mthu rtsal 'od 'phro can/ /dbang po dang ni shugs 'chang skar rgyal dang / /'od bzang grags pa byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzugs bzang dang ni rgyal po don grub dang / /seng ge'i sde zhes bya dang nor lha'i bu/ /grags pa
<p>244a.6</p>rgyal ba rgya chen snying po dang / /bsod nams 'od zer smrang 'don phyag 'tshal lo/ sgron ma'i rgyal po dang ni ye shes brtsegs/ /lha mchog sa bdag grol brnyes gtsug gi gser/ /sgra gcan bzang po thub dka' thub gsal dang / /zla ba'i 'od zer rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gser 'od
<p>244a.7</p>legs byin lha yi yon tan dbang / /chos gdugs bsod nams lag dang chags med dang / /ye shes gya nom blo gros zhib mo dang / /gzi byin thams cad rtsi sman phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam grol tog dang 'od mdzod ye shes rgyal/ /'jigs mdzad chu bo spangs dang thogs med grags/ /bden pa'i
<p>244b</p>
<p>244b.1</p>phung po dbyangs snyan ri dbang mtshungs/ /chos brtsegs rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /thar pa'i gzi brjid legs mdzad rab zhi'i sku/ /yid 'ong gsung dang blo sbyangs chu yi lha/ /'gros mchod seng logs chos kyi mthu rtsal dang / /skal bzang rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>244b.2</p>mi 'khrugs mdog dang gzi brjid rgyal po dang / /rtogs mdzad spyan legs don la gnas pa'i blo/ /snang ba'i 'od zer spos gzi kun dga' mdzad/ /don yod gshegs dang khro bcom phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzugs mchog legs gshegs rab sbyin grags pa dang / /'od gtsang lha yi nyi ma/ /
<p>244b.3</p>shes rab byin/ /mnyam par gzhag pa'i bdag nyid gzi mdangs dang / /rgyal rigs skal ldan shing rta phyag 'tshal lo/ /gser mchog rnam grol gtsug dang chos ldan dang / /spos gnas dregs pa spongs dang ye shes mdzod/ /tshangs par gshegs dang tsan+dan mya ngan med/ /seng ge'i
<p>244b.4</p>'od zer rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yul 'khor tog dang pad snying gzi mtha' yas/ /lha 'od shes rab me tog mkhas pa dang / /ye shes 'byor ldan dang ni tshangs pa'i dbyig /phyag na rin chen dbang ldan phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzogs par gsung dang mchog gsung mchod 'os dang / /skar
<p>244b.5</p>rgyal nyi ma dang ni 'dam las brgal/ /ye shes brnyes dang grub pa rma bya dang / /chos byin rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /phan par bzhed dang ye shes ldan grags pa/ /'od zer dra ba dang ni rnam par bcom/ /baiDUbai DU snying me tog lha rgyal po/ /zla ba dang ni dran 'od phyag 'tshal
<p>244b.6</p>lo/ /dge 'od yon tan mchog 'od rin chen dpal/ /skyes bu zla ba sgra gcan bdud rtsi'i 'od/ /'jig rten mchog dang skar 'od zhi ba'i stabs/ /ye shes rgya mtsho rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ri dbang rab zhi yon tan mtha' stobs dang / /lha dbang dang ni dbyangs snyan ngos bzang dang / /
<p>244b.7</p>don gnas yon brjid mkhyen ldan zla med dang / /nga ro dpag med rgyal ba phyag 'tshal lo/ /'od bzang thugs gzhungs don dgongs gti mug bral/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag khyad 'phags mchog mdzes gshegs/ /zhi don skyon med blo sbyangs dge ba dang / /pad mdzod 'od zer bzang po phyag
<p>245a</p>
<p>245a.1</p>'tshal lo/ /spobs pa'i mdog dang stegs bzang tshogs dbang dang / /bsnyengs bral ye shes bzhed pa spobs pa'i spyan/ /blo mchog zla ba rin chen zla 'od dang / /bsnyengs med rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzigs pa che dang tshangs dbyangs
<p>245a.2</p>bzang dang / /shes rab che stegs blo gros zla med dang / /rdo mkhregs byang chub blo gros ljon shing dbang / /gdangs snyan bsod nams stobs la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /mthu dpal 'phags la dgyes dang mthu stobs dang / /skar ma dgyes dang sprin sgra spyan sdug zhal/ /ye shes bzang
<p>245a.3</p>ldan 'byor ldan yon tan phung / /gsal ba rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan ye shes nga ro dang / /nam mkha' mchod sbyin nga ro shes 'god dang / /yon 'od gzi brjid drang srong dbang blo ldan/ /spobs tshogs mchod sbyin bzang po phyag 'tshal lo/ /zla zhal shin tu
<p>245a.4</p>gzigs dang rdul bral dang / /yon tan tshogs dang tog ldan bsod rgyal mtshan/ /yul 'khor spobs pa rin chen rab sbyin dang / /zla dgyes seng ge'i stobs la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang sgyur rgyal po bdud rtsi gsal ba dang / /bsam gtan snyoms dang 'khrug med dri ma zhi/ /phyogs ma
<p>245a.5</p>bslad dang mdzes pa zhal bzang dang / /shugs gnas ye ldan gsung dbang phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzi brjid chen po blo gros zab bdud rtsi/ /chos kyi stobs dang mchod ldan me tog 'od/ /khams gsum mchod gnas sgra gcan nyi ma'i snying / /lhas mchod thar pa'i rgyal mtshan phyag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>245a.6</p>dge gtsug bdud rtsi'i 'od dang rdo rje dang / /brtan pa rin chen phung po mdzes gshegs dang / /nyi ltar gshegs dang dag 'od yon tan gtsug /dpal rdzogs rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /seng ge'i stabs dang gyen 'phags me tog byin/ /'od 'gyed pad+ma dang ni ye shes dgyes/ /
<p>245a.7</p>bkod mdzes gti mug med gnas rma med pa/ /tog gi rgyal mtshan rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde dgongs gti mug med rgyal cho ga mkhyen/ /dag pa'i rgya mtsho rin chen mnga' mi mnga'/ /dga' mdzad rma bya'i nga ro ma zhum dang / /srid sred dri ma spangs la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyod pa'i stegs
<p>245b</p>
<p>245b.1</p>dang lha mang snyan bsgrags dang / /rin stabs phyag pad bsnams dpal dgra las rgyal/ /'byor grags yul 'khor bzang dang me tog 'od/ /seng ge'i nga ro rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zla ba ltar shar 'joms pa'i mchog mi g.yo/ /phan ldan gshegs dang bsod nams sgron ma'i rgyal/ /
<p>245b.2</p>dbyangs bskul go'u ta ma mdangs kyi stobs/ /blo gnas rang bzhin zla bzang phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub yan lag me tog bkra shis dang / /legs ston ye shes gzi stobs dge ba'i sgron/ /mthu rtsal brtan po lha dgra rab zhi dang / /nyi zhal thar pa'i brtul zhugs phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshul
<p>245b.3</p>khrims 'od dang brtul zhugs gnas rdul med/ /snying po 'phags dang mig sman 'phel bar mdzad/ /spos 'od dus mkhyen 'od dang dran pa'i dbang / /thogs med rgyal mtshan rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub mchog bgrod spyod gsal rin chen dgyes/ /chos dbang lha thams cad pa
<p>245b.4</p>bshes gnyen che/ /bshes gnyen bzang po rab tu zhi ba'i stabs/ /bdud rtsi bdag po lhun 'od phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pas bstod dang snang ldan gzi brjid 'bar/ /snang ba gzigs dang legs spyad rnam par smin/ /legs dgyes mya ngan bral dang rin chen 'od/ /spyod ldan bsod
<p>245b.5</p>nams stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan rgya mtsho rmad byung nga rgyal spong / /bdud brlag mdzad dang bag chags rgal ba'i stabs/ /mi phyed blo mnga' rgya mtsho dag mdzad dang / /tshogs can grol rgyal dga' 'od phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang rgyal ye shes rin chen shin tu bsil/ /tshangs rgyal
<p>245b.6</p>ye shes dgyes dang rdzu 'phrul tog /skye dbang mtshungs dang sa yi dbang phyug dang / /nyi dgyes sgra gcan zla ba phyag 'tshal lo/ /me tog 'od dang sman bdag mdangs mnga' dang / /bsod nams dgyes dang dga' stobs dbyangs snyan dang / /chos kyi dbang phyug tshangs dbyangs spyod bzang
<p>245b.7</p>dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i blo la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyangs chen snyan par grags dang tog ldan dang / /gzi brjid rnam grags 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang / /ljon pa gti mug rab zad dpag med dang / /zla bzang spobs yas tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brtul zhugs bstar dang mchod gnas
<p>246a</p>
<p>246a.1</p>mya ngan brgal/ /dge dges 'gro ba'i blo gros dgyes par gshegs/ /zhabs mdzes ut+pal dul gnas me tog dang / /spobs pa mtha' yas 'od zer phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong gsal ba yon tan brtson 'grus snying / /lta bdag rin chen mthon po gsal ba dang / /skal ldan
<p>246a.2</p>shing rta bsod nams blo gros dang / sbyin sreg 'od 'phro gzi phung phyag 'tshal lo/ /seng ge'i stabs dang mi g.yo rab gsal dang / /'od spyod glu dbyangs glu dbyangs 'khor lo 'dzin/ /dbyig mchog 'jig rten dga' dang chos zla dang / /dga' ba mtha' yas grags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sprin tog
<p>246a.3</p>shes rab 'gros dang spos bzang dang / /nam mkha'i dbyangs dang lha dang lha rgyal dang / /nor bu gsal dang nor bzang sgron ma dang / /rin chen nga ro'i dbyangs la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye dbang rgyal po sgra gcan sbed pa dang / /dge mdzad seng blo rin chen grags pa dang / /don mdzad mdzad mtha'
<p>246a.4</p>gzigs dang srid me tog /mdzod spu spobs pa mtshungs med phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes rnam 'byed nga ro seng mche ba/ /mdzes gshegs bsod nams sgron ma bkra shis ldan/ /yul 'khor myang med blo gros sems blo ldan/ /chos sgron shin tu gzigs la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /shugs 'dor
<p>246a.5</p>stobs chen shes rab me tog dang / /brtan pa'i dbyangs dang bde ldan don gsung dang / /dgyes pa gsal ba seng ge'i zhal gtsug phud/ /snang mdzad rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /bskal bzang 'dir 'byung sangs rgyas stong gi mtshan/ /gang gis thos shing gus pas sdig kun sreg /
<p>246a.6</p>rgyal ba kun mthong ngan song sdug bsngal spong / /bzod ldan bde ba mchog brgyud myang 'das 'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog dga' rgyal po yi/ /drin gyis legs bsgos kha che paN chen gyis/ /sbyar 'di gzhan las don lngas khyad par 'phags/ /de lta'ang nyes tshul sdig kun so sor bshags/ /
<p>246a.7</p>bdag gi mos blos 'bad pa cher byas pa'i/ /dge ba 'di dang mtha' yas dge ba kun/ /'gro ba kun sbyin kun kyang rgyal ba yis/ /kun du rjes bzung kun mkhyen myur thob shog /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod bskal bzang rgyan gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba/ /kha che'i paN+Di ta shAkya shrIs sbyar ba rdzogs so// //
<p>246b</p>
<p>246b.1</p>paN+Di ta de nyid dang / lo ts+tsha ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur// //slad kyi char yang sa skya lo tsA bas cung zad bcos shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ yo ga tsa tu ra de wa sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sbyor ba bzhi'i lha la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ 
<p>246b.2</p>bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sten mtshon seng ge'i khri stengs na/ /sku drang dgongs pa shin tu gzhan/ /rdo rje skyil krung der bzhugs nas/ /gang du ting 'dzin yongs 'du ba'i/ /ting 'dzin rgyal po zhes bgyi la/ /mnyam par gzhag cing dgongs
<p>246b.3</p>mkhyen pa'i/ /de bzhengs 'phrul gyi spyan gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas zhing gzigs khyod la 'dud/ /sku gnas nyi shu rtsa gnyis nas/ /'od zer bye ba khrag khrig ni/ /brgya stong drug cu drug cu ni/ /'byin pa'i sku de la phyag 'tshal/ /mi mjed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du/ /'od kyi snang bas
<p>246b.4</p>khyab byed pa/ /'od des reg pa'i sems can rnams/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges gyur pa'i/ /'phro ba 'dren la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ba spu'i 'od dang rang bzhin 'od/ /mi mjed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du/ /'od kyi snang bas khyab byed pa/ /'od kyis reg pa'i sems can rnams/ /rdzogs
<p>246b.5</p>pa'i byang chub nges gyur pa/ /'gro mgon shAkya seng ger 'dud/ /ljags 'od bye ba khrag khrig ni/ /brgya stong rtse las pad 'dab stong / /de stong bde gshegs thugs mnga' bzhugs/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing du gshegs byon cing / /pha rol phyin drug chos ston mdzad/ /chos thos sems
<p>246b.6</p>can byang chub nges/ /'gro mgon sprul pa'i sku la bstod/ /seng ge rnam grol ting 'dzin gyis/ /g.yo ldegs ltas chen bco brgyad kyis/ /mi mjed phyogs bcu'i ngan song kun/ /rgyun 'chad lha mi'i skal mnyam byas/ /tshe rabs dran zhing sangs rgyas 'dud/ /ngan song skyob la phyag 'tshal
<p>246b.7</p>'dud/ /mi mjed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams/ /'od kyis zil mnan lham me ni/ /lhang nger bzhugs pa'i sku la bstod/ /rang bzhin sku brtan lha rnams kyis/ /mchod rdzas mchod de dbu stengs su/ /byin gyis me tog khang brtsegs gyur/ /rang 'od mi mdzad phyogs bcu'i zhing / /kun
<p>247a</p>
<p>247a.1</p>snang sems can mthong nas kyang / /rang mdun 'dug ste chos ston snyam/ /sku gcig du mar snang la bstod/ /rang 'od phyogs bcu'i zhing khyab nas/ /sems can ji snyed 'khod pa yis/ /rang 'khor bcas pa snang byed pa'i/ /gser 'od shAkya seng ger 'dud/ /gzungs dang
<p>247a.2</p>ting 'dzin rab thob pa'i/ /stong nyid mtshan med spyod yul can/ /rdol med pa yi smon lam ldan/ /chos mnyam gzung dang bzod rab thob/ /blo chen sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thogs med spobs ldan bstan pa ni/ /zad mi shes shing so so ni/ /yang dag rig pa khong du chud/ /mngon
<p>247a.3</p>shes chen po rnam par rtse/ /mngon shes ma nyams phyag 'tshal bstod/ /snyan pos tshig snyan le lo med/ /brtson 'grus lus srog mi lta zhing / /tshul 'chos kha gsag grags pa med/ /khe dang bkur sti'i sems med pas/ /zang zing med par chos ston pa/ /chos zab bzod pa dam pa
<p>247a.4</p>rtogs/ /mi 'jigs thob la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /zhum med bdud kyi las las 'das/ /las dang nyon mongs phyir rgol bcom/ /phas kyi rgol bas zil mi non/ /nyan thos rang rgyal rtogs dka' ba/ /las sgrib rgyun chad phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam par dbye zhing bstan la mkhas/ /
<p>247a.5</p>bskal pa grangs med smon lam rtsis/ /bzhin 'dzum thog ma khro gnyer med/ /snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan/ /chos rab rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol tshigs bcad dbyangs brjod mkhas/ /spobs pa mi chod 'khor mtha' yas/ /zil gyis mnan pa mi 'jigs ldan/ /bskal
<p>247a.6</p>pa bye ba mtha' yas par/ /bstan pa ye shes 'byung mkhas bstod/ /chos rnams sgyu ma smig rgyu dang / /chu zla rmi lam sgra brnyan dang / /mig yor nam mkha' dri za'i grong / /sprul dang gzugs brnyan khong chud pa'i/ /sems zhum med la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sems can sems rgyu shes pa
<p>247a.7</p>phra/ /spyod mkhas khong chud byas la mkhas/ /sdang med bzod rlabs chos mnyam rtogs/ /chos zab ldan zhing gting dpag dka'/ /sems chos dbang thob las nyon mongs/ /lta sgrib la sgrol phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rten pa rtogs pa bstan la mkhas/ /rten 'brel tshul mi zad
<p>247b</p>
<p>247b.1</p>shes zhugs/ /lta dang bag nyal kun sbyor spongs/ /las dang nyon mongs zhi la mkhas/ /kun ldang bral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bden pa rab rtogs ye shes mkhas/ /chos rnams sgra brnyan lta bur mos/ /chos bstan tshad med 'jigs dang bral/ /bdag nyid ji ltar khong chud mkhas/ /zhing
<p>247b.2</p>khams rnams dgongs rmi lam zin/ /grangs med sangs rgyas dran la bstod/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba nyer 'gro mkhas/ /sangs rgyas dpag med gsol btab mkhas/ /sems lta nyon mongs zhi la mkhas/ /ting 'dzin brgya stong mngon par sgrub/ /rnam rtse ye shes rtogs la
<p>247b.3</p>bstod/ /bzang skyong rin chen 'byung la sogs/ /khyed kyi yon tan bskal par ni/ /mtha' yas brjod kyang mi lang ste/ /de sogs sems dpa'i tshogs la bstod/ /dgra bcom zag zad nyon mongs med/ /dbang gyur sems ni rnam par grol/ /shes rab shin tu rnam par grol/ /cang
<p>247b.4</p>shes glang chen bya ba byas/ /byed pa byas shing khur bor ba/ /rang gi don ni rab thob pa/ /srid pa kun sbyor yongs su zad/ /yang dag pa yi bka' yis ni/ /sems ni shin tu rnam par grol/ /sems dbang pha rol mchog thob pa'i/ /nyan thos dge slong tshogs la bstod/ /dge bsnyen pha
<p>247b.5</p>dang dge bsnyen ma/ /chos mthong ba yi tshogs la bstod// @##/ /chos sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod pa/ /smra bsam brjod med shes rab pha rol phyin/ /ma skyes mi 'gag nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ /so so rang rig ye shes spyod yul ba/ /dus gsum
<p>247b.6</p>rgyal ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /stong pa bco brgyad chos kyi sdong po la/ /pha rol phyin bcu mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /tshad med bzhi yi lo 'dab rgyas pa la/ /skye 'gag med pa'i 'bras bu so sor smin/ /sa bcu chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhing khams thams cad gser
<p>247b.7</p>gyi sa gzhi la/ /rin chen rnam pa mang po gcal du bkram/ /me tog puN+Da rI ka char bzhin 'bab/ /yum gyur dge ma khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gnas med ji ltar nam mkha' bzhin/ /spros pa med cing snang ba med/ /khyod kyi thugs ni nam mkha' 'dra/ /nam mkha' mtha' dang dbus med
<p>248a</p>
<p>248a.1</p>pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid de/ /dus gsum las ni shin tu 'das/ /dmigs med chos sku phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bla ma bsu skyel chos snyan bstod/ /gtsug lag mchod rten rjes bsgrubs shing / /phud byas phyag zhabs 'khor los mtshan/ /
<p>248a.2</p>'khor mangs khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /yi dam brtan g.yas zhabs gnas te/ /mi g.yo brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsdu ba bzhi ni goms byas pas/ /phyag dang zhabs gnyis dra bas 'brel/ /myur 'du'i snga ltas phyag 'tshal lo/ /bza' bca' btung zhim byin rtags su/ /
<p>248a.3</p>phyag zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags/ /sku bdun shin tu mtho ba ste/ /btud zhing nyams bde'i snga ltas bstod/ /srog gcod spangs sogs yon tan gyis/ /rting yangs sku che drar ba ste/ /sku che ring ba khyed la bstod/ /dge ba'i tshogs sogs blang byas pas/ /zhabs gong
<p>248a.4</p>mtho zhing spu gyen 'khyil/ /mi mnyam chos ltas phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig bzo rim gro gzhan byin sogs/ /e na'i byin pa lta bu ste/ /myur 'dzin snga ltas phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdog pa thams cad btang byas pas/ /phyag ni brla steng slebs pa ste/ /dul ba'i snga ltas phyag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>248a.5</p>tshangs spyod la sogs yon tan gyis/ /gsang gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/ /bu mang snga ltas phyag 'tshal lo/ /stan sogs gzhal med khang byin pas/ /gser gyi kha dog mdog 'jam pa/ /gnas sogs bzang po thob phyag 'tshal/ /slob dpon la sogs rim gro byas/ /sku
<p>248a.6</p>rabs g.yas 'khyil mdzod spus brgyan/ /mnyam pa'i snga ltas phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi snyan mi spyod yon tan sogs/ /seng ge'i ro stod spyan zlum mdzes/ /thub med snga ltas phyag 'tshal lo/ /nad pa rnams la sman sogs byin/ /phyag sor rgyas shing ro mchog ldan/ /nad nyung snga ltas
<p>248a.7</p>can la bstod/ /zas stegs la sogs byas pa yis/ /chu zhing gab cing spyi gtsug ldan/ /mnga' chen mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yun ring tshig snyan nyams bde smras/ /ljags yang srab pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /yan lag lnga ldan gsung mnga' bstod/ /yun ring tshig 'khyal spangs
<p>248b</p>
<p>248b.1</p>pa yi/ /seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ /tshig mnyam snga ltas phyag 'tshal lo/ /rim gro mnyam med 'tsho dag pas/ /tshems mnyam shin tu dkar ba ste/ /'khor ba snga nas bsags ltas can/ /bden zhing phra ma med tshig gis/ /tshems thags bzang zhing bzhi bcu tshang / /
<p>248b.2</p>'khor ba dbyer mi phyed la bstod/ /ma chags mi ldan blta byas pas/ /brdzi spyan gyi dkar nag dbye ma/ /kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas can/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan bstod/ /'du dben sen mo zangs mdog 'dra/ /sems can phan sems sen mdog snum/ /rigs
<p>248b.3</p>rgyud mtho phyir sen mo mtho/ /sor zlum kha na ma tho med/ /dge ba'i tshogs rdzogs sen mo rgyas/ /dge ba rtsa grub sor mo gzhol/ /'tsho bas dben pa rtsa mi mngon/ /nyon mongs mdud grol rtsa mdud med/ /long bu mi mngon dbyen chos mnga'/ /mi mnyam sgrol bas zhal mnyam yin/ /
<p>248b.4</p>seng ge'i seng ge'i 'gros bzhud bstod/ /glang po glang po'i 'gros bzhud bstod/ /dang pa ngang pa'i stabs bzhud bstod/ /khyu mchog khyu mchog 'gros bzhud bstod/ /mthun pa'i lam lnga g.yas phyogs bzhud/ /lta mdzes mdzes par bzhud la bstod/ /thugs g.yo mi mnga' mi
<p>248b.5</p>g.yo bzhud/ /sku legs yon tan ston pa ste/ /sku sbyangs sdig pa sbyangs pa yin/ /chos ston sku rim gzhol la bstod/ /sku gsung thugs gtsang sku 'jam pa/ /rnam dag sku mnga' sku rnam dag /chos 'dul mdzes pas yo byad rdzogs/ /yon tan yangs bzang sku che mdzes/ /
<p>248b.6</p>mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' sku mnyam bstod/ /'jam pa'i chos ston sku ni gzhon/ /mi zhum thugs mnga' sku zhum med/ /mi dge spangs pas sku rnam rgyal/ /'byung zad sku mkhregs khyod la bstod/ /yan lag rnam mdzes gzigs pa dag /nga rgyal de'u bcom sogs kyis/ /phyal
<p>248b.7</p>zlum phyal phyal khyal ma zhom/ /chos zad yang dag bzlog pas ni/ /phyal ni phyal le bzhugs la bstod/ /chos zab thugs chud yon tan rdzogs/ /lte zab lte bag yas phyogs 'khyil/ /'khor mdzes la sogs yon tan gyis/ /mdzes gtsang sku la rme ba med/ /yang zhing byams pa'i yon
<p>249a</p>
<p>249a.1</p>tan sogs/ /phyag 'jam phyag ris zab cing snum/ /bzo dang bslabs pa'i yon tan sogs/ /phyag ris ring zhing zhal mi ring / /gzugs skyes gzugs brnyan snang la bstod/ /'jam pa sngon btang yon tan rdzogs/ /ljags 'jam ljags srab ljags dmar/
<p>249a.2</p>pa/ bsnyengs pa mi mnga' yon tan rdzogs/ /glang chen 'brug sgra nyams che'i gsung / /srid sbyor 'das sogs yon tan gyis/ /tshems kyi mche ba zlum zhing rno/ /tshems mnyam rim gyis gzhol la bstod/ /shes rab ri la bzhugs sogs kyis/ /shangs mtho shangs gtsang ldan la
<p>249a.3</p>'dud /gzigs pa rnam dag yon tan rdzogs/ /spyan ring spyan dang rdzi ma stug /smin 'jam smin ring dkar nag phyed/ /smin snum smin mnyam khyod la bstod/ /chos mchog yangs shing don ldan rdzogs/ /snyan ring snyan 'jam snyam ma nyams/ /phas kyi rgol ba'i bdud sogs kyis/ /
<p>249a.4</p>dpral yangs dpral ba legs par grub/ /smon lam shin tu rdzogs rtags su/ /dbu rgyas dbu skra bung ba ltar/ /gnag pa khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thugs 'jam mi gsung mi gsung brlang gsung bral/ /bsgom spang bag nyal spangs sogs kyis/ /dbu stug dbu 'jam dbu mi stug /
<p>249a.5</p>dri zhim dbu mi rtsub la bstod/ /phyag zhabs dpal be'u bkra shis 'khyil/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yis/ /brgyan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sbyor ba bzhi'i lha la bstod pa zhes bya ba paN+Di ta chen po rat+na kIrtis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bal po ma hA pa na'i rang 'gyur// //
<p>249a.6</p>@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA paN+Di ta kIrti dza sto traM/ bod skad du/ mkhas pa chen po grags pa rgyal mtshan la bstod pa/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /blo gros rgya mtshor tshig gi me tog snyan tshig ze'u 'brus rnam par spud pa bstod dbyangs kyi/ /phreng ba spel legs
<p>249a.7</p>dag gis rab brgyus dri med chun pos gang gi mgul la brgyan gyur pa'i/ /blo gsal stong gis khyed kyi rang bzhin bsngags par gyur mod de lta na yang bdag rmongs pa/ /dad pa'i stobs kyis ji ltar nus bzhin cung zad bstod la mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par gsol/ /sgyu ma'i phreng ba'i las
<p>249b</p>
<p>249b.1</p>kyi tshul gyis rmongs gang srid pa'i chu gter du/ /bsod nams gru chag blo gros lus bying ba shes gnyen dam pas dor ba yi/ /lus can rnams la byang chub yan lag drug phrag gsum gyi gzhung lugs kyi/ /rlung drag gtsubs pa'i dba' rlabs 'thor bas dam pa'i go 'phang pha rol
<p>249b.2</p>son/ /grub pa dri med dge slong dge 'dun rig pa 'dzin pa'i sdom brtson dang / /brtul zhugs grub la blo gros gsal ldan rtog ge'i dbang po'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /khyed kyi zhabs rdul rnyog pa med la rnam pa kun tu gtugs slad du/ /gangs can 'di na 'gran zlas dben par mngon du gyur
<p>249b.3</p>bzhin kho bos 'tshal/ /dam pa khyod kyi legs bshad bsod nams sprin/ /dge ba'i lo tog 'phel ba'i char rgyun can/ /snyan pa'i 'brug sgra zab mo snyong sgrogs pas/ /skal ldan blo gros gnyid log rnam par bskul/ /khyod kyis chos sgrub gzhung mang 'chad pa dang / /legs
<p>249b.4</p>bshad rtsom dang kha don rgya chen dang / /ting 'dzin dri med 'khor lo mchod pa'i tshul/ /rnam dag lta ba spyod lam dag pa dang / /gsang sngags rgya mtsho'i tshul la nyer bsten pa/ /khyod kyi kun spyod de dag thams cad la/ /rgol ba gzhan gyis kun nas mi rdzi bas/ /gsang sngags 'dzin
<p>249b.5</p>pa gzhan la sngon ma mthong / /rnam pa sna tshogs rin chen rang bzhin dkon mchog gzhal med dpal ldan gtsug lag khang chen dang / /dga' ston dam pa sa gsum la grags chags bral khyod ni dpal dang 'byor bas rab dge zhing / /thub pa'i sku gzugs gsung rab dag pa rin chen
<p>249b.6</p>las bsgrubs kun nas mdzad pa rgya che ba/ /khyod mtshungs ma mchis de slad bdag blo spro ba'i chu klung dbyar gyi mtsho bzhin rnam par 'phel/ /bsod nams dri med zla zer zil gnon byams pa'i 'od zer rab 'phros pas/ /nam mkha'i zla ba rnyog can des ni khyod kyi dpal rab ma bzod de/ /
<p>249b.7</p>gzugs brnyan tshul gyis rgya mtsho'i klong du 'jug pa 'dod pa nyid snyam du/ /bdag gi blo gros de ltar sems pas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur/ /gdung rgyud dri med yon tan rgya che ni/ /blo gros mtshungs med mkhas pas nyer bsten zhing / /gzhan la phan dgongs phongs pa'i bsti gnas
<p>250a</p>
<p>250a.1</p>sa/ /mdzad pa rgya chen nye bar zhi ba can/ /khyod mtshungs ma mchis de slad dpe bral ba/ /khyed la rnam kun bstod par nus ma lags/ /'on kyang cung zad bstod pa'i spro ba dang / /dge slong mkhas pa byang chub 'od zer gyis/ /rjes su gnang ba thob nas gang snang
<p>250a.2</p>ba /de bzhin 'di ni bdag gis gsal bar sbyar/ /mchog tu rmad byung grags pa rgyal mtshan la/ /mkhas pa bde bar gshegs pa'i dpal bdag gis/ /legs par bstod la bsod nams gang yod pa/ /des ni 'gro kun bla ma la gus shog /bdag nyid chen po grags pa rgyal mtshan
<p>250a.3</p>la bstod pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ga ta shrI sa sbyar ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / shAkya'i dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pa ra ma na gu ru d+harmA rA dza sto tra nA ma/ bod
<p>250a.4</p>skad du/ bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab rgyas rta yi dpung gi dba' rlabs phreng ba mtho zhing zhags pa ral gri mdung rnon gyis/ /chu la rgyu ba rab mang 'jigs rung rnga chen sgra ldan hor zhes bya ba dus mtha' yi/ /chu gter 'di ni
<p>250a.5</p>mtha' dag mkhas pa'i bla ma gang gi zur mig rol pas 'jig rten rnams/ /zhi slad rab mchog rgyal ba'i tshul la zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal po de ni rgyal gyur cig /nub phyogs bod kyi ri la shin tu dri med 'char ba thob cing shar phyogs dag gi yul/ /rim pas mnan pa gang gi rmongs pa las
<p>250a.6</p>skyes shin tu rab rgyas mun pa bcom byas nas/ /sems can byang chub grong khyer phyin slad chos gsung 'od zer dra bas rab mtshungs sangs rgyas la/ /rab tu gsal mdzad chos kyi rgyal po mchog gi 'od zer phreng ldan de ni rgyal gyur cig /gnyis ldan tshu mtha' dag skye bo rnams la phan pa bgyid
<p>250a.7</p>slad rgyun du rab mchog rgyal ba yi/ /khyu mchog sems can dag la brten gang rdzogs ldan la ni rkang pa bzhi dang gsum gang la/ /rkang pas mnan dang gnyis ldan dag la rkang zung gis rgyu rtsod la rkang gcig lhag ma can/ /gang gis sa la rdzogs ldan bzhin du rgyu mdzad chos kyi rgyal po de ni
<p>250b</p>
<p>250b.1</p>rgyal gyur cig /gang zhig 'jig rten dag na sa gzhi 'byung po 'dzin byed nyi ma dag kyang 'jig rten ni/ /snang ba dag nang ldan par byed cing sprin rnams char pa 'bebs byed rlung yang g.yo/ /zla ba bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rnam par spro byed nam mkha'i go skabs sbyin la rab tu dpa'/ /de bzhin chos kyi
<p>250b.2</p>rgyal pos zol med snying rje sems can kun la rab tu 'jug par byed/ /bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po la bstod pa/ rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta snyan ngag mkhan chen po lak+Sh+mI ka ras sbyar ba'o/ /paN+Di de nyid dang / lo tsA ba shong ston gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// //
<p>250b.3</p>@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ si ha nA da lo ke shra ra b+han+TA ra kas+ya stu ti/ bod skad du/ rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra la bstod pa/ 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /srid pa'i gnas ni grangs bral bgrang 'dod 'dir khyod la/ /'od ldan snyan ngag
<p>250b.4</p>mkhan po ches cher dga' ba'i gtam/ /yon tan tshogs brjod de ltar bdag ni blo ngan yang / /'gro ba gnyis su mngon bstod sar pa'i tshig dag 'god/ /rgya chen srid pa'i pha rol byang chub ston mdzad pa/ /dus ring thang gcig bzhin du byas te brtse bas sku bzung nas/ /sems can
<p>250b.5</p>gnas pa ma lus kun mkhyen de nyid la 'god mdzad/ /'gro ba'i mgon po brtse ldan seng ge'i sgra de rgyal gyur cig /gang tshe ri bong mtshan ma mkha' la 'od dang 'gro ba mtshon/ /gang gang chos mkhas sgrub byed bi shwa karma bzhin/ /ma lus dkar ba'i snying po nyams dga'i dngos mdzad pa/ /de
<p>250b.6</p>yang seng ge'i sgra ste 'od zer 'phro zhing rgyal gyur cig /dbu la rin chen 'bar ba 'bad pas gnas par mdzad pas ci/ /legs byas rang bzhin sgron me 'di ni nyer 'dzin mdzad pa lags/ /de ltar gang zhig lag 'gro lta bu'i the tsom bdud ni 'joms/ /pha rol rgol las rnam rgyal seng
<p>250b.7</p>ge'i sgra des khyed la srungs/ /'gro ba gsum gyi sa la mkhas shing bdud kyi phyogs ni 'joms/ /lag 'gro'i bdag por gnas pa'i nad ni 'joms shing bzhugs/ /gang gi rtse gsum dmyal bar 'gro ba'i rtsa ba 'joms pa ste/ /mchog ldan re Nu'i sras po seng ge sgra la phyag
<p>251a</p>
<p>251a.1</p>'tshal lo/ /phul byung dkar ba'i rab lta bu yi shel gyi bgrang phreng yang / /dge ba mdzad pa'i phyag tu thogs pas gshin rje yang dag gnon/ /rab tu mdzes pa nor bu'i rol pa brtse dang tshul khrims ldan/ /dges pa'i spyan ldan seng ge'i sgra des khyed la srung
<p>251a.2</p>gyur cig /snying la 'bab pa'i gang gi ral pa mdzes pa'i zer 'di ni/ /'bar zhing g.yo ba sa 'dzin lag 'gro lhag ma la ni nyal/ /'od gsal mkhar rol 'o ma'i rgya mtshor in+d+ra nI la bzhin/ /seng ge'i sgra des khyed la shis pa mtha' dag ston gyur cig /'gro ba rnam par phongs pa'i
<p>251a.3</p>thabs su gyur pa'i rkyen gang yin/ /bdud bcu po rnams ral gri'i so yis zhi mdzad pa/ /srid pa gsum gyis zhabs la btud pa seng ge'i sgra de yis/ /de ni 'gro ba'i nad dang nyer 'tshe 'joms shing sel gyur cig /ri [(]dgas [,]dwags [)]bdag po yang ni dpal ldan lha rigs skyabs 'os te/ /bde
<p>251a.4</p>gshegs theg pa rig mngon pa yi nga rgyal kun las grol/ /bde gshegs phrin las rnam rgyas gang gi sku la 'dzin mdzad pa/ /seng ge'i sgra des khyed kyi mngon par 'dod don sgrub gyur cig /de ltar bdag gis khyod kyi yon tan tshogs ni yongs su brjod pa las/ /zhi ba'i rang bzhin dge
<p>251a.5</p>ba'i 'bras bu bsags pa'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /ma lus 'gro ba 'di dag dga' ba'i bdag po'i lag tu ma lhung zhing / /rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la kun nas rab tu 'jug gyur cig /mgon po 'di yi gzugs kyi rang bzhin sku ni kun nas thob gyur te/ /ma lus 'gro ba ji snyed 'di ni
<p>251a.6</p>rnam par 'dren pa nyid gyur cig /kun nas gtsang mar byas pa skye bo'i bzhin gyi me long 'di/ /dpal thob ldan pa snyan ngag mkhan gyi bdag po gnyis skyes srung bas byas/ rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge'i sgra la bstod pa rdzogs so// //dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rgyal
<p>251a.7</p>ba spyan snga rin po che'i bka' bzhin zha lu lo tsA ba dge slongad+har+m+ma pA la b+ha dras bsgyur ba'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ lo ke shwa ra rat+na mA la sta bo nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten mgon
<p>251b</p>
<p>251b.1</p>po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dri med thugs ni snying dang snying rjes brlan/ /lam mkhyen nyid dang thams cad mkhyen nyid la sogs don dang tshig/ /gsal bar 'doms shing yongs su rdzogs dang rnam par dag pa'i sku/ /ye shes lhag pa'i bdag pos rol par mgo bos phyag
<p>251b.2</p>bgyi'o/ /gdul bya'i dbye ba'i dbang las gcig kyang du mar snang ba ni/ /chu snod rnams su gnas pa'i ri bong can dang mtshungs gang las/ /khyod ni gsal bar gzhan la phan pa'i rjes su song de'i phyir/ /e ma'o rdzu 'phrul mchog tu rmad byung sku ni rigs pa lags/ /skye bo mu stegs
<p>251b.3</p>pa rnams rab tu sad cing gdul don du/ /yongs rdzogs zla ba'i zhal ni rnam par sgeg pa'i dpral ba yi/ /gnas las lha sbas dbang phyug chen po nges phyung bas/ /lha yi shin tu lha dang chen po'i mi yid bang phyug khyod/ /legs rgyas chen po'i mtshan mnga' khyod kyi phrag pa las/ /
<p>251b.4</p>phyi rol dag tu phyung ba mes po lha yi bu nyid ni/ /pad+ma'i skye ba pa rnams gdul zhing rab tu sad phyir te/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dbang phyug gtso la mgo bos phyag bgyi'o/ /khyab 'jug pa yi skye bo gdul zhing rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /srid sgrub dag kyang phyag na pad+ma 'dzin pa'i thugs ka las/ /
<p>251b.5</p>nges par phyung 'di srid pa'i dbang phyug nyid de de'i slad du/ /mchog gi skyes bu khyod nyid lags te mchog gzhan yod ma yin/ /nyi zlar gus bcas stobs kyis bsnyen bkur rim gro brtsams rnams la/ /yang dag bstan phyir mthon mthing mdzes pa'i spyan ni gang dag las/ /ri bong can dang
<p>251b.6</p>nyi ma nges phyung sa la mig rnams kyi/ /nang gi mun nag 'joms pa de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di na dpal mor rim gro bsnyen bkur sbyor ba po rnams ni/ /gdul dang nges par sad phyir bcom ldan dbyangs can ma 'di dag /rgyal ba'i sras po khyod kyi mche ba'i rtse las rab phyung bas/ /
<p>251b.7</p>mngon 'dod shes rab 'bras bu ster ba de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rlung gi skye ba ba rnams gdul dang mi zad lam grub phyir/ /de nas 'jig rten mgon po'i zhal gang zhig las nges phyung 'di/ /rlung lha mchog gi bla ma sa la skye ba pa rnams kyi/ /spyod lam rnam bzhi'i 'bras bu ster ba de la
<p>252a</p>
<p>252a.1</p>bdag phyag 'tshal/ /chu lha pa rnams gdul dang zhi pa'i lam 'dod ldan rnams kyi/ /yang dag khong du chud phyir bde gshegs sras po'i lto ba las/ /yang dag phyung ba chu lha'i gtso bo yang ste myur ba ru/ /'dod dgu'i dbang phyug nyid kyi 'bras bu ster la bdag
<p>252a.2</p>phyag 'tshal/ /mthun pa'i 'bras bu la sogs mngon par 'dod rnams nges gdul zhing / /yang dag grub phyir rab mchog mtshan ldan zhabs kyi pad+ma las/ /gang zhig nges par phyung ba bcom ldan nor 'dzin mar grags pa/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po mnyam med de la bdag phyag
<p>252a.3</p>'tshal/ /khyod ni srid las grol kyang de la yang dag gnas pa ni/ /sems can tshogs la snying brtse nyid las srid pa'i spyod tshul gyis/ /srid mtha'i bar du brtan pa bdag ni rtag gnas gyur snyam du/ /dam pa'i bsam pa chen po'i mchog gyur khyod la phyag bgyi'o/ /nam mkha'i bar du
<p>252a.4</p>snang ba'i 'jig rten khams rnams khyod nyid kyis/ /rang gi zhabs gcig mthil gyis kyang ni rnam par gnon pa ste/ /bskal ba'i mtha' ru srid pa sred par 'bar ba drag po'i me/ /khyod kyi dbugs kyi rlung gi stobs kyis nges par bcil bar gyur/ /rang gi mdzub mo gyen du gtod de 'dzin
<p>252a.5</p>pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis/ /lhun po'i tshigs rnams du ma g.yo bar gyur cing sen mo yi/ /sbubs kyis gyen du 'dzin pas rgya mtsho'i chu yang lus ma gyur/ /e ma'o 'di lta'i nus pa khyod las gzhan du ci zhig mthong / /mchog tu gnyen gshin zla ba gzhon nu'i mdzes pa yang dag par/ /
<p>252a.6</p>ston pa'i sku mchog 'di yang lang tsho ma yi yin nam ci/ /'jigs byed drag po gnon las mi ldongs ci yang dub pa dang / /gdul dka' ba yi bdud 'joms pa ni khyod kyi spyod tshul lags/ /kye lags 'di ltar chen po'i skye bo'i ril phreng dang mtshungs par/ /rang gi dbu skyes mchog
<p>252a.7</p>tu mdzes pa'i lan bu 'khyog po de/ /de nyid me yis nyon mongs bud shing sbar bar byas pa yi/ /du ba'i phreng ba lta bu dri med khyod la snang bar gyur/ /zla zer cung zad 'phros pa yis ni cung zad khyab khyod kyis/ /nag po'i phyogs zad chung ngu'i cha bcas 'od kyi mdzes pa ni/ /srid pa
<p>252b</p>
<p>252b.1</p>rnams su 'dod pa gang gyur ri bong can gang de/ /khyod zer cung zad las ni ma lus bsam pa rnam par mdzes/ /mthun par 'gros pa'i ngan pa'i lam can lugs 'joms shing / /mi dang mi min bsam pa ston la lam dang lam/ /yang dag thob byed gzhan don spyod tshul mchog gis na/ /
<p>252b.2</p>mdzes ldan rgyal ba sa yi dbang phyug la phyag bgyi'o/ /khyod ni srid dang mya ngan 'das la mi gnas kyang / /'od gsal rang byin brlab sbyor la zhugs phan pa ni/ /ma lus skye bo'i mi dge zhi mdzad dge ba yi/ /mdzes pa'i sa yi dbang phyug rgyal la phyag bgyi'o/ /rigs kyi 'od zer
<p>252b.3</p>dpag med phreng bas yang dag dkrigs/ /rang gi phyag gi chu skyes 'dzin pa las skyes pa de/ /dga' ba rjes mthun thob pa yang dag dga' bde yis/ /mdzes ldan rgyal ba sa yi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal/ /chos kyi dbyings las kun mchog snying rje rang nyid gtso/ /gang zhig dge ba la
<p>252b.4</p>sogs tshogs rnams yang dag rdzogs/ /rnam par rtog spangs mthu las sgra yi ston pa po/ /mdzes ldan rgyal ba sa yi dbang phyug la phyag bgyi'o/ /de bzhin nyid dang nyid min gnyis med bde ba brgyas/ /yongs su gang bar mdzad pa brgya phrag chos kyi gtam/ /shin tu bden zhing
<p>252b.5</p>rigs par gsung bas rnam mdzes pa/ /'dzin ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po mchog la phyag bgyi'o/ /mchog de'i rang gi sku ni 'gro la rab 'phro ba/ /mtsho skyes spyan gyis shin tu mdzes par gyur pa yi/ /ma lus sems can rnams kyi myur ba'i thar mchog gi /rgyal po 'dzin ma'i dbang phyug dam
<p>252b.6</p>par bdag phyag 'tshal/ /mchog tu sprul dang longs spyod rdzogs pa gzhan don dgyes/ /stong nyid gos med chos 'dzin pa la dgyes pa can/ /rnam byang chub las dngos grub dam pa 'dzin dbang po/ /'dzin ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /mchog tu lhan skyes
<p>252b.7</p>dam pa'i rgya mtshor zla zhal gyi/ /sgo las thams cad gsung ba ma lus ngag tshig ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i mtshan nyid rjes mthun rgyan gyi phul/ /dbang phyug 'dzin ma'i rgyal po dam par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten dbang phyug bstod pa rin po che yi phreng ba ni/ /dpal ldan nags kyi rin
<p>253a</p>
<p>253a.1</p>chen zhabs kyis bgyis pa las/ /de yis gtsang ma'i dge ba gang zhig thob gyur pa/ /de nyid kyis ni 'jig rten kun du bzang por gyur/ /bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba 'di ni rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po nags kyi rin po che'i zhal snga
<p>253a.2</p>nas mdzad pa'o/ /mkhas pa chen po de nyid kyi spyan sngar dge slong rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya bas bal yul ye rang gi grong khyer chen po'i 'dab dpal go pi tsan+d+ra'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ga Ne shwar s+ya stabaH/ bod skad du/ 
<p>253a.3</p>tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi bstod pa/ tshogs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshogs chen rgyal po rgyal bar 'grub mdzad pa/ /mche ba gtsigs byed gang chen dbang po'i zhal/ /gdong mdzes skyes bu mchog gi mtshan nyid can/ /tshogs dbang rgyal po mchog la phyag bgyi'o/ /lha
<p>253a.4</p>rdzas rin chen mchog gis brgyan pa'i sku/ /zhabs gdub g.yo zhing rgyas pa'i zhabs zung ni/ /cig car kun rdzob don dam bden mchog nyid/ /tshogs mchog rgyal po'i dbang por phyag bgyi'o/ /dam pa'i dag bas gzhom bya'i g.yul du 'jug /g.yul rgyal 'bar ba'i mtshon cha phyag
<p>253a.5</p>na bsnams/ /zhabs mchog 'dzin ma'i dbang phyug cod pan te/ /rgyal mchog tshogs kyi dbang por phyag bgyi'o/ /'dam skyes dam pa lta bu'i phyag dang zhabs/ /ma lus rab 'byam rnam par 'phro mdzad cing / /mchog gi gzhu 'dra'i dri ma med spyan can/ /rgyal po tshogs dbang
<p>253a.6</p>mchog la phyag bgyi'o/ /yon tan 'byung ba'i grags 'chang 'phags mchog ni/ /'dzin ma'i dbang po'i stobs las stobs gyur bgegs/ /phyag gi stobs 'dra bdud las nges rgyal ba/ /dbang phyug tshogs mchog rgyal la phyag bgyi'o/ /skye bo gter dang rin chen ros tshim zhing / /bdud rtsi chen po'i
<p>253a.7</p>ro mchog rgyas gyur pas/ /srid 'jigs 'jigs pas nyam thag bzod pa'i mchog /rgyal dbang tshogs kyi mchog la phyag bgyi'o/ /brtson pas legs bsgrubs mtshan nyid bde ba ni/ /sems can yid kyi shing rta gang ba'i bde'i/ /gtam la mngon par zhen pa'i bden pa mchog /tshogs
<p>253b</p>
<p>253b.1</p>mchog dbang phyug rgyal por phyag bgyi'o/ /bgegs kyi bdag po dam pa la ni bstod pa'i me/ /nags kyi rin chen gyis byas dge ba rab thob pas/ /bgegs zad srid las rgyal ba'i pha rol sbyin pa las/ /skye bo don dam tshul du mnyam pa nyid gyur cig /tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi
<p>253b.2</p>bstod pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon dpal nags kyi rin chen zhabs kyis mdzad pa yang dag par gang ba'o/ /'di ni dngos grub brnyes pa'i dbang phyug paN+Di ta chen po de nyid kyis dpal bal po'i yul gyi grong khyer chen po ye rang gi dgon pa shrI go bi tsan+d+ra nas/ /dngos grub mchog gi bka'
<p>253b.3</p>drin gyis btsa' ba'i phyir skyes su stsal ba/ dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya ba'i spyi bor thob pa las/ mi 'phrogs pa'i gus pa dang yid dga' ba mu med pas/ skal pa chen po'i snyim par gzung zhing yi dam du bgyis te/ nor bu rgyas pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por
<p>253b.4</p>bod kyi skad du bsgyur nas gzhan la'ang sbyin par bya ba'i chos su bgyis pa'o/ /'dis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mngon par 'dod pa mtha' dag bdag dang gzhan du 'byor bar gyur cig/ @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI sha ba ra pA da sto t+naM/ 
<p>253b.5</p>bod skad du/ dpal ri khrod zhabs kyi bstod pa rin po che/ dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin mchog gi rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /nam mkha'i ngo bo rnam pa thams cad mchog rang bzhin/ /'dod pa sel ba des na sha yig gis brjod pa/ /
<p>253b.6</p>rnal 'byor dbang phyug dpal ldan ri khrod pa la 'dud/ /rtag par byung zhing yod kyang rgyu yis bstod pa yi/ /rdo rje lta bu'i rol mnyam par gzhag gyur pa/ /des na 'di ni ba yig gis na yang dag brjod/ /mgon po ri khrod sdom brtson dbang po la phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu rgyal ba skyes mchog
<p>253b.7</p>rnams kyi gsang chen la/ /dgyes shing gzhan dag chos rnams la ni dga' mdzad pa/ /de lta bu ni ra yi yi ges brjod pa ste/ /rnal 'byor ri khrod par grags de la phyag bgyi'o/ /yig gsum gyis bshad ri khrod pa la rab btud nas/ /yon tan chu gter su zhig gis ni bstod par nus/ /
<p>254a</p>
<p>254a.1</p>'on kyang bdag ni bla ma khyed la dad dbang gis/ /bstod par 'dod pa de slad bstod par bgyi ba lags/ /rab tu sra zhing mi phyed thabs kyi rgyud dang bcas/ /shes rab gzhu ni mngon sum dag tu bsnams nas ni/ /lhan cig skyes pa bdag med mngon sum rang nyid kyis/ /nyams su
<p>254a.2</p>myong ba'i mda' bkang 'gro bar gtogs rnams kyi/ /thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i sdig pa rnams/ /yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir dang nyon mongs shes bya yi/ /sgrib pa la sogs 'ben la bsnun par gyur pa na/ /phug pa lags te kye brtan po khyod ni a la la'o/ /bdag med nyid kyis
<p>254a.3</p>rgyas btab yang dag mtha' yis ni/ /'khor las khyod kyi dpral ba'i mthar ni mdzes mdzad de/ /e ma'o gzhan don bdud rtsi dag la sred ldan pa/ /khyod ni dgra med dpa' bo'i dbang phyug ma lags sam/ /'dod chags dang ni gzhan pa sdang byed gti mug ste/ /gsum po 'di dag 'jig rten dug tu
<p>254a.4</p>rab tu grags/ /de dag thams cad ma lus sel bar mdzad pas na/ /dgra bo drungs phyung dpa' bo'i dar dpyangs bcings pa lags/ /gang zhig 'dod la chags bral gtam gyis dman gyur cing / sra ba'i dregs pas che dang mtho tshig rnam grol ba/ /rnam dag ngag gi rdo rje'i rna rgyan bzang po dag /
<p>254a.5</p>snyan gnyis dag la 'phyang ba de la phyag bgyi'o/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid rdo rje mi rus phreng ba dag /gang gi mgul pa mchog gi rin chen mgul rgyan te/ /nges par 'gro ba rgyas mdzad nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi/ /rnal 'byor dbang po bla ma de la phyag bgyi'o/ /srog gcod pa dang bral bas khyod kyi phyag
<p>254a.6</p>dag la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal ldan gdu bu nges bcings te/ /sbyin pa la sogs pha rol phyin drug rnam dag pa/ /ma ru'i phreng ba drug ni nges par bcings pa lags/ /ma dag 'dod chags btsan thabs dag kyang nges gsal ba'i/ /rnam dag nyid la reg pas skra yi srad bu ni/ /gnyis kyi
<p>254a.7</p>'khor lo'i rang gi lte bar nges dkris bcings/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das pa rnam dag pa'o/ /skye bo skrag pas nyam thag pa dang mi rnams kyi/ /rang la gnod byed khro ba'i rnam pa rab zhi'i slad/ /khyed zhabs chu skyes rtsa ba dag la zhabs gdub dang / /de nyid phyir na dpung rgyan zung dag dkris par 'dod/ /
<p>254b</p>
<p>254b.1</p>'gyur med sems kyi thal bas sku la nges par ni/ /khyab par mdzad de ba spu nges par gang ba nyid/ /de slad khyod kyi sku ni me long 'dra ba ste/ /dpal ldan rdo rje'i sku can bla ma khyod la 'dud/ /phung po yi ni lus la dga' bar 'dzin pa yi/ /'dod chags la sogs rnams kyang sbyang ba'i slad du ni/ /thal
<p>254b.2</p>ba dag gis sku la yang dag byugs pa yi/ /dpal ldan khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchis pa lags/ /ral pa ring gnyis khyo shugs zung ste 'di dag ni/ /gsal por rab tu phyo bas de ni bstan pa yin/ /ral pa ring po bde chen 'khor lor gnas pa ni/ /'od gsal ba yis byin rlabs zung du
<p>254b.3</p>'jug pa 'di/ /seng ge yis ni 'jigs par byed pa'i sgra bsgrags pas/ /gang phyir glang po cher skrag 'jigs pas nyam thag pas/ /gzhom med bdag nyid sgra yi rang bzhin rwa yi ni/ /skad kyi bgegs rnams la ni mgon khyod de 'dra'o/ /khyod kyi ma ru'i phreng ba'i rgyan ni rmad byung ba/ /'di yi phyed
<p>254b.4</p>dmar ba ni kun rdzob bden pa ste/ /phyed nag pa yang don dam pa yi rang bzhin lags/ /de dag gcig nyid 'dud pa gang lags rab tu shis/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin bde ba rgyas mdzad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bcos min de nyid do/ /de slad khyod kyi sku la rnam par bkra ba yis/ /rma
<p>254b.5</p>bya'i mjug ma 'chad pa rmad byung chen po lags/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsa 'di dag dang grangs mnyam pa'i/ /dbang phyug yon tan mchod phyir thogs pa rnam par 'chang / /zhi bde'i sa bon rang gi snying ga'i phyogs na ste/ /dpal ldan ri khrod khyod la rtag par phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub phun sum
<p>254b.6</p>tshogs pa'i gter gyi mchog /dam pa'i sku yi rdo rje dag dang ldan na yang / /de las khyod kyis gcig tu sems can don grub phyir/ /sna tshogs byed pa rnams kyang nges par gzung ba lags/ /kha yig gis ni a ye bdud sde dum bur byas/ /de nas ga yig sems yongs shes pas mkha' la gshegs/ /
<p>254b.7</p>gti mug sogs sel de slad kha dang ga dag gis/ /nam mkha'i sku ste mkha' 'gro yang ni khyod nyid lags/ /kun gyis bkur ba'i mu stegs ngan pa'i 'dod pa bcom/ /mi rnams bde gshegs go 'phang la ni 'god par mdzad/ /legs par 'dus la dam chos rab bstan phan pa dag /gtan bde dam pa'i lam du
<p>255a</p>
<p>255a.1</p>bde par bgrod pa'i gnas/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul brgya phrag gnas kyis gang ba yi/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed pa'i bum pa thogs/ /e ma gzhan don phul byung bsags pa'i rgyal ba ni/ /ri khrod dam pa 'di yin khyod zhabs la 'dud do/ /de ltar bla ma dam pa sha ba ra dbang
<p>255a.2</p>bstod pa yi/ /rin chen brtul zhugs dam pa nags kyi rin chen gyis byas 'dir/ /dge ba gang thob de yis srid pa'i chu gter bying ba dag /phyung nas kun gyis lhun skyes bde 'byor myur du sa thob shog /ces pa dpal sha ba ra'i zhabs kyi bstod pa rin po che rdzogs so// //mkhas pa chen po dpal
<p>255a.3</p>nags kyi rin chen gyis mdzad pa rje btsun dam pa de nyid kyi spyan sngar chos smra ba gzhon nu dpal gyis ding rir bsgyur ba'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu ru ba na rat+na sto tra sab+ta kaM /bod skad du/ dpal ldan bla ma nags kyi rin chen gyi bstod pa bdun pa/ /dpal ldan bla ma nags kyi rin
<p>255a.4</p>chen gyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bal po'i yul gyi rgyal po bde bar gshegs pa yi/ /lugs la rtag tu rjes su brtson pa la bkod cing / /mkhas pa rnams kyi mdzod gyur mthar thug yon tan gyi/ /tshogs kyi zab mo snang mdzad dge slong rgyal po ste/ /rnam par grags shing ma mtshungs pa med pa'i
<p>255a.5</p>grags pa yi/ /rgyal mtshan bla bre dar dpyangs zab cing rgya che'i blo/ /sku yang sems can rnams kyi skyabs ni gcig pu ste/ /theg chen yang dag rtogs pas grub pa'i mtha' yi mdzod/ /nags kyi rin chen zhes bya sdom brtson mchog gi blo/ /gnas brtan 'di na gnyis med chos kyi de nyid rig /'dul ba'i sdom
<p>255a.6</p>pas yang dag sdom la mngon par brtson/ /phas rgol glang po'i dbang la ri dgas rgyal po lags/ /phyag 'tshal sdom brtson chen po'i rgyal po rnams kyi mchog /mchog gi tshul la rab tu rnam par nges pa skye/ /skye bo sdug bsngal dag las 'byin byed gcig pu mchog /mchog tu nags kyi rin chen gnas
<p>255a.7</p>brtan chen po lags/ /chags bral sems can ma lus pa dag sad par mdzad/ /phyag gi chu skyes dag gis mtshon gyi gzhu 'chang ba/ /'dzin pa'i mthil gyi rgyan du gyur pa mdzes pa'i sku/ /gnas brten chen po nags kyi rin chen rab tu mdzes/ /dga' bral dga' ba'i glang po la sogs dri ma yi/ /dri ma dri ma
<p>255b</p>
<p>255b.1</p>med cing bral ba nyams su myong / /srid dang srid pa ma yin gnyis kyi 'ben la mnga'/ /gnas brtan chen po nags kyi rin chen skyabs su gyur/ /dga' bral dang po'i bdud rtsi'i btud pa bdag la dgyes/ /dgyes shing nges la dul ba'i yan lag brgya phrag gis/ /sems can brgya phrag tshogs rnams yongs
<p>255b.2</p>su smin pa dag /rtsi mdzad gnas brtan chen po nags kyi rin chen no/ /bdud sde la sogs rnams kyi kha la ro med mdzad/ /kha yi chu skyes dag ni dgra yis gang ba 'joms/ /skye mched 'dar ba'i phas rgol ri yi dbang po 'khru/ /khrus mdzad nags kyi rin chen gnas brtan chen po'o/ /dpal ldan bla ma nags
<p>255b.3</p>kyi rin chen gyi bstod pa bdun pa 'di ni rdzogs so// //yul ma gad+hA nas byung ba'i dge bsnyen dam pa nyi ma pa zhes bya bas mdzad pa'o/ /'di ni spyan mnga' chos kyi rgyal pos gser gyi me tog dang bcas pa'i bka' lung gis/ /rtse thang lo tsA ba gzhon nu dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// //
<p>255b.4</p>@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ dzA ta ka sta ba/ k+She da n+dA sha ba laM gu Nai ra sha wa laM tsa r+yA bi b+hu twaM bi b+ho/ /dza n+mas+yan+da ni kA bi ba r+t+ta na dza Dany+tsai ta kwa tse dam+ma ma/ yenA ban+d+h+ya pha lo da yas+t+wa yi b+ha ban+t+ya byA hi tAHyAM sha ba/ ste nastu t+ya nu ban+d+hi nA mu kha ra nA mA la m+ba te b+hA ra tI/ tsi t+tA la m+b+ha na la ng+gI naH sha ma dr-i shA mA/ 
<p>255b.5</p>@#/ /bod skad du/ skyes pa rabs kyi bstod pa/ khyab bdag stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ma 'dres spyod pa dbang 'byor ba'i/ /skye ba'i rgyud du rnam par 'jug 'di blun yang bdag gi nam yang ni/ don yod 'bras bu 'byung phyir khyed la rdul tsam/ des na bstod dang rjes su 'brel ba'i ca co tshig dang ming dag dmigs/ sems kyi dmigs las 'gongs zhi ba'i lta ba
<p>255b.6</p>be Ni kAHsang+gu NA/ bA tsAM go tsa ra tAM tu yAn+ni ka la yA s+thu lA hi bo mA dr-i shAM/ rat+na n+yam+bu ni d+he ru pA b+hu pu li ne Sh+wA sir+b+ha ban+t+ya R+thi nA man+ta r+b+hi n+na ta raM gad+yau ta ru ba ka dz+yo t+s+nA ni grih+NA ti kaH/ yA bo bo d+hi pa thA nu yA na ma hA tA mut+sA hi nI ka r+m+ma NA mA mIl+le ka hi to da ye dzi nA kr-i yA bi pyan+di nI san+ta tiH/ sai nI kA pa tsi taHpu na ti b+ha ga bAn saM kI r+t+ya
<p>255b.7</p>ma 'dres yon tan mchog /tshig gi spyod yul nyid gyur cha shas che long 'di 'dra ba/ chu gter sa yi sgang bur rin chen gsal gyur don med rnams kyis ni/ /tha dad nang nas zab cing gsal la 'od ldan len par byed pa bzhin/ /gang byang chub lam rjes su theg pa chen po spro ba las kyis/ bdag la phan pa 'byung rgyal ba brtse ba rgyud sde tshan dag byed bcom ldan yang dag grags/
<p>256a</p>
<p>256a.1</p>mA nA dra d+hu nA dz+he yA b+ho ga bi sA ri No ga ta mA lAHprA ge ba bo d+hau gu NaH/ u d+dA ma dwi ra das+ya rA ga bar shi no br-it+tiM pu ro n+mA di nI/ mA lo kyA bya ti brti nA pra Ni hi hA bo d+ho d+hi yo yan+t+wa yA/ bi n+ya s+yan+ta i bA ma rAs+t+wa yi tsi raM d+harmA b+hi She ka shri yan+te nA kam+pi ta ke sha rAn+ta ma sr-i dza na pu Sh+po pa hA raM di baH/ k+Shu d+du kha gla pi to da rI gi ri da rI rAn+t+ran+ta
<p>256a.2</p>da na shes bya'i longs spyod dri bral lta ci smos byang chub yon tan glang po myos pa chags pa'i dbang gyur gnas kyi myos ma la/ /bzlog par ma nus zhugs pa gcig nas khyod kyi byang chub la/ lha rnams ring nas khyod la chos kyi dbang bskur dpal bzhin thugs dag bkod/ de yis mgul ral pa tha ma spro me tog nye bar za ba/ bkres pa'i sdug bsngal nad kyis ri sul bar du
<p>256a.3</p>ra la s+thitAM/ dr-iSh+t+rA shA ba ka g+hA ta nai ka ra b+ha sAM byA g+h+rIM da yA g+h+rA ta d+hIH/ yas+t+waM balka li nIM dza Ti dza na ba tIM murtiMs mut+s+r-iSh+Ta bAn s+t+rA Nan+te na b+ha bAn b+ha bA dri bi ba ra byA brti nAM de hi nAM/ yAt+p+ra le ya si to pa lA dri ba ha laM mA taM ga tAM bi b+ha tA kAn+tA rAM na ra brti nAM ta nu b+h+r-i tA muts+chit+ta ye byA pa dAm/ shai len+d+raM shi thi lo pa laM tsa la ya tA muk+tas+t+wa
<p>256a.4</p>gnas gyur pa'o/ /stag mo phru gu mthong nas za bar rtsom gzigs gcig tu brtse bas bskyab pa'i blos/ /gang khyod shing shun gyis ni ral ba bcings te btags nas sku dag por des na skyob pa khyod srid pa'i ri bo'i khung bur 'khor ba'i lus can rnams la/ dkar rdob ri glang po nyid bzung dgon par mi 'khyam pa lus bzung chang 'phogs pa rnams la ri dbang yangs pa rdo ba g.yo ba bor khyod kyis bdag
<p>256a.5</p>ta TA tra/ ma n+ye ma t+sa ri NAM ni tAn+ta ma li nAste na k+Sha tA br-it+ta yaH/ ya l+lo kAm+ba ra tsa n+d+ra tsan+d+ra ba pu ShA tsan+d+ra pra b+ha twe twa yA/ kal+mA ShAn+ta shi khaM shi khA ma Ni ru tsA dat+taM twa dzA yAr+tha ne/ nA lAl+lU na mi pA ra bin+da ma si nA pyot+k+r-itra mU laM shi ra/ ste nai ShAny+dza ga tAM ga to si gu ru tA mu Sh+N-ISha ban+mUr+d+ha ni/ bA lAn+bA la sa ro dza ko ma la ta nU n+yat+pu
<p>256a.6</p>'gram du sems ser sna dri ma can des nyams spyod pa rnams/ ganga'ajig rten nam mkhar zla ba zla ba'i lus zla 'od nyid tshe khyod kyis skyon mthar byed gtsug phud gtsug gi nor bu 'od ldan byin gnyis skyes slong ba la/ sdong bu bcad bzhan pad+ma ral gris bcad rtsa ba dbu/ des na 'di dag 'gro rnams la bla ma rnams kyi gtsug tor bzhin du mgo la'o/ /byis pa byis pa mtsho skyes 'jam pa
<p>256b</p>
<p>256b.1</p>tra kA nA r+tha na/ pa R+YAstAh+na tsa lats+tshi khaN+Da ka b+h+r-i to dA rAMsh+tsa b+hA bA nu gAn/ prA dAM s+t+yaM dzi na te na nU na ma b+ha ba n+mA rang+ga nA nAM mu khaM sang+go bAny+tsi ta pak+Sh+ma lo tsa na da laM ya dz+nyA la sA ma n+tharaM/ sha y+Ya swa bI tsA ri NA ba na b+hU trA purA pa k+Shi NA/ b+hi n+nA she Sha ka le dze ga t+ya bi ka le dz+yAyaHpa thA shaM si nA/ bi stA raM ga mi taM pra ta tAMya n+nA tha kA
<p>256b.2</p>lus bu don gnyer la/ gtsug phud/ bzung chung ma yang dang po dang rjes mthun/ rgyal ba de yis bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyi kha rdzi ma mig 'dab ma gang dra ba snyan tshig 'dar mal gnyid rnam dpyod nags sa gyur nas grong bya yis tha dad ma lus 'gro la ma tshang med rga po'i lam bsngags/ rgya chen 'grod pa brtul zhugs bzung gang
<p>256b.3</p>biny+dza laM/ te nA dz+nyA ma ru tAM gi rI Ta ki ra Na ts+tshA yaM yAspa daM po ga tA/ yat+par+N+Nam+bu pha lA shi nI sha sha ta nuM twaM nA tha bi b+h+rat+pu rA/ tat+kA lA ti tha ye kr-i pA ri tsa yA dA ti Sh+ya mA be da na ya na/ AHrU D+haHs+phu Ta bi s+phu ling+ga ma na lan+te nA d+hu na pi k+Shi tA/ bin+do maN+Da la lwany+tsa naM sha sha ma yaM yuSh+maR+Ya sho lak+Sh+ya te/ yat+ko pA ru Na dr-iSh+Ti nA ka la
<p>256b.4</p>mgon/ de yis shes cod pan 'od mdzes go 'phang / gang zhig lo ma chu dang 'bras bu za ba'i ri bong lus ni mgon khyod bzung ba na/ de dus 'gron la brtse bas yongs su 'gris pas sbyin byar rig nas zhugs 'phro me stag me la de nas ltos pa med/ thig le'i dkyil 'khor mtshan ma ri bong rang bzhin khyod kyis grags pa mtshon par byed/ /gang 'khros skya rangs
<p>256b.5</p>b+hu bA kr-i twA b+h+ru bo b+hang+ga nI le khA mul+la si tA si nA bi da li ta prang+ga mA sang+gi nA/ twA mA sI ta k+Sha Na ma pya bi k+Sha ta d+hi yaM t+yak+tu mA na k+Sha mA n+ye te na ni rang+ku shAHsma ra sha rAHpu ng+khe Shu b+had+gad+ga tA/ yad+d+we ShI ha ri NA tsi rA ta na d+ha nu ta na d+ha nurdan+tes+t+wa yA\u0f85b+h+yartsi taHShaD+dan+te na sa tA si ton+na ta br-i hadz+dzI mU ta pu ny+dza twi ShA/ ko shA kar+Sha Na bAn+ta b+hU ri ru d+hi ra
<p>256b.6</p>mthong byas nas smin ma g.yo ri mo ral gris rnam par bcom/ nying lag sha khyod la skad cig kyang blo btang bzod dang mi bzod sems pa des na lcags kyu med dran pa'i mda' bcom par gyur/ gang sdang 'phrog pas ring nas gzhu so khyod kyis mngon par mchod so drug pa yis dkar zhing mtho ba lha yi char sprin phung po 'od 'bar ba/ /sbubs nas bkug pas
<p>257a</p>
<p>257a.1</p>k+Sho dA ru Nai ste na baH/ pA tA le pi b+hu dzaM ga meHsh+la tha pha Nai ra d+yA pi daM Sh+tAr+ts+ya ta/ saM ram+b+hat+pha Ni nAM pha NA ha ti tsa lAng+b+hI mo rmi mA lA da pAm+pa t+yuR+Yat+ma kats+tsha TA bi lu li tAt+par+yasta nau kA na rAH/ prem+NA kA ya ma hA p+ma be na b+ha ba tA tI rAn+na mA pA di tA tat+karmA ti sha ye na te na ni khi lA lo kAHka la trI kr-i tA/ shai
<p>257a.2</p>shugs pa mang po khrag mi bzad/ /sa 'og tu yang lag 'gro rnams kyis lhod pa'i gdengs kas dpung yang 'tsho ba mchod par byed/ yang dag brtsams pa gdengs kaH g.yo ba 'jigs su rung rlabs phreng chu bdag chu srin/ lus rgyal chen pos/ khyod kyis 'gram du/ de'i las phul du byung ba des/ ma lus snang ba/ ri yi
<p>257a.3</p>lAt+ma N+Da li no bi lang+g+h+ya bi Sha yAM sto yA ba lI me kha lAnra/ yats+tsin+tA ma Ni nA na re N+ya ba da ra dwI pAn+na rA lo da rAtra/ lab+d+h+wa pUr+N+Na pha lA twa yA pra Na yi nA mA shA ba ba n+d+hA kr-i tA/ s+t+wat+ta ste na sa mud+b+ha ban+ti bi du ShAM sad+d+har+m+ma rat+nA ng+ku rAH/ sAn+d+ra m+bAn+ta bi tA na nI la pa pu ShA mo dzo mu paM ra k+Sha sAM khaD+got+k+r-it+ta da lairbi bA Ti ta shi rA ran+d+h+ra sra bal+lo hi taiH/ 
<p>257a.4</p>dkyil 'khor/ 'gongs nas gul gu phreng ba ske rags/ gang yid bzhin nor bu/ rgya shug gling bar lto ba las thob nas gang ba'i 'bras bu khyod kyis byas khyod las des byung ba mkhas rnams kyis dam chos rin chen myu gu/ bla re sngon po lus gzi mdangs srung rnams ral gris bcad cing dral bas rtsa yi bu ga nas 'dzag khrag rnams kyis
<p>257a.5</p>ya t+mA sai ra kr-i pAHk+Shu d+hA byu pa sha maM sai ra bya pe top+sa b+hiR+Yo gA dzan+ma ru d+ho b+ha b+hod+b+ha wa tr-i ShA muts+tshe di na ste na baH/ sh+yenot+ta sa bi shuSh+ka pam+bi ta ga la s+yot+saM ga saM sa pi No/ yan+niHsaM ga ra tA shi bA ya shi bi nA ra dz+nyA ma tA pak+Shi NaH/ rak+tong+gA ra ka laM ki tA tu la tu lA mA ro pi tA te ta nurmA ra sten du kU la pa k+Sh+ma ta ra laM nI tastu lA lA g+ha baM/ la k+Sh+me
<p>257a.6</p>brtse med/ bkres pa nyer zhi rang 'dod rnal 'byor skye ba srid pa las byung skom pa chad khra yis skrag skams shing mgul mgrin pa 'gags/ gang zhig chags med dga' ba zhi phyir zhi ldan rgyal pos 'dab chags khrag srang la gzhal yang lus ni bdud kyis du kU la yi zegs ma bzhin srang la shin tu yang bar byas dpal
<p>257b</p>
<p>257b.1</p>ma bya ba d+hU ya bAny+tsi ta pha lA mA khaN+Da mAg+h+yaM si nAM/ yat+tiR+Yag+na tI san+d+hi ban+d+ha ma d+ha maM kr-i twA b+ha bAn dzain+mi nAM/ tsakre marma b+hi dAM rudzAM swa pi shi taiHprA ban+d+ha kI nAM sha maM/ te na kle sha bi Shats+tshi dAM ta ba d+hi yA ma byA ha tAHshak+na yaH/ yat+san+do ha mi ba shri yA pha la mi ba prots+tsh+ra yi buN+yau dza saM/ dig+dAM nak+ta kaNaiHs+phu rat+ku ba la yats+tshA yA b+hi nI lA ya taM/ 
<p>257b.2</p>mos yang ni 'dar nas 'dod pa'i 'bras bu dum bu yang ba/ gang dud 'gro'i mtshams sbyor 'ching ba tha mar byas nas khyod kyi skye ba'o/ 'khor lo'i gnad pa byed nad kyis rang gi sha rnams kyis rab bcings zhi ba de yis nyon mongs dug bcad khyod kyi blo yis thogs med nus/ gang the tshom bzhin du/ dpal gyi 'bras bu bzhin bsod nams mtshan mo'i zegs ma 'phred dang ut+pal ltar mdzes mngon par
<p>257b.3</p>ut+pA T+yAk+Sha Ni dwa NaM dwa ya sa dArbi pA ya ni sh+tsak+Shu She/ te na n+d+ha s+ya ta ma swa to s+ya dza ga tastung+gai ka dI po b+ha bA na/ i t+yAt+mAr+thani ban+d+hi ke na mr-i Shi bA kya laM dar+shi taM/ le sha s+yA pi na kIrta nany+dzi na kr-i taM twad+bar+N+Na rA sher+m+ma mA/ tA ra b+d+hAn pa tAny+dza laM dza la pu rA mA kar+Sha tA bA ri d+he/ be lAn+te shwi ba ro d+ha swA dza la la bats+tshe do ha saM lak+Sh+ya te/ twats+tsar+yA ti sha yAM sha le sha ra tsa nA d+yaHshre
<p>257b.4</p>sngo zhing yangs pa yi/ spyan gnyis rma med phyung nas bram ze mig med la/ de yis long ba'i mun rang 'gro ba mthon po'i sgron me gcig pu khyod/ /de ltar bdag don gyis bcings/ drang srong gsung gi rgyan bstan pa/ cha shas kyis kyang grags rgyal byas khyod la bsngags pa'i phung po bdag /de thob sar pa nyid chu chu grong bkug chu gter dus mtha' rnams su chu bzhin chad pa yang dag mtshon/ khyod kyi spyod pa phul
<p>257b.5</p>ya sA mu d+b+ha ba/ saM b+hA ro bi bu la pra sA da bi ka sad+b+ha k+t+ya tsi tAM sha s+ya me/ te nA t+yan+ta pa ro pa kA ra nir taHswAr+the bi ma n+dA da ro/ b+hU yat+sarba bi dAM pa rAr+tha bi du ShAM yA nai ka tA no dza NaH/ dzA ta kasta pa A tsA r+yA dz+nyA ya sha saH// //'di ni rgya dpe las bod kyi skad du/ zhwa lu lo tsA ba dge slong d+harma pA la b+ha dras bsgyur ba'o// //
<p>257b.6</p>byung cha shas bag tsam bkod bdag legs pa las byung / tshogs yangs pa rab dang rgyas pa gus pa stug po'i cha yis bdag /de yis shin tu gzhan phan nges dga' rang gi don la gus pa zhan/ /thams cad mkhyen pa gzhan don la mkhas theg pa gcig par skye bo rnams gyuracig /skyes rabs kyi bstod pa slob dpon ye shes grags pas mdzad pa'o// //
<p>258a</p>
<p>258a.1</p>@#/ /bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan bzang po'i chos kyi legs par grags pa'i gsung / /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sras po bde bar gshegs pa'i sku/ /'jig rten gsum spyan srid gsum sgron me gcig pu pa/ /ye shes rab tu grub la brtson pas phyag bgyi'o/ /thugs rje'i
<p>258a.2</p>'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa can/ /rnam par 'dren pa dran mkhyen bde ba'i go 'phang gnas/ /srid par gcig tu gzhan gyi don la nges par 'byung / /sgrol dka' sgrol ba de nyid kho nar phyag bgyi'o/ /sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su rig cing rab mchog yon tan tshogs kyis brgyan pas sku ni
<p>258a.3</p>rab tu mdzes/ /ye shes rgyan dang lhab lhub dang ldan rgya chen brtse ldan ma 'ongs rjes su rigs dang bcas/ /sems can don dang theg gsum gcig pa'i ye shes chu yis skye bo mtha' dag ljon shing dbang bskur ba/ /shAkya'i sras po bde gshegs sku yi yon tan mnga' ba ye shes phung
<p>258a.4</p>po de la phyag bgyi'o/ /sa dang pha rol phyin dang dge ba rab mchog bcu po thams cad kyis/ /gang zhig nye bar rgyas byas bsod nams tshogs kyi pha rol son/ /stobs bcu'i yon tan brnyes pas tshogs kyi mthar son pa/ /srid dang srid bral rgya mtsho sgrol mdzad de la phyag bgyi'o/ /de bzhin
<p>258a.5</p>gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang bsod nams kyi tshogs dang sa dang pha rol tu phyin pas gang ba bla ma dam pa mchog gi man ngag gi dam pa'i chos kyi rnga bo che rigs pa dang rnam par bkra ba'i tshig gis brgyan pa sangs rgyas kyi myu gu byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan can grags pa bzang po dang
<p>258a.6</p>thugs rje dang ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bsil ba can tshogs thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa la bstod pa/ lha'i yul mthar gnas pa'i shAkya'i dge slong dge legs dpal mgon gyis gsol ba btab ste ha ri pu ny+dza'i yul gyi shAkya'i dge slong chos kyi nyi ma zhes bya bas rnam par bkra bar bkod
<p>258a.7</p>pa mgo bo la thob po zhes/ bdag dang 'gro ba rnams la dge bar gyur cig /bdag gi bsod nams las 'di yis/ /ma 'ongs sangs rgyas nyid gyur te/ /'khor bar sdug bsngal sems can rnams/ /mya ngan 'das la rab 'god shog/ //
